GE09ram_07_u:001.002a: kauśiko 'tha yavakrīto raibhyaś cyavana eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:001.002c: kaṇvo medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye śritāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.003a: svastyātreyaś ca bhagavān namuciḥ pramucus tathā
GE09ram_07_u:001.003c: ājagmus te sahāgastyā ye śritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:001.004a: pṛṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyo raudreyaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.004c: te 'py ājagmuḥ saśiṣyā vai ye śritāḥ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:001.008c: agastyaṃ kathayām āsa saṃprātam ṛṣibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:001.009a: śrutvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu bālasūryasamaprabhān
GE09ram_07_u:001.010a: dṛṣṭvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.013c: tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam
GE09ram_07_u:001.014a: na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.014c: sadhanus tvaṃ hi lokāṃs trīn vijayethā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.015a: diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān
GE09ram_07_u:001.015c: diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_07_u:001.016c: akampanaś ca durdharṣo nihatās te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.017a: yasya pramāṇād vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:001.017c: diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.019a: saṃkhye tasya na kiṃ cit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.019c: dvandvayuddham anuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇir hataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.020c: muktaḥ suraripor vīra prāptaś ca vijayas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:001.021a: vismayas tv eṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutyendrajitaṃ hatam
GE09ram_07_u:001.022a: dattvā puṇyām imāṃ vīra saumyām abhayadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_07_u:001.023a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:001.023c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:001.024a: bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:001.025a: mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:001.026a: kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.027a: śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:001.027c: yadi guhyaṃ na ced vaktuṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
GE09ram_07_u:001.027e: kathaṃ śakro jitas tena kathaṃ labdhavaraś ca saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.001c: kumbhayonir mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:002.002a: śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yasya tejobalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:002.002c: jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathāvadhyaś ca śatrubhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.003a: ahaṃ te rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:002.003c: varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:002.004c: pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣād iva pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.005a: nānukīrtyā guṇās tasya dharmataḥ śīlatas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:002.005c: prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.006a: sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.009c: nityaśas tās tu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.010c: yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:002.011a: tās tu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.012a: tṛṇabindos tu rājarṣes tanayā na śṛṇoti tat
GE09ram_07_u:002.013a: tasminn eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyo mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.014a: sā tu vedadhvaniṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā caiva tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:002.015a: dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃvignā sā tu tadrūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.015c: idaṃ me kiṃ nv iti jñātvā pitur gatvāgrataḥ sthitā
GE09ram_07_u:002.016a: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathā bhūtāṃ tṛṇabindur athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:002.016c: kiṃ tvam etat tv asadṛśaṃ dhārayasy ātmano vapuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.017a: sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:002.017c: na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:002.018a: kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmy ekā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.019a: na ca paśyāmy ahaṃ tatra kāṃ cid apy āgatāṃ sakhīm
GE09ram_07_u:002.019c: rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāham ihāgatā
GE09ram_07_u:002.020c: dhyānaṃ viveśa tac cāpi apaśyad ṛṣikarmajam
GE09ram_07_u:002.021a: sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.021c: gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:002.022a: bhagavaṃs tanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svair eva bhūṣitām
GE09ram_07_u:002.024a: taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:002.024c: jighṛkṣur abravīt kanyāṃ bāḍham ity eva sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.025a: dattvā tu sa gato rājā svam āśramapadaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:002.025c: sāpi tatrāvasat kanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.025e: prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:002.026a: parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te guṇānāṃ saṃpadā bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:002.026c: tasmāt te viramāmy adya putram ātmasamaṃ guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.027a: yasmāt tu viśruto vedas tvayehābhyasyato mama
GE09ram_07_u:002.027c: tasmāt sa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:002.028a: evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:003.003a: jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.003c: dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svāṃ sutāṃ devavarṇinīm
GE09ram_07_u:003.005c: janayām āsa dharmātmā sarvair brahmaguṇair yutam
GE09ram_07_u:003.006a: tasmiñ jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.006c: nāma cāsyākarot prītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhis tadā
GE09ram_07_u:003.007c: tasmād vaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyaty eṣa viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.008a: sa tu vaiśravaṇas tatra tapovanagatas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:003.009c: cariṣye niyato dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.010a: sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
GE09ram_07_u:003.010c: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu taṃ taṃ vidhim avartata
GE09ram_07_u:003.011c: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmus tāny eva varṣavat
GE09ram_07_u:003.012a: atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:003.013c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhas tvaṃ hi me mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.015c: brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍham ity eva hṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:003.016a: ahaṃ hi lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭum udyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.016c: yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi padaṃ yat tava cepsitam
GE09ram_07_u:003.018a: etac ca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_07_u:003.019a: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:003.019c: kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava mahāvaram
GE09ram_07_u:003.020c: dhaneśaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vinayāt praṇato vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.021c: nivāsaṃ na tu me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.022a: tat paśya bhagavan kaṃ cid deśaṃ vāsāya naḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:003.022c: na ca pīḍā bhaved yatra prāṇino yasya kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:003.023a: evam uktas tu putreṇa viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.023c: vacanaṃ prāha dharmajña śrūyatām iti dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:003.024a: laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_07_u:003.026a: sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matiṃ svakām
GE09ram_07_u:003.026c: nirdoṣas tatra te vāso na ca bādhāsti kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:003.027a: etac chrutvā tu dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.028a: nairṛtānāṃ sahasrais tu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:003.030c: abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:003.031a: sa devagandharvagaṇair abhiṣṭutas; tathaiva siddhaiḥ saha cāraṇair api
GE09ram_07_u:003.031c: gabhastibhiḥ sūrya ivaujasā vṛtaḥ; pituḥ samīpaṃ prayayau śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.001c: pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.003a: bhagavan pūrvam apy eṣā laṅkāsīt piśitāśinām
GE09ram_07_u:004.003c: itīdaṃ bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_07_u:004.004a: pulastyavaṃśād udbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_07_u:004.004c: idānīm anyataś cāpi saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:004.005a: rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇāc ca prahastād vikaṭād api
GE09ram_07_u:004.005c: rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.006a: ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapobalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.006c: aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:004.007c: kautūhalaṃ kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānur yathā tamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.008a: rāghavasya tu tac chrutvā saṃskārālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.011a: prajāpatis tu tāny āha sattvāni prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:004.011c: ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.012c: bhuṅkṣitābhuṅkṣitair uktas tatas tān āha bhūtakṛt
GE09ram_07_u:004.013a: rakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ rākṣasās te bhavantu vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.013c: yakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ te vai yakṣā bhavantu vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.014a: tatra hetiḥ prahetiś ca bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau
GE09ram_07_u:004.015a: prahetir dhārmikas tatra na dārān so 'bhikāṅkṣati
GE09ram_07_u:004.015c: hetir dārakriyārthaṃ tu yatnaṃ param athākarot
GE09ram_07_u:004.016a: sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām
GE09ram_07_u:004.017c: putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam
GE09ram_07_u:004.019a: sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadram anuprāpto niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.019c: tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā
GE09ram_07_u:004.021a: avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai seti saṃdhyayā
GE09ram_07_u:004.022c: ramate sa tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavān iva
GE09ram_07_u:004.023a: kena cit tv atha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṃkaṭā
GE09ram_07_u:004.024c: prasūtā mandaraṃ gatvā gaṅgā garbham ivāgnijam
GE09ram_07_u:004.025a: tam utsṛjya tu sā garbhaṃ vidyutkeśād ratārthinī
GE09ram_07_u:004.025c: reme sā patinā sārdhaṃ vismṛtya sutam ātmajam
GE09ram_07_u:004.026c: pāṇim āsye samādhāya ruroda ghanarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:004.027a: athopariṣṭād gacchan vai vṛṣabhastho haraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.028c: taṃ rākṣasātmajaṃ cakre mātur eva vayaḥ samam
GE09ram_07_u:004.030c: sadyopalabdhir garbhasya prasūtiḥ sadya eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:004.030e: sadya eva vayaḥprāptir mātur eva vayaḥ samam
GE09ram_07_u:004.031a: tataḥ sukeśo varadānagarvitaḥ; śriyaṃ prabhoḥ prāpya harasya pārśvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:004.031c: cacāra sarvatra mahāmatiḥ khagaḥ; khagaṃ puraṃ prāpya puraṃdaro yathā
GE09ram_07_u:005.001a: sukeśaṃ dhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā varalabdhaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:005.002a: tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīr ivātmajā
GE09ram_07_u:005.002c: tāṃ sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau dakṣaḥ śriyaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:005.003a: varadānakṛtaiśvaryaṃ sā taṃ prāpya patiṃ priyam
GE09ram_07_u:005.003c: āsīd devavatī tuṣṭā dhanaṃ prāpyeva nirdhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.004a: sa tayā saha saṃyukto rarāja rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.005a: devavatyāṃ sukeśas tu janayām āsa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:005.005e: mālyavantaṃ sumāliṃ ca māliṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE09ram_07_u:005.006a: trayo lokā ivāvyagrāḥ sthitās traya ivāgnayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.006c: trayo mantrā ivātyugrās trayo ghorā ivāmayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.008a: varaprāptiṃ pitus te tu jñātvaiśvaryaṃ tato mahat
GE09ram_07_u:005.008c: tapas taptuṃ gatā meruṃ bhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.012a: brahmāṇaṃ varadaṃ jñātvā sendrair devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:005.012c: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.013a: tapasārādhito deva yadi no diśase varam
GE09ram_07_u:005.015a: varaṃ labdhvā tataḥ sarve rāma rātriṃcarās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:005.017a: atha te viśvakarmāṇaṃ śilpināṃ varam avyayam
GE09ram_07_u:005.018c: asmākam api tāvat tvaṃ gṛhaṃ kuru mahāmate
GE09ram_07_u:005.019a: himavantaṃ samāśritya meruṃ mandaram eva vā
GE09ram_07_u:005.025a: viśvakarmavacaḥ śrutvā tatas te rāma rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.025c: sahasrānucarā gatvā laṅkāṃ tām avasan purīm
GE09ram_07_u:005.026c: laṅkām avāpya te hṛṣṭā viharanti niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.030a: kṛtadārās tu te rāma sukeśatanayāḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:005.031a: tatra mālyavato bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī
GE09ram_07_u:005.031c: sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ nibodha tat
GE09ram_07_u:005.032c: suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mattonmattau tathaiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:005.032e: analā cābhavat kanyā sundaryāṃ rāma sundarī
GE09ram_07_u:005.034a: sumālī janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.035c: dhūmrākśaś cātha daṇḍaś ca supārśvaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.036a: saṃhrādiḥ praghasaś caiva bhāsakarṇaś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.036c: rākā puṣpotkaṭā caiva kaikasī ca śucismitā
GE09ram_07_u:005.036e: kumbhīnasī ca ity ete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.037a: māles tu vasudā nāma gandharvī rūpaśālinī
GE09ram_07_u:005.038a: sumāler anujas tasyāṃ janayām āsa yat prabho
GE09ram_07_u:005.038c: apatyaṃ kathyamānaṃ tan mayā tvaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:005.039a: analaś cānilaś caiva haraḥ saṃpātir eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:005.040a: tatas tu te rākṣasapuṃgavās trayo; niśācaraiḥ putraśataiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.040c: surān sahendrān ṛṣināgadānavān; babādhire te balavīryadarpitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.041a: jagad bhramanto 'nilavad durāsadā; raṇe ca mṛtyupratimāḥ samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:005.041c: varapradānād abhigarvitā bhṛśaṃ; kratukriyāṇāṃ praśamaṃkarāḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:006.001a: tair vadhyamānā devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.002a: te sametya tu kāmāriṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam
GE09ram_07_u:006.004c: svargāc ca cyāvitaḥ śakraḥ svarge krīḍanti śakravat
GE09ram_07_u:006.005a: ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ rudro brahmāhaṃ devarāḍ aham
GE09ram_07_u:006.005c: ahaṃ yamo 'haṃ varuṇaś candro 'haṃ ravir apy aham
GE09ram_07_u:006.006a: iti te rākṣasā deva varadānena darpitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.006c: bādhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.007a: tan no devabhayārtānām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:006.008a: ity uktas tu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.008c: sukeśaṃ prati sāpekṣa āha devagaṇān prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.009a: nāhaṃ tān nihaniṣyāmi avadhyā mama te 'surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.009c: kiṃ tu mantraṃ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:006.010c: gacchantu śaraṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ haniṣyati sa tān prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.014c: tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvān naḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.015a: sa tvam asmatpriyārthaṃ tu jahi tān madhusūdana
GE09ram_07_u:006.016c: nuda tvaṃ no bhayaṃ deva nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.017a: ity evaṃ daivatair ukto devadevo janārdanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.017c: abhayaṃ bhayado 'rīṇāṃ dattvā devān uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:006.018c: tāṃś cāsya tanayāñ jāne yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān
GE09ram_07_u:006.020a: ity uktās te surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:006.020c: yathā vāsaṃ yayur hṛṣṭāḥ praśamanto janārdanam
GE09ram_07_u:006.021c: śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrāv idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:006.022a: amarā ṛṣayaś caiva saṃhatya kila śaṃkaram
GE09ram_07_u:006.024a: rākṣasair abhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ sma umāpate
GE09ram_07_u:006.024c: sveṣu veśmasu saṃsthātuṃ bhayāt teṣāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:006.025a: tad asmākaṃ hitārthe tvaṃ jahi tāṃs tāṃs trilocana
GE09ram_07_u:006.026c: śiraḥ karaṃ ca dhunvāna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:006.027a: avadhyā mama te devāḥ sukeśatanayā raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:006.027c: mantraṃ tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:006.028c: haniṣyati sa tān yuddhe śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadyatha
GE09ram_07_u:006.029a: harān nāvāpya te kāmaṃ kāmārim abhivādya ca
GE09ram_07_u:006.031c: pratijñāto vadho 'smākaṃ tac cintayatha yat kṣamam
GE09ram_07_u:006.032c: duḥkhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ jetuṃ yo no hantum abhīpsati
GE09ram_07_u:006.033a: tataḥ sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavato vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.033c: ūcatur bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhagāṃśāv iva vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:006.034a: svadhītaṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca aiśvaryaṃ paripālitam
GE09ram_07_u:006.034c: āyur nirāmayaṃ prāptaṃ svadharmaḥ sthāpitaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.035c: jitā devā raṇe nityaṃ na no mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:006.036a: nārāyaṇaś ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi yamas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:006.036c: asmākaṃ pramukhe sthātuṃ sarva eva hi bibhyati
GE09ram_07_u:006.037a: viṣṇor doṣaś ca nāsty atra kāraṇaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_07_u:006.037c: devānām eva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.038c: devān eva jighāṃsāmo yebhyo doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.039a: iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavān agrajaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.039c: udyogaṃ ghoṣayitvātha rākṣasāḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:006.040a: syandanair vāraṇendraiś ca hayaiś ca girisaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.040c: kharair gobhir athoṣṭraiś ca śiṃśumārair bhujaṃ gamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.041c: siṃhair vyāghrair varāhaiś ca sṛmaraiś camarair api
GE09ram_07_u:006.042a: tyaktvā laṅkāṃ tataḥ sarve rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.045a: asthīni meghā varṣanti uṣṇaṃ śoṇitam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:006.049a: mālyavāṃś ca sumālī ca mālī ca rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.049c: āsan puraḥsarās teṣāṃ kratūnām iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.050a: mālyavantaṃ tu te sarve mālyavantam ivācalam
GE09ram_07_u:006.051c: jayepsayā devalokaṃ yayau mālī vaśe sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:006.052a: rākṣasānāṃ samudyogaṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.052c: devadūtād upaśrutya dadhre yuddhe tato manaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.054c: cacāla tad rākṣasarājasainyaṃ; calopalo nīla ivācalendraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:006.055c: niśācarāḥ saṃparivārya mādhavaṃ; varāyudhair nirbibhiduḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.003a: śalabhā iva kedāraṃ maśakā iva parvatam
GE09ram_07_u:007.004c: hariṃ viśanti sma śarā lokāstam iva paryaye
GE09ram_07_u:007.005a: syandanaiḥ syandanagatā gajaiś ca gajadhūr gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.005c: aśvārohāḥ sadaśvaiś ca pādātāś cāmbare carāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.006c: nirucchvāsaṃ hariṃ cakruḥ prāṇāyāma iva dvijam
GE09ram_07_u:007.009a: vidrāvya śaravarṣaṃ taṃ varṣaṃ vāyur ivotthitam
GE09ram_07_u:007.012a: na śekur aśvāḥ saṃsthātuṃ vimadāḥ kuñjarābhavan
GE09ram_07_u:007.013c: vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi supuṅkhā viviśuḥ kṣitim
GE09ram_07_u:007.014c: nipetū rākṣasā bhīmāḥ śailā vajrahatā iva
GE09ram_07_u:007.016c: rākṣasānāṃ ravāṃś cāpi grasate vaiṣṇavo ravaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.017a: sūryād iva karā ghorā ūrmayaḥ sāgarād iva
GE09ram_07_u:007.017c: parvatād iva nāgendrā vāryoghā iva cāmbudāt
GE09ram_07_u:007.019a: śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:007.019c: dviradena yathā vyāghrā vyāghreṇa dvīpino yathā
GE09ram_07_u:007.020a: dvīpinā ca yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:007.020c: mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathākhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.021a: tathā te rākṣasā yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:007.021c: dravanti drāvitāś caiva śāyitāś ca mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:007.022c: vārijaṃ nādayām āsa toyadaṃ surarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:007.023c: yayau laṅkām abhimukhaṃ prabhagnaṃ rākṣasaṃ balam
GE09ram_07_u:007.025a: utkṣipya hemābharaṇaṃ karaṃ karam iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.025c: rarāsa rākṣaso harṣāt sataḍit toyado yathā
GE09ram_07_u:007.026c: ciccheda yantur aśvāś ca bhrāntās tasya tu rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.027a: tair aśvair bhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.027c: indriyāśvair yathā bhrāntair dhṛtihīno yathā naraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.028a: mālī cābhyadravad yuddhe pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.028e: viviśur harim āsādya krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva
GE09ram_07_u:007.029c: cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇur jitendriya ivādhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.030a: atha maurvī svanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.031c: pibanti rudhiraṃ tasya nāgā iva purāmṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:007.032a: mālinaṃ vimukhaṃ kṛtvā mālimauliṃ harir balāt
GE09ram_07_u:007.032c: rathaṃ ca sadhvajaṃ cāpaṃ vājinaś ca nyapātayat
GE09ram_07_u:007.033a: virathas tu gadāṃ gṛhya mālī naktaṃcarottamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.034a: sa tayā garuḍaṃ saṃkhye īśānam iva cāntakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.036a: parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai
GE09ram_07_u:007.041a: mālinaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā sumālī malyavān api
GE09ram_07_u:007.044c: viniḥsṛtāntraṃ bhayalolanetraṃ; balaṃ tad unmattanibhaṃ babhūva
GE09ram_07_u:007.045a: siṃhārditānām iva kuñjarāṇāṃ; niśācarāṇāṃ saha kuñjarāṇām
GE09ram_07_u:007.045c: ravāś ca vegāś ca samaṃ babhūvuḥ; purāṇasiṃhena vimarditānām
GE09ram_07_u:007.047c: asiprahārair bahudhā vibhaktāḥ; patanti śailā iva rākṣasendrāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.049a: ke cic caivāsinā chinnās tathānye śaratāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:007.050c: nipātyamānair dadṛśe nirantaraṃ; nipātyamānair iva nīlaparvataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.002c: padmanābham idaṃ prāha vacanaṃ paruṣaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:008.004c: sa hantā na gataḥ svargaṃ labhate puṇyakarmaṇām
GE09ram_07_u:008.005c: ahaṃ sthito 'smi paśyāmi balaṃ darśaya yat tava
GE09ram_07_u:008.007a: prāṇair api priyaṃ kāryaṃ devānāṃ hi sadā mayā
GE09ram_07_u:008.008c: śaktyā bibheda saṃkruddho rākṣasendro rarāsa ca
GE09ram_07_u:008.010a: tatas tām eva cotkṛṣya śaktiṃ śaktidharapriyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.013c: mālyavān punar āśvastas tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.014a: tataḥ kārṣṇāyasaṃ śūlaṃ kaṇṭakair bahubhiś citam
GE09ram_07_u:008.016a: tato 'mbare mahāñ śabdaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cotthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.016c: āhatya rākṣaso viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ cāpy atāḍayat
GE09ram_07_u:008.018c: sumālī svabalaiḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkām abhimukho yayau
GE09ram_07_u:008.019c: svabalena samāgamya yayau laṅkāṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.020a: evaṃ te rākṣasā rāma hariṇā kamalekṣaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:008.021c: tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatā vastuṃ pātālaṃ sahapatnayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.023a: ye tvayā nihatās te vai paulastyā nāma rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.023c: sumālī mālyavān mālī ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:008.024a: na cānyo rakṣasāṃ hantā sureṣv api puraṃjaya
GE09ram_07_u:008.025c: rākṣasān hantum utpanno ajeyaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.001a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.001c: rasātalān martyalokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāara ha
GE09ram_07_u:009.002c: kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ gṛhya vinā padmam iva śriyam
GE09ram_07_u:009.003c: athābbravīt sutāṃ rakṣaḥ kaikasīṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.004c: tvatkṛte ca vayaṃ sarve yantritā dharmabuddhayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.005a: tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sapadmeva putrike
GE09ram_07_u:009.005c: pratyākhyānāc ca bhītais tvaṃ na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase
GE09ram_07_u:009.006c: na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyāṃ varayed iti putrike
GE09ram_07_u:009.007a: mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate
GE09ram_07_u:009.007c: kulatrayaṃ sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:009.008c: gaccha viśravasaṃ putri paulastyaṃ varaya svayam
GE09ram_07_u:009.009a: īdṛśās te bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.011a: sā tu tāṃ dāruṇāṃ velām acintya pitṛgauravāt
GE09ram_07_u:009.012a: sa tu tāṃ vīkṣya suśroṇīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām
GE09ram_07_u:009.013a: bhadre kasyāsi duhitā kuto vā tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_07_u:009.013c: kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetos tattvato brūhi śobhane
GE09ram_07_u:009.014a: evam uktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjalir athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:009.014c: ātmaprabhāvena mune jñātum arhasi me matam
GE09ram_07_u:009.015a: kiṃ tu viddhi hi māṃ brahmañ śāsanāt pitur āgatām
GE09ram_07_u:009.015c: kaikasī nāma nāmnāhaṃ śeṣaṃ tvaṃ jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:009.016a: sa tu gatvā munir dhyānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:009.016c: vijñātaṃ te mayā bhadre kāraṇaṃ yan manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:009.017a: dāruṇāyāṃ tu velāyāṃ yasmāt tvaṃ mām upasthitā
GE09ram_07_u:009.017c: śṛṇu tasmāt sutān bhadre yādṛśāñ janayiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:009.019a: sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praṇipatyābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.020a: athābravīn munis tatra paścimo yas tavātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.020c: mama vaṃśānurūpaś ca dharmātmā ca bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:009.021a: evam uktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:009.024a: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo meghāś ca kharanisvanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.024c: prababhau na ca khe sūryo maholkāś cāpatan bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:009.026a: tasya tv anantaraṃ jātaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.026c: pramāṇād yasya vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:009.027c: vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.028a: te tu tatra mahāraṇye vavṛdhuḥ sumahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.029c: trailokyaṃ trāsayan duṣṭo bhakṣayan vicacāra ha
GE09ram_07_u:009.030a: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.031a: atha vitteśvaro devas tatra kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:009.032a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:009.032c: āsthāya rākṣasīṃ buddhiṃ daśagrīvam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:009.033c: bhrātṛbhāve same cāpi paśyātmānaṃ tvam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:009.034c: yathā bhavasi me putra śīghraṃ vaiśvaraṇopamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:009.035a: mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:009.035c: amarṣam atulaṃ lebhe pratijñāṃ cākarot tadā
GE09ram_07_u:009.036a: satyaṃ te pratijānāmi tulyo bhrātrādhiko 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:009.036c: bhaviṣyāmy acirān mātaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tyaja hṛdgatam
GE09ram_07_u:009.037c: prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmam iti kṛtvādhyavasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:010.001a: athābravīd dvijaṃ rāmaḥ kathaṃ te bhrātaro vane
GE09ram_07_u:010.001c: kīdṛśaṃ tu tadā brahmaṃs tapaś cerur mahāvratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.002a: agastyas tv abravīt tatra rāmaṃ prayata mānasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:010.002c: tāṃs tān dharmavidhīṃs tatra bhrātaras te samāviśan
GE09ram_07_u:010.003c: tatāpa graiṣmike kāle pañcasv agniṣv avasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.006a: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmaparaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.007c: papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kṣubhitāś cāpi devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.010c: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śiraś cāgnau juhāva saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.011c: śirāṃsi nava cāpy asya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:010.012a: atha varṣasahasre tu daśame daśamaṃ śiraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.012c: chettukāmaḥ sa dharmātmā prāptaś cātra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.013a: pitāmahas tu suprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devair upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.014a: śīghraṃ varaya dharmajña varo yas te 'bhikāṅkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.014c: kiṃ te kāmaṃ karomy adya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.016a: bhagavan prāṇināṃ nityaṃ nānyatra maraṇād bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:010.016c: nāsti mṛtyusamaḥ śatrur amaratvam ato vṛṇe
GE09ram_07_u:010.017c: avadhyaḥ syāṃ prajādhyakṣa devatānāṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:010.018a: na hi cintā mamānyeṣu prāṇiṣv amarapūjita
GE09ram_07_u:010.018c: tṛṇabhūtā hi me sarve prāṇino mānuṣādayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.019a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:010.019c: uvāca vacanaṃ rāma saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.020c: śṛṇu cāpi vaco bhūyaḥ prītasyeha śubhaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:010.021a: hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvam agnau tvayānagha
GE09ram_07_u:010.021c: punas tāni bhaviṣyanti tathaiva tava rākṣasa
GE09ram_07_u:010.022c: agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi yāni tāny utthitāni vai
GE09ram_07_u:010.023a: evam uktvvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.025a: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā vacanaṃ prāha sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.025c: vṛtaḥ sarvaguṇair nityaṃ candramā iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.026a: bhagavan kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yan me lokaguruḥ svayam
GE09ram_07_u:010.026c: prīto yadi tvaṃ dātavyaṃ varaṃ me śṛṇu suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:010.027a: yā yā me jāyate buddhir yeṣu yeṣv āśrameṣv iha
GE09ram_07_u:010.027c: sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ ca pālaye
GE09ram_07_u:010.028a: eṣa me paramodāra varaḥ paramako mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.028c: na hi dharmābhiraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cana durlabham
GE09ram_07_u:010.029a: atha prajāpatiḥ prīto vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:010.029c: dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ yathā vatsa tathā caitad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:010.030c: nādharme jāyate buddhir amaratvaṃ dadāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:010.032a: na tāvat kumbhakarṇāya pradātavyo varas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:010.032c: jānīṣe hi yathā lokāṃs trāsayaty eṣa durmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.033c: anena bhakṣitā brahman ṛṣayo mānuṣās tathā
GE09ram_07_u:010.034c: lokānāṃ svasti caiva syād bhaved asya ca saṃnatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.036a: prāñjaliḥ sā tu parśvasthā prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatī
GE09ram_07_u:010.036c: iyam asmy āgatā devakiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_07_u:010.037a: prajāpatis tu tāṃ prāptāṃ prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatīm
GE09ram_07_u:010.037c: vāṇi tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhava yā devatepsitā
GE09ram_07_u:010.038a: tathety uktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatir athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:010.038c: kumbhakarṇa mahābāho varaṃ varaya yo mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.039a: kumbhakarṇas tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:010.040a: evam astv iti taṃ coktvā saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.040c: devī sarasvatī caiva muktvā taṃ prayayau divam
GE09ram_07_u:010.041a: kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:010.041c: kīrdṛśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ vākyaṃ mamādya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_07_u:010.042c: śleṣmātakavanaṃ gatvā tatra te nyavasan sukham
GE09ram_07_u:011.001a: sumālī varalabdhāṃs tu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān
GE09ram_07_u:011.001c: udatiṣṭhad bhayaṃ tyaktvā sānugaḥ sa rasātalāt
GE09ram_07_u:011.002a: mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.003a: sumālī caiva taiḥ sarvair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.004c: yas tvaṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhāl labdhavān varam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:011.005a: yatkṛte ca vayaṃ laṅkāṃ tyaktvā yātā rasātalam
GE09ram_07_u:011.005c: tad gataṃ no mahābāho mahad viṣṇukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:011.006a: asakṛt tena bhagnā hi parityajya svam ālayam
GE09ram_07_u:011.006c: vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam
GE09ram_07_u:011.008a: yadi nāmātra śakyaṃ syāt sāmnā dānena vānagha
GE09ram_07_u:011.008c: tarasā vā mahābāho pratyānetuṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:011.009a: tvaṃ ca laṅkeśvaras tāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.009c: sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhuś caiva bhaviṣyasi mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:011.010c: vitteśo gurur asmākaṃ nārhasy evaṃ prabhāṣitum
GE09ram_07_u:011.011c: prahastaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam idam āha sakāraṇam
GE09ram_07_u:011.012a: daśagrīva mahābāho nārhas tvaṃ vaktum īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:011.012c: saubhrātraṃ nāsti śūrāṇāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:011.013a: aditiś ca ditiś caiva bhaginyau sahite kila
GE09ram_07_u:011.016a: nihatya tāṃs tu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:011.016c: devānāṃ vaśam ānītaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam
GE09ram_07_u:011.017a: naitad eko bhavān eva kariṣyati viparyayam
GE09ram_07_u:011.017c: surair ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ kuruṣvaitad vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:011.018c: cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ vai bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:011.019a: sa tu tenaiva harṣeṇa tasminn ahani vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:011.019c: vanaṃ gato daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.020a: trikūṭasthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.021a: prahasta śīghraṃ gatvā tvaṃ brūhi nairṛtapuṃgavam
GE09ram_07_u:011.021c: vacanān mama vitteśaṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.022a: iyaṃ laṅkā purī rājan rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:011.022c: tvayā niveśitā saumya naitad yuktaṃ tavānagha
GE09ram_07_u:011.023a: tad bhavān yadi sāmnaitāṃ dadyād atulavikrama
GE09ram_07_u:011.023c: kṛtā bhaven mama prītir dharmaś caivānupālitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.024a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā gatvā prahasto vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.025a: prahastād api saṃśrutya devo vaiśravaṇo vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.026a: brūhi gaccha daśagrīvaṃ purī rājyaṃ ca yan mama
GE09ram_07_u:011.027a: sarvaṃ kartāsmi bhadraṃ te rākṣaseśa vaco 'cirāt
GE09ram_07_u:011.027c: kiṃ tu tāvat pratīkṣasva pitur yāvan nivedaye
GE09ram_07_u:011.028a: evam uktvā dhanādhyakṣo jagāma pitur antikam
GE09ram_07_u:011.029a: eṣa tāta daśagrīvo dūtaṃ preṣitavān mama
GE09ram_07_u:011.029e: mayātra yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tan mamācakṣva suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:011.030a: brahmarṣis tv evam ukto 'sau viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.030c: uvāca dhanadaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu putra vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:011.032a: sa krodhena mayā cokto dhvaṃsasveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.032c: śreyo'bhiyuktaṃ dharmyaṃ ca śṛṇu putra vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:011.033c: na vetti mama śāpāc ca prakṛtiṃ dāruṇāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.035a: tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnāṃ pravarā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:011.036a: na hi kṣamaṃ tvayā tena vairaṃ dhanadarakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:011.036c: jānīṣe hi yathānena labdhaḥ paramako varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.037a: evam ukto gṛhītvā tu tad vacaḥ pitṛgauravāt
GE09ram_07_u:011.038a: prahastas tu daśagrīvaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:011.038c: śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā triṃśadyojanam āyatā
GE09ram_07_u:011.038e: praviśya tāṃ sahāsmābhiḥ svadharmaṃ tatra pālaya
GE09ram_07_u:011.039a: evam uktaḥ prahastena rāvaṇo rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:011.040a: sa cābhiṣiktaḥ kṣaṇadācarais tadā; niveśayām āsa purīṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.040c: nikāmapūrṇā ca babhūva sā purī; niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:011.041a: dhaneśvaras tv atha pitṛvākyagauravān; nyaveśayac chaśivimale girau purīm
GE09ram_07_u:012.003a: atha dattvā svasāraṃ sa mṛgayāṃ paryaṭan nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.003c: tatrāpaśyat tato rāma mayaṃ nāma diteḥ sutam
GE09ram_07_u:012.004c: apṛcchat ko bhavan eko nirmanuṣya mṛge vane
GE09ram_07_u:012.005a: mayas tv athābravīd rāma pṛcchantaṃ taṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:012.005c: śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye yathāvṛttam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:012.006a: hemā nāmāpsarās tāta śrutapūrvā yadi tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:012.006c: daivatair mama sā dattā paulomīva śatakratoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.007c: sā ca daivata kāryeṇa gatā varṣaṃ caturdaśam
GE09ram_07_u:012.008a: tasyāḥ kṛte ca hemāyāḥ sarvaṃ hemapuraṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:012.009a: tatrāham aratiṃ vindaṃs tayā hīnaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.009c: tasmāt purād duhitaraṃ gṛhītvā vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.010a: iyaṃ mamātmajā rājaṃs tasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā
GE09ram_07_u:012.010c: bhartāram anayā sārdham asyāḥ prāpto 'smi mārgitum
GE09ram_07_u:012.011c: kanyā hi dve kule nityaṃ saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:012.012a: dvau sutau tu mama tv asyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ saṃbabhūvatuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.013a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.013c: tvām idānīṃ kathaṃ tāta jānīyāṃ ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_07_u:012.014a: evam ukto rākṣasendro vinītam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:012.014c: ahaṃ paulastya tanayo daśagrīvaś ca nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.015a: brahmarṣes taṃ sutaṃ jñātvā mayo harṣam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.015c: dātuṃ duhitaraṃ tasya rocayām āsa tatra vai
GE09ram_07_u:012.016a: prahasan prāha daityendro rākṣasendram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.017a: bāḍham ity eva taṃ rāma daśagrīvo 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:012.018a: na hi tasya mayo rāma śāpābhijñas tapodhanāt
GE09ram_07_u:012.018c: viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmahaṃ kulam
GE09ram_07_u:012.019a: amoghāṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pradadau paramādbhutām
GE09ram_07_u:012.019c: pareṇa tapasā labdhāṃ jaghnivāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ yayā
GE09ram_07_u:012.020a: evaṃ sa kṛtadāro vai laṅkāyām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.020c: gatvā tu nagaraṃ bhārye bhrātṛbhyāṃ samudāvahat
GE09ram_07_u:012.022c: saramā nāma dharmajño lebhe bhāryāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.023a: tīre tu sarasaḥ sā vai saṃjajñe mānasasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:012.023c: mānasaṃ ca saras tāta vavṛdhe jaladāgame
GE09ram_07_u:012.024a: mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehanākranditaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.024c: saro mā vardhatety uktaṃ tataḥ sā saramābhavat
GE09ram_07_u:012.025a: evaṃ te kṛtadārā vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:012.025c: svāṃ svāṃ bhāryām upādāya gandharvā iva nandane
GE09ram_07_u:012.028a: jaḍīkṛtāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ tena nādena tasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:012.028c: pitā tasyākaron nāma meghanāda iti svayam
GE09ram_07_u:013.001a: atha lokeśvarotsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:013.002c: nidrā māṃ bādhate rājan kārayasva mamālayam
GE09ram_07_u:013.004a: vistīrṇaṃ yojanaṃ śubhraṃ tato dviguṇam āyatam
GE09ram_07_u:013.005a: sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiś citraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam
GE09ram_07_u:013.006c: sarvartusukhadaṃ nityaṃ meroḥ puṇyāṃ guhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:013.009c: tāni gatvā susaṃkruddho bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.010a: nadīṃ gaja iva krīḍan vṛkṣān vāyur iva kṣipan
GE09ram_07_u:013.010c: nagān vajra iva sṛṣṭo vidhvaṃsayati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.011a: tathā vṛttaṃ tu vijñāya daśagrīvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.012c: laṅkāṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam
GE09ram_07_u:013.013a: sa gatvā nagarīṃ laṅkām āsasāda vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:013.013c: mānitas tena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭhaś cāgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:013.014a: pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājño jñātīn api ca bāndhavān
GE09ram_07_u:013.014c: sabhāyāṃ darśayām āsa tam āsīnaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:013.015a: sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:013.017a: rājan vadāmi te sarvaṃ bhrātā tava yad abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:013.017c: ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ saumya vṛttasya ca kulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:013.018c: sādhu dharme vyavasthānaṃ kriyatāṃ yadi śakyate
GE09ram_07_u:013.019a: dṛṣṭaṃ me nandanaṃ bhagnam ṛṣayo nihatāḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.019c: devānāṃ tu samudyogas tvatto rājañ śrutaś ca me
GE09ram_07_u:013.020c: aparāddhā hi bālyāc ca rakṣaṇīyāḥ svabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.021a: ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmam upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:013.022a: tatra devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyomayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.022c: savyaṃ cakṣur mayā caiva tatra devyāṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:013.023a: kā nv iyaṃ syād iti śubhā na khalv anyena hetunā
GE09ram_07_u:013.023c: rūpaṃ hy anupamaṃ kṛtvā tatra krīḍati pārvatī
GE09ram_07_u:013.024a: tato devyāḥ prabhāvena dagdhaṃ savyaṃ mamekṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:013.025a: tato 'ham anyad vistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya gires taṭam
GE09ram_07_u:013.026a: samāpte niyame tasmiṃs tatra devo maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.026c: prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyam idaṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.027c: mayā caitad vrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:013.028a: tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yaś cared vratam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:013.028c: vrataṃ suduścaraṃ hy etan mayaivotpāditaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:013.029a: tat sakhitvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ rocayasva dhaneśvara
GE09ram_07_u:013.029c: tapasā nirjitatvād dhi sakhā bhava mamānagha
GE09ram_07_u:013.030a: devyā dagdhaṃ prabhāvena yac ca sāvyaṃ tavekṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:013.030c: ekākṣi piṅgalety eva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:013.031a: evaṃ tena sakhitvaṃ ca prāpyānujñāṃ ca śaṃkarāt
GE09ram_07_u:013.031c: āgamya ca śruto 'yaṃ me tava pāpaviniścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.032c: cintyate hi vadhopāyaḥ sarṣisaṃghaiḥ surais tava
GE09ram_07_u:013.033c: hastān dantāṃś a saṃpīḍya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:013.034a: vijñātaṃ te mayā dūta vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ prabhāṣase
GE09ram_07_u:013.034c: naiva tvam asi naivāsau bhrātrā yenāsi preṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.035a: hitaṃ na sa mamaitad dhi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.036a: na hantavyo gurur jyeṣṭho mamāyam iti manyate
GE09ram_07_u:013.036c: tasya tv idānīṃ śrutvā me vākyam eṣā kṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.037a: trīṃl lokān api jeṣyāmi bāhuvīryam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:013.037c: etan muhūrtam eṣo 'haṃ tasyaikasya kṛte ca vai
GE09ram_07_u:013.038a: evam uktvā tu laṅkeśo dūtaṃ khaḍgena jaghnivān
GE09ram_07_u:013.038c: dadau bhakṣayituṃ hy enaṃ rākṣasānāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:014.001a: tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhir nityaṃ balotkaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.002c: vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmān krodhāl lokān dahann iva
GE09ram_07_u:014.003a: purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailān vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:014.004a: taṃ niviṣṭaṃ girau tasmin rākṣasendraṃ niśamya tu
GE09ram_07_u:014.004c: rājño bhrātāyam ity uktvā gatā yatra dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.005a: gatvā tu sarvam ācakhyur bhrātus tasya viniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:014.005c: anujñātā yayuś caiva yuddhāya dhanadena te
GE09ram_07_u:014.007c: vyathitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.008a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ sainyaṃ daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.008c: harṣān nādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā roṣāt samabhivartata
GE09ram_07_u:014.009a: ye tu te rākṣasendrasya sacivā ghoravikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.012c: praviveśa tataḥ sainyaṃ nayan yakṣān yamakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:014.014c: alpāvaśiṣṭās te yakṣāḥ kṛtā vātair ivāmbudāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.015a: ke cit tv āyudhabhagnāṅgāḥ patitāḥ samarakṣitau
GE09ram_07_u:014.015c: oṣṭhān svadaśanais tīkṣṇair daṃśanto bhuvi pātitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.016c: niṣedus te tadā yakṣāḥ kūlā jalahatā iva
GE09ram_07_u:014.020c: taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayām āsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve
GE09ram_07_u:014.023a: tatas toraṇam utpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.023e: na kṣitiṃ prayayau rāma varāt salilayoninaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.024a: sa tu tenaiva taṃ yakṣaṃ toraṇena samāhanat
GE09ram_07_u:014.024c: nādṛśyata tadā yakṣo bhasma tena kṛtas tu saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:014.025a: tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve yakṣā dṛṣṭvā parākramam
GE09ram_07_u:014.025c: tato nadīr guhāś caiva viviśur bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.001a: tatas tān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.001c: svayam eva dhanādhyakṣo nirjagāma raṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:015.004a: tataḥ prahastena tadā sahasraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:015.006c: musalenorasi krodhāt tāḍito na ca kampitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.007c: dhūmrākṣas tāḍito mūrdhni vihvalo nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:015.010c: tasya tena prahāreṇa mukuṭaḥ pārśvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.010e: tadā prabhṛti yakṣo 'sau pārśvamaulir iti smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.011a: tasmiṃs tu vimukhe yakṣe māṇibhadre mahātmani
GE09ram_07_u:015.011c: saṃnādaḥ sumahān rāma tasmiñ śaile vyavardhata
GE09ram_07_u:015.013a: sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye śāpād vibhraṣṭagauravam
GE09ram_07_u:015.013c: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān yuktaṃ paitāmahe kule
GE09ram_07_u:015.014c: paścād asya phalaṃ prāpya jñāsyase nirayaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.015a: yo hi mohād viṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.015c: pariṇāme sa vi mūḍho jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE09ram_07_u:015.016a: daivatāni hi nandanti dharmayuktena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:015.016c: yena tvam īdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītas tac ca na budhyase
GE09ram_07_u:015.017a: yo hi mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn ācaryāṃś cāvamanyate
GE09ram_07_u:015.017c: sa paśyati phalaṃ tasya pretarājavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.018a: adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo 'rjanam
GE09ram_07_u:015.018c: sa paścāt tapyate mūḍho mṛto dṛṣṭvātmano gatim
GE09ram_07_u:015.019a: kasya cin na hi durbudheś chandato jāyate matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.019c: yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute
GE09ram_07_u:015.020a: buddhiṃ rūpaṃ balaṃ vittaṃ putrān māhātmyam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:015.021a: evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:015.022a: evam uktvā tatas tena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.023c: gadayābhihato mūrdhni na ca sthānād vyakampata
GE09ram_07_u:015.024a: tatas tau rāma nighnantāv anyonyaṃ paramāhave
GE09ram_07_u:015.024c: na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvatur amarṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.025a: āgneyam astraṃ sa tato mumoca dhanado raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:015.026a: tato māyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.026c: jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadaṃ vyāvidhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE09ram_07_u:015.028a: tataḥ padmādibhis tatra nidhibhiḥ sa dhanādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.028c: nandanaṃ vanam ānīya dhanado śvāsitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:015.029a: tato nirjitya taṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:015.031a: tat tu rājā samāruhya kāmagaṃ vīryanirjitam
GE09ram_07_u:016.001a: sa jitvā bhrātaraṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.003a: parvataṃ sa samāsādya kiṃ cid ramyavanāntaram
GE09ram_07_u:016.003c: apaśyat puṣpakaṃ tatra rāma viṣṭambhitaṃ divi
GE09ram_07_u:016.004a: viṣṭabdhaṃ puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmagaṃ hy agamaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:016.004c: rākṣasaś cintayām āsa sacivais taiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.005a: kim idaṃ yannimittaṃ me na ca gacchati puṣpakam
GE09ram_07_u:016.005c: parvatasyoparisthasya kasya karma tv idaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:016.006c: naitan niṣkāraṇaṃ rājan puṣpako 'yaṃ na gacchati
GE09ram_07_u:016.009c: prāṇinām eva sarveṣām agamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.010a: sa roṣāt tāmranayanaḥ puṣpakād avaruhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:016.010c: ko 'yaṃ śaṃkara ity uktvā śailamūlam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:016.011c: dīptaṃ śūlam avaṣṭabhya dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram
GE09ram_07_u:016.012a: sa vānaramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam avajñāya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.012c: prahāsaṃ mumuce maurkhyāt satoya iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.014c: maurkhyāt tvam avajānīṣe parihāsaṃ ca muñcasi
GE09ram_07_u:016.015c: utpatsyante vadhārthaṃ hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.016a: kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ yat tvāṃ niśācara
GE09ram_07_u:016.016c: na hantavyo hatas tvaṃ hi pūrvam eva svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.017c: parvataṃ taṃ samāsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:016.018a: puṣpakasya gatiś chinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.018c: tad etac chailam unmūlaṃ karomi tava gopate
GE09ram_07_u:016.019a: kena prabhāvena bhavas tatra krīḍati rājavat
GE09ram_07_u:016.020a: evam uktvā tato rājan bhujān prakṣipya parvate
GE09ram_07_u:016.021a: tato rāma mahādevaḥ prahasan vīkṣya tatkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:016.021c: pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ śailaṃ pīḍayām āsa līlayā
GE09ram_07_u:016.022a: tatas te pīḍitās tasya śailasyādho gatā bhujāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.022c: vismitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:016.023a: rakṣasā tena roṣāc ca bhujānāṃ pīḍanāt tathā
GE09ram_07_u:016.023c: mukto virāvaḥ sumahāṃs trailokyaṃ yena pūritam
GE09ram_07_u:016.024c: devatāś cāpi saṃkṣubdhāś calitāḥ sveṣu karmasu
GE09ram_07_u:016.025a: tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ śailāgre viṣṭhitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:016.025c: muktvā tasya bhujān rājan prāha vākyaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:016.026a: prīto 'smi tava vīryāc ca śauṇḍīryāc ca niśācara
GE09ram_07_u:016.027a: yasmāl lokatrayaṃ tv etad rāvitaṃ bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:016.027c: tasmāt tvaṃ rāvaṇo nāma nāmnā tena bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:016.028a: devatā mānuṣā yakṣā ye cānye jagatītale
GE09ram_07_u:016.029a: gaccha paulastya visrabdhaḥ pathā yena tvam icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:017.001a: atha rājan mahābāhur vicaran sa mahītalam
GE09ram_07_u:017.002c: ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktāṃ tapantīṃ devatām iva
GE09ram_07_u:017.003a: sa dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ sumahāvratām
GE09ram_07_u:017.004a: kim idaṃ vartase bhadre viruddhaṃ yauvanasya te
GE09ram_07_u:017.004c: na hi yuktā tavaitasya rūpasyeyaṃ pratikriyā
GE09ram_07_u:017.005a: kasyāsi duhitā bhadre ko vā bhartā tavānaghe
GE09ram_07_u:017.005c: pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me śīghraṃ ko vā hetus tapo'rjane
GE09ram_07_u:017.006a: evam uktā tu sā kanyā tenānāryeṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:017.007a: kuśadhvajo nāma pitā brahmarṣir mama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.008c: saṃbhūtā vānmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:017.009c: te cāpi gatvā pitaraṃ varaṇaṃ rocayanti me
GE09ram_07_u:017.010a: na ca māṃ sa pitā tebhyo dattavān rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_07_u:017.011a: pitus tu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila surottamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.011c: abhipretas trilokeśas tasmān nānyasya me pitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.012a: dātum icchati dharmātmā tac chrutvā baladarpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.012c: śambhur nāma tato rājā daityānāṃ kupito 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:017.012e: tena rātrau prasupto me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.013a: tato me jananī dīnā tac charīraṃ pitur mama
GE09ram_07_u:017.014a: tato manorathaṃ satyaṃ pitur nārāyaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:017.014c: karomīti mamecchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā
GE09ram_07_u:017.015c: iti pratijñām āruhya carāmi vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.016a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā rākṣasapuṃgava
GE09ram_07_u:017.017a: vijñātas tvaṃ hi me rājan gaccha paulastyanandana
GE09ram_07_u:017.017c: jānāmi tapasā sarvaṃ trailokye yad dhi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:017.018a: so 'bravīd rāvaṇas tatra tāṃ kanyāṃ sumahāvratām
GE09ram_07_u:017.019a: avaliptāsi suśroṇi yasyās te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:017.021a: kaś ca tāvad asau yaṃ tvaṃ viṣṇur ity abhibhāṣase
GE09ram_07_u:017.021c: vīryeṇa tapasā caiva bhogena ca balena ca
GE09ram_07_u:017.021e: na mayāsau samo bhadre yaṃ tvaṃ kāmayase 'ṅgane
GE09ram_07_u:017.022a: ma maivam iti sā kanyā tam uvāca niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:017.022c: mūrdhajeṣu ca tāṃ rakṣaḥ karāgreṇa parāmṛśat
GE09ram_07_u:017.023a: tato vedavatī kruddhā keśān hastena sācchinat
GE09ram_07_u:017.024c: rakṣas tasmāt pravekṣyāmi paśyatas te hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:017.025a: yasmāt tu dharṣitā cāham apāpā cāpy anāthavat
GE09ram_07_u:017.025c: tasmāt tava vadhārthaṃ vai samutpatsyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.026a: na hi śakyaḥ striyā pāpa hantuṃ tvaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.026c: śāpe tvayi mayotsṛṣṭe tapasaś ca vyayo bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:017.027a: yadi tv asti mayā kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:017.027c: tena hy ayonijā sādhvī bhaveyaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sutā
GE09ram_07_u:017.028a: evam uktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalantaṃ vai hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:017.028c: papāta ca divo divyā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:017.029a: pūrvaṃ krodhahataḥ śatrur yayāsau nihatas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:017.031a: eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvam āsīt kṛte yuge
GE09ram_07_u:018.001a: praviṣṭāyāaṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.002a: tato maruttaṃ nṛpatiṃ yajantaṃ saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.002c: uśīrabījam āsādya dadarśa sa tu rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.003a: saṃvarto nāma brahmarṣir bhrātā sākṣād bṛhaspateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.003c: yājayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvair brahmagaṇair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.004a: dṛṣṭvā devās tu tad rakṣo varadānena durjayam
GE09ram_07_u:018.004c: tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ samāpannās tasya dharṣaṇabhīravaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.005a: indro mayūraḥ saṃvṛtto dharmarājas tu vāyasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.006a: taṃ ca rājānam āsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.006c: prāha yuddhaṃ prayacceti nirjito 'smīti vā vada
GE09ram_07_u:018.007a: tato marutto nṛpatiḥ ko bhavān ity uvāca tam
GE09ram_07_u:018.007c: avahāsaṃ tato muktvā rākṣaso vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:018.009a: triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ so 'sti yo na jānāti me balam
GE09ram_07_u:018.009c: bhrātaraṃ yena nirjitya vimānam idam āhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:018.010a: tato marutto nṛpatis taṃ rākṣasam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:018.010c: dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.012a: kiṃ tvaṃ prāk kevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavān varam
GE09ram_07_u:018.012c: śrutapūrvaṃ hi na mayā yādṛśaṃ bhāṣase svayam
GE09ram_07_u:018.013a: tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃś ca sa pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.013c: raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvarto mārgam āvṛṇot
GE09ram_07_u:018.014a: so 'bravīt snehasaṃyuktaṃ maruttaṃ taṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.014c: śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ saṃprahāro na te kṣamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.015a: māheśvaram idaṃ satram asamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet
GE09ram_07_u:018.015c: dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krūratvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.016a: saṃśayaś ca raṇe nityaṃ rākṣasaś caiṣa durjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.016c: sa nivṛtto guror vākyān maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.017a: tatas taṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayām āsa vai śukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.017c: rāvaṇo jitavāṃś ceti harṣān nādaṃ ca muktavān
GE09ram_07_u:018.018a: tān bhakṣayitvā tatrasthān maharṣīn yajñam āgatān
GE09ram_07_u:018.018c: vitṛpto rudhirais teṣāṃ punaḥ saṃprayayau mahīm
GE09ram_07_u:018.019a: rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sendrāś caiva divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.019c: tataḥ svāṃ yonim āsādya tāni sattvāny athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:018.021a: mama netrasahasraṃ yat tat te barhe bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:018.022a: nīlāḥ kila purā barhā mayūrāṇāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:018.022c: surādhipād varaṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitratām
GE09ram_07_u:018.023c: pakṣiṃs tavāsmi suprītaḥ prītasya ca vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE09ram_07_u:018.024a: yathānye vividhai rogaiḥ pīḍyante prāṇino mayā
GE09ram_07_u:018.024c: te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.025a: mṛtyutas te bhayaṃ nāsti varān mama vihaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:018.025c: yāvat tvāṃ na vadhiṣyanti narās tāvad bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:018.026a: ye ca madviṣayasthās tu mānavāḥ kṣudhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.026c: tvayi bhukte tu tṛptās te bhaviṣyanti sabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.029c: prāpsyase cātulāṃ prītim etan me prītilakṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:018.030a: haṃsānāṃ hi purā rāma na varṇaḥ sarvapāṇḍuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.031c: hairaṇyaṃ saṃprayacchāmi varṇaṃ prītis tavāpy aham
GE09ram_07_u:018.032a: sadravyaṃ ca śiro nityaṃ bhaviṣyati tavākṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:018.032c: eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:018.033a: evaṃ dattvā varāṃs tebhyas tasmin yajñotsave surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:018.033c: nivṛtte saha rājñā vai punaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.001a: atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.002c: abravīd rākṣasendras tu yuddhaṃ me dīyatām iti
GE09ram_07_u:019.003a: nirjitāḥ smeti vā brūta eṣo hi mama niścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.003c: anyathā kurvatām evaṃ mokṣo vo nopapadyate
GE09ram_07_u:019.004a: tatas tu bahavaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivā dharmaṇiścayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.004c: nirjitāḥ smety abhāṣanta jñātvā varabalaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.005a: duṣyantaḥ suratho gādhir gayo rājā purūravāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.005c: ete sarve 'bruvaṃs tāta nirjitāḥ smeti pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.007a: prāha rājānam āsādya yuddhaṃ me saṃpradīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:019.007c: nirjito 'smīti vā brūhi mamaitad iha śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:019.009a: atha pūrvaṃ śrutārthena sajjitaṃ sumahad dhi yat
GE09ram_07_u:019.011a: tad rāvaṇabalaṃ prāpya balaṃ tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.011c: prāṇaśyata tadā rājan havyaṃ hutam ivānale
GE09ram_07_u:019.012a: so 'paśyata narendras tu naśyamānaṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:019.014a: tato bāṇaśatāny aṣṭau pātayām āsa mūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:019.015a: tasya bāṇāḥ patantas te cakrire na kṣataṃ kva cit
GE09ram_07_u:019.016c: talena bhihato mūrdhni sa rathān nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:019.017a: sa rājā patito bhūmau vihvalāṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.018c: kim idānīṃ tvayā prāptaṃ phalaṃ māṃ prati yudhyatā
GE09ram_07_u:019.019a: trailokye nāsti yo dvandvaṃ mama dadyān narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:019.019c: śaṅke pramatto bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:019.020a: tasyaivaṃ bruvato rājā mandāsur vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:019.020c: kiṃ śakyam iha kartuṃ vai yat kālo duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.021a: na hy ahaṃ nirjito rakṣas tvayā cātmapraśaṃsinā
GE09ram_07_u:019.021c: kāleneha vipanno 'haṃ hetubhūtas tu me bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:019.022a: kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ prāṇaparikṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:019.023a: yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi me sukṛtaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:019.023c: yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyak tathā satyaṃ vaco 'stu me
GE09ram_07_u:019.024a: utpatsyate kule hy asminn ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:019.024c: rājā paramatejasvī yas te prāṇān hariṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:019.025c: tasminn udāhṛte śāpe puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
GE09ram_07_u:019.026a: tataḥ sa rājā rājendra gataḥ sthānaṃ triviṣṭapam
GE09ram_07_u:019.026c: svargate ca nṛpe rāma rākṣasaḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_07_u:020.004c: tvayā samaramardaiś ca bhṛśaṃ hi paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.005a: kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tāvat te śrotavyaṃ śroṣyase yadi
GE09ram_07_u:020.006a: kim ayaṃ vadhyate lokas tvayāvadhyena daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.006c: hata eva hy ayaṃ loko yadā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.007c: lokam enaṃ vicitrārthaṃ yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.008a: kva cid vāditranṛttāni sevyante muditair janaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.009c: mohenāyaṃ jano dhvastaḥ kleśaṃ svaṃ nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_07_u:020.010a: tat kim evaṃ parikliśya lokaṃ mohanirākṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:020.010c: jita eva tvayā saumya martyaloko na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.011a: evam uktas tu laṅkeśo dīpyamāna ivaujasā
GE09ram_07_u:020.013a: tato lokatrayaṃ jitvā sthāpya nāgān surān vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:020.014c: kva khalv idānīṃ mārgeṇa tvayānena gamiṣyate
GE09ram_07_u:020.015a: ayaṃ khalu sudurgamyaḥ pitṛrājñaḥ puraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:020.016a: sa tu śāradameghābhaṃ muktvā hāsaṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.016c: uvāca kṛtam ity eva vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:020.017c: gacchāmi dakṣiṇām āśāṃ yatra sūryātmajo nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.018a: mayā hi bhagavan krodhāt pratijñātaṃ raṇārthinā
GE09ram_07_u:020.020a: evam uktvā daśagrīvo muniṃ tam abhivādya ca
GE09ram_07_u:020.020c: prayayau dakṣiṇām āśāṃ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.021a: nāradas tu mahātejā muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.021c: cintayām āsa viprendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.022a: yena lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ kliśyante sacarācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.022c: kṣīṇe cāyuṣi dharme ca sa kālo hiṃsyate katham
GE09ram_07_u:020.023a: yasya nityaṃ trayo lokā vidravanti bhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:020.024a: yo vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛte duṣkṛte yathā
GE09ram_07_u:020.024c: trailokyaṃ vijitaṃ yena taṃ kathaṃ nu vijeṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:020.025a: aparaṃ kiṃ nu kṛtvaivaṃ vidhānaṃ saṃvidhāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:021.001c: ākhyātuṃ tad yathāvṛttaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:021.002a: apaśyat sa yamaṃ tatra devam agnipuraskṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:021.003a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptaṃ maharṣiṃ tatra nāradam
GE09ram_07_u:021.003c: abravīt sukham āsīnam arghyam āvedya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.004a: kaccit kṣemaṃ nu devarṣe kaccid dharmo na naśyati
GE09ram_07_u:021.005a: abravīt tu tadā vākyaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.006c: upayāti vaśaṃ netuṃ vikramais tvāṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_07_u:021.008c: dadṛśe divyam āyāntaṃ vimānaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.009a: taṃ deśaṃ prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.010a: sa tv apaśyan mahābāhur daśagrīvas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.010c: prāṇinaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma bhuñjānāṃś caiva duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:021.011a: tatas tān vadhyamānāṃs tu karmabhir duṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.011c: rāvaṇo mocayām āsa vikrameṇa balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:021.013a: te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlair mudgaraiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.014c: puṣpakasya babhañjus te śīghraṃ madhukarā iva
GE09ram_07_u:021.016c: ayudhyanta mahāvīryāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.018a: anyonyaṃ ca mahābhāgā jaghnuḥ praharaṇair yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:021.018c: yamasya ca mahat sainyaṃ rākṣasasya ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.019a: amātyāṃs tāṃs tu saṃtyajya rākṣasasya mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.022a: tāṃs tu sarvān samākṣipya tad astram apahatya ca
GE09ram_07_u:021.022c: jaghnus te rākṣasaṃ ghoram ekaṃ śatasahasrakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.023a: parivārya ca taṃ sarve śailaṃ meghotkarā iva
GE09ram_07_u:021.023c: bhindipālaiś ca śūlaiś ca nirucchvāsam akārayan
GE09ram_07_u:021.025a: tataḥ sa kārmukī bāṇī pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:021.026a: tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam astraṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
GE09ram_07_u:021.026c: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tān uktvā tac cāpaṃ vyapakarṣata
GE09ram_07_u:021.027a: jvālāmālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyādānugato raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:021.027c: mukto gulmān drumāṃś caiva bhasmakṛtvā pradhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:021.028a: te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyā vaivasvatasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:021.028c: raṇe tasmin nipatitā dāvadagdhā nagā iva
GE09ram_07_u:021.029a: tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.001a: sa tu tasya mahānādaṃ śrutvā vaivasvato yamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.001c: śatruṃ vijayinaṃ mene svabalasya ca saṃkṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:022.002a: sa tu yodhān hatān matvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.003a: tasya sūto rathaṃ divyam upasthāpya mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:022.003c: sthitaḥ sa ca mahātejā āruroha mahāratham
GE09ram_07_u:022.005a: kāladaṇḍaś ca pārśvastho mūrtimān syandane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.006a: tato lokās trayas trastāḥ kampante ca divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.007a: dṛṣṭvā tu te taṃ vikṛtaṃ rathaṃ mṛtyusamanvitam
GE09ram_07_u:022.008c: nātra yoddhuṃ samarthāḥ sma ity uktvā vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.009a: sa tu taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ lokabhayāvaham
GE09ram_07_u:022.009c: nākṣubhyata tadā rakṣo vyathā caivāsya nābhavat
GE09ram_07_u:022.010a: sa tu rāvaṇam āsādya visṛjañ śaktitomarān
GE09ram_07_u:022.011a: rāvaṇas tu sthitaḥ svasthaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:022.013c: saptarātraṃ kṛte saṃkhye na bhagno vijito 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:022.015a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.016a: saṃvarta iva lokānām abhavad yudhyatos tayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.016c: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pretānām īśvarasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:022.017a: rākṣasendras tataḥ kruddhaś cāpam āyamya saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:022.017c: nirantaram ivākāśaṃ kurvan bāṇān mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:022.018a: mṛtyuṃ caturbhir viśikhaiḥ sūtaṃ saptabhir ardayat
GE09ram_07_u:022.020c: krodhajaṃ pāvakaṃ dīptaṃ didhakṣantaṃ ripor balam
GE09ram_07_u:022.021c: muñca māṃ deva śīghraṃ tvaṃ nihanmi samare ripum
GE09ram_07_u:022.022a: narakaḥ śambaro vṛtraḥ śambhuḥ kārtasvaro balī
GE09ram_07_u:022.022c: namucir virocanaś caiva tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau
GE09ram_07_u:022.023a: ete cānye ca bahavo balavanto durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.023c: vinipannā mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kā cintāsmin niśācare
GE09ram_07_u:022.024a: muñca māṃ sādhu dharmajña yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:022.024c: na hi kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭo muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_07_u:022.025a: balaṃ mama na khalv etan maryādaiṣā nisargataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.025c: saṃspṛṣṭo hi mayā kaś cin na jīved iti niścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.026a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:022.026c: abravīt tatra taṃ mṛtyumayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:022.027c: kāladaṇḍam amoghaṃ taṃ tolayām āsa pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:022.029a: darśanād eva yaḥ prāṇān prāṇinām uparudhyati
GE09ram_07_u:022.029c: kiṃ punas tāḍanād vāpi pīḍanād vāpi dehinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.030a: sa jvālāparivāras tu pibann iva niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:022.031a: tato vidudruvuḥ sarve sattvās tasmād raṇājirāt
GE09ram_07_u:022.031c: surāś ca kṣubhitā dṛṣṭvā kāladaṇḍodyataṃ yamam
GE09ram_07_u:022.032a: tasmin prahartukāme tu daṇḍam udyamya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:022.034a: varaḥ khalu mayā dattas tasya tridaśapuṃgava
GE09ram_07_u:022.034c: tat tvayā nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.035a: amogho hy eṣa sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ vinipātane
GE09ram_07_u:022.036a: tan na khalv eṣa te saumya pātyo rākṣasamūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:022.036c: na hy asmin patite kaś cin muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_07_u:022.037a: yadi hy asmin nipatite na mriyetaiṣa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.038c: satyaṃ mama kuruṣvedaṃ lokāṃs tvaṃ samavekṣya ca
GE09ram_07_u:022.039a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā pratyuvāca yamas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:022.039c: eṣa vyāvartito daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇur bhavān hi naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.040a: kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ raṇagatena hi
GE09ram_07_u:022.040c: yan mayā yan na hantavyo rākṣaso varadarpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.041a: eṣa tasmāt praṇaśyāmi darśanād asya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.042a: daśagrīvas tu taṃ jitvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:022.043c: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo nāradaś ca mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.001a: sa tu jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṃgavam
GE09ram_07_u:023.001c: rāvaṇas tu jayaślāghī svasahāyān dadarśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:023.002c: puṣpakaṃ bhejire sarve sāntvitā ravaṇena ha
GE09ram_07_u:023.003a: tato rasātalaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ payaso nidhim
GE09ram_07_u:023.004a: sa tu bhogavatīṃ gatvā purīṃ vāsukipālitām
GE09ram_07_u:023.004c: sthāpya nāgān vaśe kṛtvā yayau maṇimatīṃ purīm
GE09ram_07_u:023.006a: te tu sarve suvikrāntā daiteyā balaśālinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.007a: teṣāṃ tu yudhyamānānāṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.007c: na cānyatarayos tatra vijayo vā kṣayo 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:023.010a: na hy ayaṃ rāvaṇo yuddhe śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.010c: na bhavantaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ śakyāḥ sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.011a: rākṣasasya sakhitvaṃ vai bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate
GE09ram_07_u:023.011c: avibhaktā hi sarvārthāḥ suhṛdāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.013c: svapurān nirviśeṣaṃ ca pūjāṃ prāpto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.014a: sa tūpadhārya māyānāṃ śatam ekonam ātmavān
GE09ram_07_u:023.015c: taṃ vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityāṃś catuḥśatam
GE09ram_07_u:023.017a: kṣarantīṃ ca payo nityaṃ surabhiṃ gām avasthitām
GE09ram_07_u:023.018e: amṛtaṃ yatra cotpannaṃ surā cāpi surāśinām
GE09ram_07_u:023.019a: yāṃ bruvanti narā loke surabhiṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.019c: pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ paramādbhutām
GE09ram_07_u:023.021a: tato hatvā balādhyakṣān samare taiś ca tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.021c: abravīt kva gato yo vo rājā śīghraṃ nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:023.022a: yuddhārthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptas tasya yuddhaṃ pradīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:023.022c: vada vā na bhayaṃ te 'sti nirjito 'smīti sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.023c: putrāḥ pautrāś ca niṣkrāman gauś ca puṣkara eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:023.024a: te tu vīryaguṇopetā balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.026c: vāruṇaṃ tad balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kṣaṇena vinipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:023.027a: samīkṣya svabalaṃ saṃkhye varuṇasyā sutās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:023.028a: mahītalagatās te tu rāvaṇaṃ dṛśya puṣpake
GE09ram_07_u:023.029a: mahad āsīt tatas teṣāṃ tulyaṃ sthānam avāpya tat
GE09ram_07_u:023.030a: tatas te rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvakasaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.031a: tato mahodaraḥ kruddho rājānaṃ dṛśya dharṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:023.032a: tena teṣāṃ hayā ye ca kāmagāḥ pavanopamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.032c: mahodareṇa gadayā hatās te prayayuḥ kṣitim
GE09ram_07_u:023.033a: teṣāṃ varuṇasūnūnāṃ hatvā yodhān hayāṃś ca tān
GE09ram_07_u:023.033c: mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathān prekṣya tān sthitān
GE09ram_07_u:023.034a: te tu teṣāṃ rathāḥ sāśvāḥ saha sārathibhir varaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.035a: te tu tyaktvā rathān putrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.035c: ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvān na vivyathuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.037a: tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgnir iva viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.038c: paṭṭasāṃś caiva śaktīś ca śataghnīs tomarāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:023.038e: pātayām āsa durdharṣas teṣām upari viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.039a: atha viddhās tu te vīrā viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.040a: tato rakṣo mahānādaṃ muktvā hanti sma vāruṇān
GE09ram_07_u:023.041a: tatas te vimukhāḥ sarve patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_07_u:023.041c: raṇāt svapuruṣaiḥ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇy eva praveśitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.042a: tān abravīt tato rakṣo varuṇāya nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:023.042c: rāvaṇaṃ cābravīn mantrī prabhāso nāma vāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.043c: gāndharvaṃ varuṇaḥ śrotuṃ yaṃ tvam āhvayase yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:023.044a: tat kiṃ tava vṛthā vīra pariśrāmya gate nṛpe
GE09ram_07_u:023.044c: ye tu saṃnihitā vīrāḥ kumārās te parājitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.045a: rākṣasendras tu tac chrutvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:023.045c: harṣān nādaṃ vimuñcan vai niṣkrānto varuṇālayāt
GE09ram_07_u:023.046a: āgatas tu pathā yena tenaiva vinivṛtya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.002a: darśanīyāṃ hi yāṃ rakṣaḥ kanyāṃ strīṃ vātha paśyati
GE09ram_07_u:024.003c: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca kanyā jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.007a: kā cid dadhyau suduḥkhārtā hanyād api hi mām ayam
GE09ram_07_u:024.007c: smṛtvā mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn putrān vai śvaśurān api
GE09ram_07_u:024.008a: kathaṃ nu khalu me putraḥ kariṣyati mayā vinā
GE09ram_07_u:024.008c: kathaṃ mātā kathaṃ bhrātā nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
GE09ram_07_u:024.009a: hā kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi bhartāraṃ daivataṃ vinā
GE09ram_07_u:024.009c: mṛtyo prasīda yāce tvāṃ naya māṃ yamasādanam
GE09ram_07_u:024.010a: kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ dehāntare purā
GE09ram_07_u:024.011a: na khalv idānīṃ paśyāmi duḥkhasyāntam ihātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.011c: aho dhin mānuṣāṃl lokān nāsti khalv adhamaḥ paraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.012a: yad durbalā balavatā bāndhavā rāvaṇena me
GE09ram_07_u:024.013c: aho durvṛttam ātmānaṃ svayam eva na budhyate
GE09ram_07_u:024.015a: yasmād eṣa parakhyāsu strīṣu rajyati durmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.015c: tasmād dhi strīkṛtenaiva vadhaṃ prāpsyati vāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.016a: śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu tadā hatatejāḥ suniṣprabha
GE09ram_07_u:024.019c: abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre vaktum arhasi me drutam
GE09ram_07_u:024.020c: hatāsmi vidhavā rājaṃs tvayā balavatā kṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:024.021a: ete viryāt tvayā rājan daityā vinihatā raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:024.022a: tatra me nihato bhartā garīyāñ jīvitād api
GE09ram_07_u:024.022c: sa tvayā dayitas tatra bhrātrā śatrusamena vai
GE09ram_07_u:024.023a: yā tvayāsmi hatā rājan svayam eveha bandhunā
GE09ram_07_u:024.023c: duḥkhaṃ vaidhavyaśabdaṃ ca dattaṃ bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:024.024a: nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyo jāmātā samareṣv api
GE09ram_07_u:024.024c: taṃ nihatya raṇe rājan svayam eva na lajjase
GE09ram_07_u:024.025a: evam uktas tayā rakṣo bhaginyā krośamānayā
GE09ram_07_u:024.025c: abravīt sāntvayitvā tāṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.026a: alaṃ vatse viṣādena na bhetavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.027a: yuddhe pramatto vyākṣipto jayakāṅkṣī kṣipañ śarān
GE09ram_07_u:024.027c: nāvagacchāmi yuddheṣu svān parān vāpy ahaṃ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:024.027e: tenāsau nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.028a: asmin kāle tu yat prāptaṃ tat kariṣyāmi te hitam
GE09ram_07_u:024.029c: prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_07_u:024.030a: tatra mātṛṣvasuḥ putro bhrātā tava kharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.030c: bhaviṣyati sadā kurvan yad vakṣyasi vacaḥ svayam
GE09ram_07_u:024.031a: śīghraṃ gacchatv ayaṃ śūro daṇḍakān parirakṣitum
GE09ram_07_u:024.032a: sa hi śapto vanoddeśaḥ kruddhenośanasā purā
GE09ram_07_u:024.032c: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.033a: evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyaṃ tasyādideśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:024.034a: sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛto rākṣasair ghoradarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:024.035a: sa tatra kārayām āsa rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_07_u:024.035c: sā ca śūrpaṇakhā prītā nyavasad daṇḍakāvane
GE09ram_07_u:025.001a: sa tu dattvā daśagrīvo vanaṃ ghoraṃ kharasya tat
GE09ram_07_u:025.002a: tato nikumbhilā nāma laṅkāyāḥ kānanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:025.003c: dadarśa viṣṭhitaṃ yajñaṃ saṃpradīptam iva śriyā
GE09ram_07_u:025.005c: abravīt kim idaṃ vatsa vartate tad bravīhi me
GE09ram_07_u:025.006a: uśanā tv abravīt tatra gurur yajñasamṛddhaye
GE09ram_07_u:025.007a: aham ākhyāmi te rājañ śrūyatāṃ sarvam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:025.007c: yajñās te sapta putreṇa prāptāḥ subahuvistarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.008c: rājasūyas tathā yajño gomedho vaiṣṇavas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:025.009a: māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ sudurlabhe
GE09ram_07_u:025.009c: varāṃs te labdhavān putraḥ sākṣāt paśupater iha
GE09ram_07_u:025.010c: māyāṃ ca tāmasīṃ nāma yayā saṃpadyate tamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.011c: prayuddhasya gatiḥ śakyā na hi jñātuṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.012a: akṣayāv iṣudhī bāṇaiś cāpaṃ cāpi sudurjayam
GE09ram_07_u:025.012c: astraṃ ca balavat saumya śatruvidhvaṃsanaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:025.013a: etān sarvān varāṃl labdhvā putras te 'yaṃ daśānana
GE09ram_07_u:025.013c: adya yajñasamāptau ca tvatpratīkṣaḥ sthito aham
GE09ram_07_u:025.014a: tato 'bravīd daśagrīvo na śobhanam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:025.015a: ehīdānīṃ kṛtaṃ yad dhi tad akartuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_07_u:025.015c: āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svam eva bhavanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:025.018a: vibhīṣaṇas tu tā nārīr dṛṣṭvā śokasamākulāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.018c: tasya tāṃ ca matiṃ jñātvā dharmātmā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:025.020c: tvām atikramya madhunā rājan kumbhīnasī hṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:025.021a: rāvaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ nāvagacchāmi kiṃ tv idam
GE09ram_07_u:025.021c: ko vāyaṃ yas tvayākhyāto madhur ity eva nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.022a: vibhīṣaṇas tu saṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:025.022c: śrūyatām asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:025.024a: pitur jyeṣṭho jananyāś ca asmākaṃ tv āryako 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:025.025c: bhavaty asmākam eṣā vai bhrātṝṇāṃ dharmataḥ svasā
GE09ram_07_u:025.026a: sā hṛtā madhunā rājan rākṣasena balīyasā
GE09ram_07_u:025.027c: dharṣayitvā hṛtā rājan guptā hy antaḥpure tava
GE09ram_07_u:025.028a: śrutvā tv etan mahārāja kṣāntam eva hato na saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.028c: yasmād avaśyaṃ dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi dātṛbhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.028e: asminn evābhisaṃprāptaṃ loke viditam astu te
GE09ram_07_u:025.029c: kalpyatāṃ me rathaḥ śīghraṃ śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu ca
GE09ram_07_u:025.030a: bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaś ca ye ca mukhyā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.031a: adya taṃ samare hatvā madhuṃ rāvaṇanirbhayam
GE09ram_07_u:025.032a: tato vijitya tridivaṃ vaśe sthāpya puraṃdaram
GE09ram_07_u:025.034a: indrajit tv agrataḥ sainyaṃ sainikān parigṛhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:025.034c: rāvaṇo madhyataḥ śūraḥ kumbhakarṇaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.035a: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā laṅkāyāṃ dharmam ācarat
GE09ram_07_u:025.035c: te tu sarve mahābhāgā yayur madhupuraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:025.036a: rathair nāgaiḥ kharair uṣṭrair hayair dīptair mahoragaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.037a: daityāś ca śataśas tatra kṛtavairāḥ suraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:025.038a: sa tu gatvā madhupuraṃ praviśya ca daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.038c: na dadarśa madhuṃ tatra bhaginīṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_07_u:025.039a: sā prahvā prāñjalir bhūtvā śirasā pādayor gatā
GE09ram_07_u:025.040a: tāṃ samutthāpayām āsa na bhetavyam iti bruvan
GE09ram_07_u:025.040c: rāvaṇo rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ cāpi karavāṇi te
GE09ram_07_u:025.041a: sābravīd yadi me rājan prasannas tvaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:025.041c: bhartāraṃ na mamehādya hantum arhasi mānada
GE09ram_07_u:025.042a: satyavāg bhava rājendra mām avekṣasva yācatīm
GE09ram_07_u:025.042c: tvayā hy uktaṃ mahābāho na bhetavyam iti svayam
GE09ram_07_u:025.043a: rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ svasāraṃ tatra saṃsthitām
GE09ram_07_u:025.043c: kva cāsau tava bhartā vai mama śīghraṃ nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:025.044a: saha tena gamiṣyāmi suralokaṃ jayāya vai
GE09ram_07_u:025.045a: ity uktā sā prasuptaṃ taṃ samutthāpya niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:025.046a: eṣa prāpto daśagrīvo mama bhrātā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:025.047a: tad asya tvaṃ sahāyārthaṃ sabandhur gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_07_u:025.048a: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tathety āha madhur vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.001a: sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:026.003c: padminībhiś ca phullābhir mandākinyā jalair api
GE09ram_07_u:026.007a: geyāt puṣpasamṛddhyā ca śaityād vāyor guṇair gireḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.011a: yasya vaktraṃ śaśinibhaṃ bhruvau cāpanibhe śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:026.013a: kva gacchasi varārohe kāṃ siddhiṃ bhajase svayam
GE09ram_07_u:026.017a: madviśiṣṭaḥ pumān ko 'nyaḥ śakro viṣṇur athāśvinau
GE09ram_07_u:026.017c: mām atītya hi yasya tvaṃ yāsi bhīru na śobhanam
GE09ram_07_u:026.018a: viśrama tvaṃ pṛthuśroṇi śilātalam idaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:026.018c: trailokye yaḥ prabhuś caiva tulyo mama na vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:026.019a: tad eṣa prāñjaliḥ prahvo yācate tvāṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.019c: yaḥ prabhuś cāpi bhartā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām
GE09ram_07_u:026.020c: prasīda nārhase vaktum īdṛśaṃ tvaṃ hi me guruḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.021a: anyebhyo 'pi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ yadi
GE09ram_07_u:026.021c: dharmataś ca snuṣā te 'haṃ tattvam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:026.022c: sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatas tvaṃ me snuṣā bhaveḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.023a: bāḍham ity eva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇam uttaram
GE09ram_07_u:026.024a: putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇair bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya te
GE09ram_07_u:026.024c: khyāto yas triṣu lokeṣu nalakūbara ity asau
GE09ram_07_u:026.025a: dharmato yo bhaved vipraḥ kṣatriyo vīryato bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:026.025c: krodhād yaś ca bhaved agniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhāsamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.026c: tam uddiśya ca me sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:026.027a: yasya tasya hi nānyasya bhāvo māṃ prati tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:026.027c: tena satyena māṃ rājan moktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE09ram_07_u:026.028a: sa hi tiṣṭhati dharmātmā sāmprataṃ matsamutsukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.028c: tan na vighnaṃ sutasyeha kartum arhasi muñca mām
GE09ram_07_u:026.029c: mānanīyo mayā hi tvaṃ lālanīyā tathāsmi te
GE09ram_07_u:026.030a: evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ rambhāṃ tāṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.030c: nirbhartsya rākṣaso mohāt pratigṛhya balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:026.033a: tadavasthāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.033c: abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre pādayoḥ patitāsi me
GE09ram_07_u:026.034a: sā tu niśvasamānā ca vepamānātha sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.035a: eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāpto gantuṃ triviṣṭapam
GE09ram_07_u:026.036c: gṛhītvā tena pṛṣṭāsmi kasya tvam iti rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:026.037a: mayā tu sarvaṃ yat satyaṃ tad dhi tasmai niveditam
GE09ram_07_u:026.038a: yācyamāno mayā deva snuṣā te 'ham iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:026.038c: tat sarvaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā balāt tenāsmi dharṣitā
GE09ram_07_u:026.039a: evaṃ tvam aparādhaṃ me kṣantum arhasi mānada
GE09ram_07_u:026.039c: na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ saumya striyāś ca puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:026.040a: evaṃ śrutvā tu saṃkruddhas tadā vaiśvaraṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.040c: dharṣaṇāṃ tāṃ parāṃ śrutvā dhyānaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:026.041a: tasya tat karma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.043a: akāmā tena yasmāt tvaṃ balād bhadre pradharṣitā
GE09ram_07_u:026.043c: tasmāt sa yuvatīm anyāṃ nākāmām upayāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:026.044a: yadā tv akāmāṃ kāmārto dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:026.044c: mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:026.045c: devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
GE09ram_07_u:026.046c: jñātvā lokagatiṃ sarvāṃ tasya mṛtyuṃ ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:026.047a: śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvas taṃ śāpaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:027.003a: śrutvā tu rāvaṇaṃ prāptam indraḥ saṃcalitāsanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.003c: abravīt tatra tān devān sarvān eva samāgatān
GE09ram_07_u:027.004a: ādityān savasūn rudrān viśvān sādhyān marudgaṇān
GE09ram_07_u:027.005a: evam uktās tu śakreṇa devāḥ śakrasamā yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:027.006a: sa tu dīnaḥ paritrasto mahendro rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:027.006c: viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgatya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:027.007c: asau hi balavān rakṣo yuddhārtham abhivartate
GE09ram_07_u:027.008a: varapradānād balavān na khalv anyena hetunā
GE09ram_07_u:027.008c: tac ca satyaṃ hi kartavyaṃ vākyaṃ deva prajāpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.009a: tad yathā namucir vṛtro balir narakaśambarau
GE09ram_07_u:027.009c: tvan mataṃ samavaṣṭabhya yathā dagdhās tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:027.010a: na hy anyo deva devānām āpatsu sumahābala
GE09ram_07_u:027.010c: gatiḥ parāyaṇaṃ vāsti tvām ṛte puruṣottama
GE09ram_07_u:027.011a: tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.012a: tad ākhyāhi yathātattvaṃ devadeva mama svayam
GE09ram_07_u:027.013a: evam uktaḥ sa śakreṇa devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.013c: abravīn na paritrāsaḥ kāryas te śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_07_u:027.014a: na tāvad eṣa durvṛttaḥ śakyo daivatadānavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.015a: sarvathā tu mahat karma kariṣyati balotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.016a: bravīṣi yat tu māṃ śakra saṃyuge yotsyasīti ha
GE09ram_07_u:027.017a: anihatya ripuṃ viṣṇur na hi pratinivartate
GE09ram_07_u:027.017c: durlabhaś caiṣa kāmo 'dya varam āsādya rākṣase
GE09ram_07_u:027.019a: aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:027.023c: akampano nikumbhaś ca śukaḥ sāraṇa eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:027.026a: sa hi devagaṇān sarvān nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.027a: etasminn antare śūro vasūnām aṣṭamo vasuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.028a: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:027.029a: tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā devāṃs tān samare sthitān
GE09ram_07_u:027.030a: surās tu rākṣasān ghorān mahāvīryān svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:027.031a: etasminn antare śūraḥ sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.032a: devānāṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.033a: te mahābāṇavarṣaiś ca śūlaiḥ prāsaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.033c: pīḍyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhan samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.035a: saṃvṛtaḥ svair anīkais tu praharantaṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:027.036a: sumattayos tayor āsīd yuddhaṃ loke sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:027.038a: hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya rathaṃ bāṇaśataiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:027.038c: gadāṃ tasya vadhārthāya vasur jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:027.040a: tasya mūrdhani solkābhā patantī ca tadā babhau
GE09ram_07_u:027.041a: tasya naivāsthi kāyo vā na māṃsaṃ dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_07_u:027.042a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṃkhye rākṣasās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.001c: vidrutaṃ cāpi svaṃ sainyaṃ lakṣayitvārditaṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.002a: tataḥ sa balavān kruddho rāvaṇasya suto yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:028.003c: abhidudrāva senāṃ tāṃ vanāny agnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_07_u:028.004c: vidudruvur diśaḥ sarvā devās tasya ca darśanāt
GE09ram_07_u:028.005a: na tatrāvasthitaḥ kaś cid raṇe tasya yuyutsataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.006a: na bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ nivartadhvaṃ raṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:028.006c: eṣa gacchati me putro yuddhārtham aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.007a: tataḥ śakrasuto devo jayanta iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.008a: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacīsutam
GE09ram_07_u:028.009a: teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahad abhūt sadṛśaṃ devarakṣasām
GE09ram_07_u:028.011a: śacīsutas tv api tathā jayantas tasya sārathim
GE09ram_07_u:028.011c: taṃ caiva rāvaṇiṃ kruddhaḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire
GE09ram_07_u:028.013a: tataḥ pragṛhya śastrāṇi sāravanti mahānti ca
GE09ram_07_u:028.014a: tataḥ pravyathitā lokāḥ saṃjajñe ca tamo mahat
GE09ram_07_u:028.015a: tatas tad daivatabalaṃ samantāt taṃ śacīsutam
GE09ram_07_u:028.015c: bahuprakāram asvasthaṃ tatra tatra sma dhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:028.016a: nābhyajānaṃs tadānyonyaṃ śatrūn vā daivatāni vā
GE09ram_07_u:028.017a: etasminn antare śūraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:028.018a: gṛhītvā taṃ tu naptāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa mahodadhim
GE09ram_07_u:028.018c: mātāmaho 'ryakas tasya paulomī yena sā śacī
GE09ram_07_u:028.020a: rāvaṇis tv atha saṃhṛṣṭo balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.020c: abhyadhāvata devāṃs tān mumoca ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:028.021a: dṛṣṭvā praṇāśaṃ putrasya rāvaṇeś cāpi vikramam
GE09ram_07_u:028.022a: sa tu divyo mahābhīmaḥ sajja eva mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.023a: tato meghā rathe tasmiṃs taḍidvanto mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.025a: rudrair vasubhir ādityaiḥ sādhyaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.026a: nirgacchatas tu śakrasya paruṣaṃ pavano vavau
GE09ram_07_u:028.026c: bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cāsīn maholkāś ca prapedire
GE09ram_07_u:028.030a: putraṃ taṃ vārayitvāsau svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.031a: tato yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tu surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:028.032c: nājñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kenāpy ayudhyata
GE09ram_07_u:028.033c: yena kenaiva saṃrabdhas tāḍayām āsa vai surān
