GE09ram_07_u:028.034c: prayuddhas taiś ca saṃgrāme kṛttaḥ śastrair nirantaram
GE09ram_07_u:028.035a: tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ tridaśaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.036a: ke cid vinihatāḥ śastrair veṣṭanti sma mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:028.036c: vāhaneṣv avasaktāś ca sthitā evāpare raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:028.037a: rathān nāgān kharān uṣṭrān pannagāṃs turagāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:028.038a: tān samāliṅgya bāhubhyāṃ viṣṭabdhāḥ ke cid ucchritāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.038c: devais tu śastrasaṃviddhā mamrire ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:028.041c: nirīkṣya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ daivatair vinipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:028.043a: tataḥ śakro mahac cāpaṃ visphārya sumahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:028.043c: yasya visphāraghoṣeṇa svananti sma diśo daśa
GE09ram_07_u:028.044a: tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpam indro rāvaṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:028.046c: nājñāyata tadā kiṃ cit sarvaṃ hi tamasā vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:029.001a: tatas tamasi saṃjāte rākṣasā daivataiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:029.002a: tatas tu devasainyena rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:029.002c: daśāṃśaṃ sthāpitaṃ yuddhe śeṣaṃ nītaṃ yamakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:029.003a: tasmiṃs tu tamasā naddhe sarve te devarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.004a: indraś ca rāvaṇaś caiva rāvaṇiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.004c: tasmiṃs tamojālavṛte moham īyur na te trayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.005a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā balaṃ sarvaṃ nihataṃ rāvaṇo raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:029.005c: krodham abhyāgamat tīvraṃ mahānādaṃ ca muktavān
GE09ram_07_u:029.006a: krodhāt sūtaṃ ca durdharṣaḥ syandanastham uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:029.007a: adyaitāṃs tridaśān sarvān vikramaiḥ samare svayam
GE09ram_07_u:029.008a: aham indraṃ vadhiṣyāmi varuṇaṃ dhanadaṃ yamam
GE09ram_07_u:029.009a: viṣādo na ca kartavyaḥ śīghraṃ vāhaya me ratham
GE09ram_07_u:029.009c: dviḥ khalu tvāṃ bravīmy adya yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām
GE09ram_07_u:029.010a: ayaṃ sa nandanoddeśo yatra vartāmahe vayam
GE09ram_07_u:029.010c: naya mām adya tatra tvam udayo yatra parvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.011a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā turagān sa manojavān
GE09ram_07_u:029.012a: tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā śakro deveśvaras tadā
GE09ram_07_u:029.012c: rathasthaḥ samarasthāṃs tān devān vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:029.013a: surāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yat tāvan mama rocate
GE09ram_07_u:029.013c: jīvann eva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣo nigṛhyatām
GE09ram_07_u:029.014a: eṣa hy atibalaḥ sainye rathena pavanaujasā
GE09ram_07_u:029.015a: na hy eṣa hantuṃ śakyo 'dya varadānāt sunirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.015c: tad grahīṣyāmahe rakṣo yattā bhavata saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:029.016a: yathā baliṃ nigṛhyaitat trailokyaṃ bhujyate mayā
GE09ram_07_u:029.016c: evam etasya pāpasya nigraho mama rocate
GE09ram_07_u:029.017a: tato 'nyaṃ deśam āsthāya śakraḥ saṃtyajya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:029.020a: tataḥ śakro nirīkṣyātha praviṣṭaṃ taṃ balaṃ svakam
GE09ram_07_u:029.021c: hā hatāḥ smeti taṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ śakreṇa rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:029.023a: sa tāṃ praviśya māyāṃ tu dattāṃ gopatinā purā
GE09ram_07_u:029.024a: tataḥ sa devān saṃtyajya śakram evābhyayād drutam
GE09ram_07_u:029.024c: mahendraś ca mahātejā na dadarśa sutaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.025a: sa mātaliṃ hayāṃś caiva tāḍayitvā śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.026a: tataḥ śakro rathaṃ tyaktva visṛjya ca sa mātalim
GE09ram_07_u:029.027a: sa tu māyā balād rakṣaḥ saṃgrāme nābhyadṛśyata
GE09ram_07_u:029.028a: sa taṃ yadā pariśrāntam indraṃ mene 'tha rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.029a: taṃ dṛṣṭvātha balāt tasmin māyayāpahṛtaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:029.029c: mahendram amarāḥ sarve kiṃ nv etad iti cukruśuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.029e: na hi dṛśyati vidyāvān māyayā yena nīyate
GE09ram_07_u:029.030a: etasminn antare cāpi sarve suragaṇās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:029.031c: na śaśāka raṇe sthātuṃ na yoddhuṃ śastrapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.032a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pariśrāntaṃ prahārair jarjaracchavim
GE09ram_07_u:029.033a: āgaccha tāta gacchāvo nivṛttaṃ raṇakarma tat
GE09ram_07_u:029.033c: jitaṃ te viditaṃ bho 'stu svastho bhava gatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.034a: ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.034c: sa gṛhīto mayā śakro bhagnamānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.035a: yatheṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva trailokyaṃ nigṛhya ripum ojasā
GE09ram_07_u:029.035c: vṛthā te kiṃ śramaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ hi tava niṣphalam
GE09ram_07_u:029.036c: tac chrutvā rāvaṇer vākyaṃ svasthacetā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.037a: atha raṇavigatajvaraḥ prabhur; vijayam avāpya niśācarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.037c: bhavanam abhi tato jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ; svasutam avāpya ca vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:029.038a: atibalasadṛśaiḥ parākramais tair; mama kulamānavivardhanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:029.038c: yad amarasamavikrama tvayā; tridaśapatis tridaśāś ca nirjitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.039a: tvaritam upanayasva vāsavaṃ; nagaram ito vraja sainyasaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.039c: aham api tava gacchato drutaṃ; saha sacivair anuyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.040a: atha sa balavṛtaḥ savāhanas; tridaśapatiṃ parigṛhya rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:029.040c: svabhavanam upagamya rākṣaso; muditamanā visasarja rākṣasān
GE09ram_07_u:030.001c: prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya gatā laṅkāṃ surās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:030.003a: vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭo 'smi tava putrasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:030.004a: jitaṃ hi bhavatā sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:030.004c: kṛtā pratijñā saphalā prīto 'smi svasutena vai
GE09ram_07_u:030.005c: indrajit tv iti vikhyāto jagaty eṣa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:030.006c: yam āśritya tvayā rājan sthāpitās tridaśā vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:030.009c: nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ hi keṣāṃ cit prāṇināṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:030.011a: mameṣṭaṃ nityaśo deva havyaiḥ saṃpūjya pāvakam
GE09ram_07_u:030.012a: tasmiṃś ced asamāpte tu japyahome vibhāvasoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.012c: yudhyeyaṃ deva saṃgrāme tadā me syād vināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:030.013a: sarvo hi tapasā caiva vṛṇoty amaratāṃ pumān
GE09ram_07_u:030.013c: vikrameṇa mayā tv etad amaratvaṃ pravartitam
GE09ram_07_u:030.014a: evam astv iti taṃ prāha vākyaṃ devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.014c: muktaś cendrajitā śakro gatāś ca tridivaṃ surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.016a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.016c: śakrakrato kim utkaṇṭhāṃ karoṣi smara duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:030.017a: amarendra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ purā prabho
GE09ram_07_u:030.018a: tāsāṃ nāsti viśeṣo hi darśane lakṣaṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:030.019a: so 'haṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣārthaṃ striyam ekāṃ vinirmame
GE09ram_07_u:030.019c: yad yat prajānāṃ pratyaṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tat tad uddhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:030.020a: tato mayā rūpaguṇair ahalyā strī vinirmitā
GE09ram_07_u:030.020c: ahalyety eva ca mayā tasyā nāma pravartitam
GE09ram_07_u:030.021a: nirmitāyāṃ tu devendra tasyāṃ nāryāṃ surarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:030.022a: tvaṃ tu śakra tadā nārīṃ jānīṣe manasā prabho
GE09ram_07_u:030.023a: sā mayā nyāsabhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.023c: nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca sā
GE09ram_07_u:030.024a: tatas tasya parijñāya mayā sthairyaṃ mahāmuneḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.024c: jñātvā tapasi siddhiṃ ca patnyarthaṃ sparśitā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:030.025a: sa tayā saha dharmātmā ramate sma mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.025c: āsan nirāśā devās tu gautame dattayā tayā
GE09ram_07_u:030.026a: tvaṃ kruddhas tv iha kāmātmā gatvā tasyāśramaṃ muneḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.026c: dṛṣṭavāṃś ca tadā tāṃ strīṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:030.027a: sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kāmārtena samanyunā
GE09ram_07_u:030.027c: dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca tadā tena āśrame paramarṣiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:030.029a: yasmān me dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam
GE09ram_07_u:030.029c: tasmāt tvaṃ samare rājañ śatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:030.030a: ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.030c: mānuṣeṣv api sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.031c: tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayy ardhaṃ nipatiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:030.032a: na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati puraṃdara
GE09ram_07_u:030.033a: yaś ca yaś ca surendraḥ syād dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:030.033c: eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ity asau tvāṃ tadābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:030.034a: tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ vinirbhartsya so 'bravīt sumahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.035c: tasmād rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:030.036a: rūpaṃ ca tat prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti sudurlabham
GE09ram_07_u:030.037c: śāpotsargād dhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvam upāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:030.038a: tat smara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yat tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:030.038c: yena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatror gato nānyena vāsava
GE09ram_07_u:030.039a: śīghraṃ yajasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.039c: pāvitas tena yajñena yāsyasi tridivaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.040a: putraś ca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe
GE09ram_07_u:030.041a: etac chrutvā mahendras tu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam
GE09ram_07_u:030.041c: punas tridivam ākrāmad anvaśāsac ca devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:030.042a: etad indrajito rāma balaṃ yat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:030.042c: nirjitas tena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye ca kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.001a: tato rāmo mahātejā vismayāt punar eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:031.002a: bhagavan kiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsan dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:031.002c: dharṣaṇāṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.003c: bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiś ca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.004a: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.007a: tulya āsīn nṛpas tasya pratāpād vasuretasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.007c: arjuno nāma yasyāgniḥ śarakuṇḍe śayaḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:031.008a: tam eva divasaṃ so 'tha haihayādhipatir balī
GE09ram_07_u:031.008c: arjuno narmadāṃ rantuṃ gataḥ strībhiḥ saheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.009c: kvārjuno vo nṛpaḥ so 'dya śīghram ākhyātum arhatha
GE09ram_07_u:031.012a: śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇām arjunaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:031.013a: sa tam abhram ivāviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm
GE09ram_07_u:031.017c: paśyamānas tato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau
GE09ram_07_u:031.022c: iṣṭām iva varāṃ nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.026c: madbhayād anilo hy eṣa vāty asau susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.027a: iyaṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narma vardhinī
GE09ram_07_u:031.028a: tad bhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastrair nṛpair indrasamair yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:031.029a: te yūyam avagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ nṛṇām
GE09ram_07_u:031.033a: rākṣasendragajais tais tu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:031.034a: tatas te rākṣasāaḥ snātvā narmadāyā varāmbhasi
GE09ram_07_u:031.034c: uttīrya puṣpāṇy ājahrur balyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:031.036c: avatīrṇo nadīṃ snātuṃ gaṅgām iva mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.037a: tatra snātvā ca vidhivaj japtvā japyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:031.037c: narmadā salilāt tasmād uttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.038c: yatra yatra sa yāti sma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.038e: jāmbūnadamayaṃ liṅgaṃ tatra tatra sma nīyate
GE09ram_07_u:031.039a: vālukavedimadhye tu tal liṅgaṃ sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.039c: arcayām āsa gandhaiś ca puṣpaiś cāmṛtagandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:031.040a: tataḥ satām ārtiharaṃ haraṃ paraṃ; varapradaṃ candramayūkhabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:031.040c: samarcayitvā sa niśācaro jagau; prasārya hastān praṇanarta cāyatān
GE09ram_07_u:032.001a: narmadā puline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.002a: arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.003a: tāsāṃ madhyagato rāja rarāja sa tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.004a: jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam
GE09ram_07_u:032.004c: rurodha narmadā vegaṃ bāhubhiḥ sa tadārjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.007c: puṣpopahāraṃ tat sarvaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha
GE09ram_07_u:032.008c: narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām
GE09ram_07_u:032.009c: vardhantam ambhaso vegaṃ pūrvām āśāṃ praviśya tu
GE09ram_07_u:032.013a: ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau
GE09ram_07_u:032.020a: ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_07_u:032.021c: sakṛd eva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.022c: saṃvṛto rākṣasendras tu tatrāgād yatra so 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.023a: nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa tato rākṣaso balī
GE09ram_07_u:032.024a: sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhir iva dvipam
GE09ram_07_u:032.025c: ity evam arjunāmātyān āha gambhīrayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:032.026a: amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:032.027c: uttasthuḥ sāyudhās taṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:032.028a: yuddhasya kālo vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:032.028c: yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhum icchasi no nṛpam
GE09ram_07_u:032.029c: yuddhaśraddhā tu yady asti śvas tāta samare 'rjunam
GE09ram_07_u:032.031a: tatas te rāvaṇāmātyair amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:032.031c: sūditāś cāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāś ca bubhukṣitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.036a: arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.037a: uktvā na bhetavyam iti strījanaṃ sa tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.042c: prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.049a: sahasrabāhos tad yuddhaṃ viṃśadbāhoś ca dāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:032.051a: baloddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitārthe yathā vṛṣau
GE09ram_07_u:032.051c: meghāv iva vinardantau siṃhāv iva balotkaṭau
GE09ram_07_u:032.052a: rudrakālāv iva kruddhau tau tathā rākṣasārjunau
GE09ram_07_u:032.052c: parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayām āsatur bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:032.054c: tathā tābhyāṃ gadāpātair diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.057c: samam āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ balīndrayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.058a: śṛṅgair maharṣabhau yadvad dantāgrair iva kuñjarau
GE09ram_07_u:032.062a: sa vihvalaṃ tad ālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.063a: sa taṃ bāhusahasreṇa balād gṛhya daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:032.063c: babandha balavān rājā baliṃ nārāyaṇo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:032.065a: vyāghro mṛgam ivādāya siṃharāḍ iva dantinam
GE09ram_07_u:032.065c: rarāsa haihayo rājā harṣād ambudavan muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.066a: prahastas tu samāśvasto dṛṣṭvā baddhaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:032.066c: saha tai rākasaiḥ kruddha abhidudrāva pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:032.067a: naktaṃcarāṇāṃ vegas tu teṣām āpatatāṃ babhau
GE09ram_07_u:032.068a: muñca muñceti bhāṣantas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāsakṛt
GE09ram_07_u:032.070a: tatas tair eva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravarāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.070c: bhittvā vidrāvayām āsa vāyur ambudharān iva
GE09ram_07_u:032.072a: sa kīryamāṇaḥ kusumākṣatotkarair; dvijaiḥ sapauraiḥ puruhūtasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:032.072c: tadārjunaḥ saṃpraviveśa tāṃ purīṃ; baliṃ nigṛhyaiva sahasralocanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.001c: ṛṣiḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitaṃ divi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.006a: pulastya iti taṃ śrutvā vacanaṃ haihayādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.008a: tatas tam ṛṣim āyāntam udyantam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:033.009a: sa tasya madhuparkaṃ ca pādyam arghyaṃ ca dāpayan
GE09ram_07_u:033.010c: adyāhaṃ tu dvijendrendra yasmāt paśyāmi durdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:033.011a: adya me kuśalaṃ deva adya me kulam uddhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:033.011c: yat te devagaṇair vandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇāv imau
GE09ram_07_u:033.012a: idaṃ rājyam ime putrā ime dārā ime vayam
GE09ram_07_u:033.012c: brahman kiṃ kurma kiṃ kāryam ājñāpayatu no bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:033.013a: taṃ dharme 'gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvātha pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:033.014c: atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvas tvayā jitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.015c: so 'yam adya tvayā baddhaḥ pautro me 'tīvadurjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.016a: tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:033.018a: sa taṃ pramuktvā tridaśārim arjunaḥ; prapūjya divyābharaṇasragambaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.018c: ahiṃsākaṃ sakhyam upetya sāgnikaṃ; praṇamya sa brahmasutaṃ gṛhaṃ yayau
GE09ram_07_u:033.021a: evaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryāt tu dharṣaṇāt
GE09ram_07_u:033.022c: nāvajñā parataḥ kāryā ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:033.023a: tataḥ sa rājā piśitāśanānāṃ; sahasrabāhor upalabhya maitrīm
GE09ram_07_u:033.023c: punar narāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra; cacāra sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca darpāt
GE09ram_07_u:034.001c: cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.002a: rākṣasaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā śṛṇute yaṃ balādhikam
GE09ram_07_u:034.002c: rāvaṇas taṃ samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.003a: tataḥ kadā cit kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīṃ vālipālitām
GE09ram_07_u:034.004a: tatas taṃ vānarāmātyas tāras tārāpitā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.005a: rākṣasendra gato vālī yas te pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:034.005c: nānyaḥ pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ tava śaktaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.006c: imaṃ muhūrtam āyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam
GE09ram_07_u:034.007a: etān asthicayān paśya ya ete śaṅkhapāṇḍurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.008c: tathā vālinam āsādya tadantaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_07_u:034.009a: atha vā tvarase martuṃ gaccha dakṣiṇasāgaram
GE09ram_07_u:034.009c: vālinaṃ drakṣyase tatra bhūmiṣṭham iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:034.010a: sa tu tāraṃ vinirbhartsya rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.013c: pāpābhiprāyavān dṛṣṭaś cakāra na ca saṃbhramam
GE09ram_07_u:034.014a: śaśam ālakṣya siṃho vā pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:034.014c: na cintayati taṃ vālī rāvaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:034.017a: ity evaṃ matim āsthāya vālī karṇam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.017c: japan vai naigamān mantrāṃs tasthau parvatarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:034.019a: hastagrāhyaṃ tu taṃ matvā pādaśabdena rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:034.020a: grahītukāmaṃ taṃ gṛhya rakṣasām īśvaraṃ hariḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.021a: sa taṃ pīḍdayamānas tu vitudantaṃ nakhair muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.021c: jahāra rāvaṇaṃ vālī pavanas toyadaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:034.027a: sabhājyamāno bhūtais tu khecaraiḥ khecaro hariḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.028a: tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.030a: tatrāpi saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.031a: caturṣv api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.032c: kutas tvam iti covāca prahasan rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:034.033c: rākṣaseśo harīśaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:034.034c: yuddhepsur ahaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:034.035a: aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīratā ca te
GE09ram_07_u:034.036a: evam aśrāntavad vīra śīghram eva ca vānara
GE09ram_07_u:034.036c: māṃ caivodvahamānas tu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:034.037a: trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ gatir eṣā plavaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:034.038c: tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.041c: kiṣkindhāṃ viśatur hṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:034.042a: sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:034.043a: evam etat purāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:034.043c: dharṣitaś ca kṛtaś cāpi bhrātā pāvakasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:034.044c: so 'pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:035.002a: atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:035.002c: na tv etau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāv iti matir mama
GE09ram_07_u:035.003a: śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam
GE09ram_07_u:035.003c: vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.004c: samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.005c: dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā cāpi sītā viśvāsitā tathā
GE09ram_07_u:035.008a: na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇor vittapasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:035.008c: karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.009a: etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.009c: prāpto mayā jayaś caiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.010a: hanūmān yadi me na syād vānarādhipateḥ sakhā
GE09ram_07_u:035.010c: pravṛttam api ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:035.011c: tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā
GE09ram_07_u:035.012a: na hi veditavān manye hanūmān ātmano balam
GE09ram_07_u:035.013a: etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmune
GE09ram_07_u:035.014a: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktam ṛṣis tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.014c: hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:035.015a: satyam etad raghuśreṣṭha yad bravīṣi hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.015c: na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.016a: amoghaśāpaiḥ śāpas tu datto 'sya ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:035.016c: na veditā balaṃ yena balī sann arimardanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.017a: bālye 'py etena yat karma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:035.017c: tan na varṇayituṃ śakyam atibālatayāsya te
GE09ram_07_u:035.018a: yadi vāsti tv abhiprāyas tac chrotuṃ tava rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:035.018c: samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:035.019c: yatra rājyaṃ praśāsty asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā
GE09ram_07_u:035.020a: tasya bhāryā babhūveṣṭā hy añjaneti pariśrutā
GE09ram_07_u:035.020c: janayām āsa tasyāṃ vai vāyur ātmajam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:035.021c: phalāny āhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā
GE09ram_07_u:035.022a: eṣa mātur viyogāc ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.022c: ruroda śiśur atyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śarabharāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:035.023c: dadṛśe phalalobhāc ca utpapāta raviṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:035.026a: nāpy evaṃ vegavān vāyur garuḍo na manas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:035.027a: yadi tāvac chiśor asya īdṛśau gativikramau
GE09ram_07_u:035.027c: yauvanaṃ balam āsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:035.028a: tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.029c: pitur balāc ca bālyāc ca bhāskarābhyāśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.030a: śiśur eṣa tv adoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.030c: kāryaṃ cātra samāyattam ity evaṃ na dadāha saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.031a: yam eva divasaṃ hy eṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.031c: tam eva divasaṃ rāhur jighṛkṣati divākaram
GE09ram_07_u:035.033c: abravīd bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:035.034c: kim idaṃ tat tvayā dattam anyasya balavṛtrahan
GE09ram_07_u:035.035a: adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.035c: athānyo rāhur āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim
GE09ram_07_u:035.036a: sa rāhor vacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhramānvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.038a: indraḥ karīndram āruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
GE09ram_07_u:035.039c: anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭa ādhāvañ śailakūṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:035.040a: tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca
GE09ram_07_u:035.040c: utpapāta punar vyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikā sutam
GE09ram_07_u:035.042c: indra indreti saṃtrāsān muhur muhur abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:035.043c: śrutvendrovāca māṃ bhaiṣīr ayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:035.044a: airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahat tad idam ity api
GE09ram_07_u:035.045c: muhūrtam abhavad ghoram indrāgnyor iva bhāsvaram
GE09ram_07_u:035.053c: tvayā sma bhagavan sṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.054a: tvayā datto 'yam asmākam āyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.054c: so 'smān prāṇeśvaro bhūtvā kasmād eṣo 'dya sattama
GE09ram_07_u:035.055a: rurodha duḥkhaṃ janayann antaḥpura iva striyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.055c: tasmāt tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptā vāyunopahatā vibho
GE09ram_07_u:035.056a: vāyusaṃrodhajaṃ duḥkham idaṃ no nuda śatruhan
GE09ram_07_u:035.057a: etat prajānāṃ śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.057c: kāraṇād iti tān uktvā prajāḥ punar abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:035.058a: yasmin vaḥ kāraṇe vāyuś cukrodha ca rurodha ca
GE09ram_07_u:035.058c: prajāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātmanaḥ kṣamam
GE09ram_07_u:035.059c: rāhor vacanam ājñāya rājñā vaḥ kopito 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.060c: śarīraṃ hi vinā vāyuṃ samatāṃ yāti reṇubhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.061a: vāyuḥ prāṇāḥ sukhaṃ vāyur vāyuḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:035.061c: vāyunā saṃparityaktaṃ na sukhaṃ vindate jagat
GE09ram_07_u:035.062a: adyaiva ca parityaktaṃ vāyunā jagad āyuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:035.063a: tad yāmas tatra yatrāste māruto rukprado hi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:035.064c: jagāma tatrāsyati yatra mārutaḥ; sutaṃ surendrābhihataṃ pragṛhya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.001c: śiśukaṃ taṃ samādāya uttasthau dhātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.002c: pādayor nyapatad vāyus tisro' vasthāya vedhase
GE09ram_07_u:036.003c: vāyum utthāpya hastena śiśuṃ taṃ parimṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_07_u:036.004c: jalasiktaṃ yathā sasyaṃ punar jīvitam āptavān
GE09ram_07_u:036.005a: prāṇavantam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇo gandhavaho mudā
GE09ram_07_u:036.008c: jānatām api tat sarvaṃ hitaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatām
GE09ram_07_u:036.009a: anena śiśunā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:036.012a: aham evāsya dāsyāmi paramaṃ varam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:036.013a: mārtāṇḍas tv abravīt tatra bhagavāṃs timirāpahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.014a: yadā tu śāstrāṇy adhyetuṃ śaktir asya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:036.014c: tadāsya śāstraṃ dāsyāmi yena vāgmī bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:036.015a: varuṇaś ca varaṃ prādān nāsya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:036.016c: diśate 'sya varaṃ tuṣṭa aviṣādaṃ ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:036.017c: ity evaṃ varadaḥ prāha tadā hy ekākṣipiṅgalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.018a: matto madāyudhānāṃ ca na vadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:036.018c: ity evaṃ śaṃkareṇāpi datto 'sya paramo varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.019c: dīrghāayuś ca mahātmā ca iti brahmābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.020c: śilpinā pravaraḥ prāha varam asya mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.022a: tataḥ surāṇāṃ tu varair dṛṣṭvā hy enam akaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:036.025a: evam uktvā tam āmantrya mārutaṃ te 'maraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:036.026a: so 'pi gandhavahaḥ putraṃ pragṛhya gṛham ānayat
GE09ram_07_u:036.029a: srugbhāṇḍān agnihotraṃ ca valkalānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_07_u:036.030c: jānanta ṛṣayas taṃ vai kṣamante tasya nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.031a: yadā keṣariṇā tv eṣa vāyunā sāñjanena ca
GE09ram_07_u:036.033a: bādhase yat samāśritya balam asmān plavaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:036.036a: sa tu rājyaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā vānarāṇāṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.037c: pitrye pade kṛto rājā sugrīvo vālinaḥ pade
GE09ram_07_u:036.038a: sugrīveṇa samaṃ tv asya advaidhaṃ chidravarjitam
GE09ram_07_u:036.039a: eṣa śāpavaśād eva na vedabalam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.040a: na hy eṣa rāma sugrīvo bhrāmyamāṇo 'pi vālinā
GE09ram_07_u:036.040c: vedayāno na ca hy eṣa balam ātmani mārutiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.042a: asau purā vyākaraṇaṃ grahīṣyan; sūryonmukhaḥ pṛṣṭhagamaḥ kapīndraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.042c: udyadgirer astagiriṃ jagāma; granthaṃ mahad dhārayad aprameyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.043a: pravīvivikṣor iva sāgarasya; lokān didhakṣor iva pāvakasya
GE09ram_07_u:036.043c: lokakṣayeṣv eva yathāntakasya; hanūmataḥ sthāsyati kaḥ purastāt
GE09ram_07_u:036.044a: eṣo 'pi cānye ca mahākapīndrāḥ; sugrīvamaindadvividāḥ sanīlāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.044c: satāratāreyanalāḥ sarambhās; tvatkāraṇād rāma surair hi sṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:036.045a: tad etat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_07_u:036.046a: dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitaś cāsi rāma gacchamahe vayam
GE09ram_07_u:036.046c: evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayas te yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:037.001a: vimṛśya ca tato rāmo vayasyam akutobhayam
GE09ram_07_u:037.002a: darśitā bhavatā prītir darśitaṃ sauhṛdaṃ param
GE09ram_07_u:037.002c: udyogaś ca kṛto rājan bharatena tvayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:037.003a: tad bhavān adya kāśeyīṃ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ vraja
GE09ram_07_u:037.005a: visṛjya taṃ vayasyaṃ sa svāgatān pṛthivīpatīn
GE09ram_07_u:037.006c: dharmaś ca niyato nityaṃ satyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:037.007a: yuṣmākaṃ ca prabhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:037.008a: hetumātram ahaṃ tatra bhavatāṃ tejasāṃ hataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:037.010c: kālo hy atītaḥ sumahān gamane rocatāṃ matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:037.011a: pratyūcus taṃ ca rājāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:037.011c: diṣṭyā tvaṃ vijayī rāma rājyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_07_u:037.012a: diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:037.012c: eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāma eṣā naḥ kīrtir uttamā
GE09ram_07_u:037.013a: yat tvāṃ vijayinaṃ rāma paśyāmo hataśātravam
GE09ram_07_u:037.013c: upapannaṃ ca kākutstha yat tvam asmān praśaṃsasi
GE09ram_07_u:037.014a: praśaṃsārhā hi jānanti praśaṃsāṃ vaktum īdṛśīm
GE09ram_07_u:037.014c: āpṛcchāmo gamiṣyāmo hṛdistho naḥ sadā bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:037.015a: bhavec ca te mahārāja prītir asmāsu nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:038.001a: te prayātā mahātmānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_07_u:038.002a: akṣauhiṇī sahasrais te samavetās tv anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.003c: na nāma rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe paśyāmaḥ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:038.004c: hatā hi rākṣasās tatra pārthivaiḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.006a: etāś cānyāś ca rājānaḥ kathās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.007a: yathāpurāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:038.008a: aśvān ratnāni vastrāṇi hastinaś ca madotkaṭān
GE09ram_07_u:038.008c: candanāni ca divyāni divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:038.009a: bharato lakṣmaṇaś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.009c: ādāya tāni ratnāni ayodhyām agaman punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.010a: āgatāś ca purīṃ ramyām ayodhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.011a: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ prītiyuktaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.012a: vibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau ye cānye ṛkṣavānarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.013a: te sarve hṛṣṭamanaso rāmadattāni tāny atha
GE09ram_07_u:038.013c: śirobhir dhārayām āsur bāhubhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.014a: papuś caiva sugandhīni madhūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:038.014c: māṃsāni ca sumṛṣṭāni phalāny āsvādayanti ca
GE09ram_07_u:038.015a: evaṃ teṣāṃ nivasatāṃ māsaḥ sāgro gatas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:038.015c: muhūrtam iva tat sarvaṃ rāmabhaktyā samarthayan
GE09ram_07_u:038.016a: reme rāmaḥ sa taiḥ sārdhaṃ vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.016c: rājabhiś ca mahāvīryai rākṣasaiś ca mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:038.017a: evaṃ teṣāṃ yayau māso dvitīyaḥ śaiśiraḥ sukham
GE09ram_07_u:039.001c: rāghavas tu mahātejāḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:039.003c: paśya tvaṃ hanumantaṃ ca nalaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE09ram_07_u:039.004a: suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ śūraṃ tāraṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE09ram_07_u:039.004c: kumudaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ nīlaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE09ram_07_u:039.005a: vīraṃ śatabaliṃ caiva maindaṃ dvividam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:039.005c: gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ śarabhaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_07_u:039.007c: paśya tvaṃ prītisaṃyukto mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.008a: evam uktvā ca sugrīvaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.009a: taṅkāṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa saṃmato hy asi pārthiva
GE09ram_07_u:039.009c: purasya rākṣasānāṃ ca bhrātur vaiśvaraṇasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:039.010a: mā ca buddhim adharme tvaṃ kuryā rājan kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:039.010c: buddhimanto hi rājāno dhruvam aśnanti medinīm
GE09ram_07_u:039.011a: ahaṃ ca nityaśo rājan sugrīvasahitas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:039.011c: smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.012c: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.013a: tava buddhir mahābāho vīryam adbhutam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:039.013c: mādhuryaṃ paramaṃ rāma svayambhor iva nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:039.014a: teṣām evaṃ bruvāṇānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_07_u:039.015a: sneho me paramo rājaṃs tvayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.015c: bhaktiś ca niyatā vīra bhāvo nānyatra gacchati
GE09ram_07_u:039.016c: tāvac charīre vatsyantu mama prāṇā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.017c: utthāya ca pariṣvajya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:039.018a: evam etat kapiśreṣṭha bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.018c: lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me kathā
GE09ram_07_u:039.019a: cariṣyati kathā yāval lokān eṣā hi māmikā
GE09ram_07_u:039.019c: tāvac charīre vatsyanti prāṇās tava na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.020a: tato 'sya hāraṃ candrābhaṃ mucya kaṇṭhāt sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.022c: praṇamya śirasā pādau prajagmus te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.024a: sarve ca te bāṣpagalāḥ sāśrunetrā vicetasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:039.024c: saṃmūḍhā iva duḥkhena tyajante rāghavaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:040.001c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
GE09ram_07_u:040.003a: saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām
GE09ram_07_u:040.003c: kailāsaśikharāt prāptaṃ viddhi māṃ puṣkaraṃ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:040.004a: tava śāsanam ājñāya gato 'smi dhanadaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:040.004c: upasthātuṃ naraśreṣṭha sa ca māṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:040.006a: mamāpi paramā prītir hate tasmin durātmani
GE09ram_07_u:040.007a: sa tvaṃ rāmeṇa laṅkāyāṃ nirjitaḥ paramātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:040.007c: vaha saumya tam eva tvam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:040.008a: eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yat tvaṃ rāghavanandanam
GE09ram_07_u:040.009c: tvatsakāśaṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ sa evaṃ pratigṛhṇa mām
GE09ram_07_u:040.010a: bāḍham ity eva kākutsthaḥ puṣpakaṃ samapūjayat
GE09ram_07_u:040.010c: lājākṣataiś ca puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:040.011a: gamyatāṃ ca yathākāmam āgacches tvaṃ yadā smare
GE09ram_07_u:040.011c: evam astv iti rāmeṇa visṛṣṭaḥ puṣpakaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:040.014a: anāmayāc ca martyānāṃ sāgro māso gato hy ayam
GE09ram_07_u:040.014c: jīrṇānām api sattvānāṃ mṛtyur nāyāti rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:040.015a: putrān nāryaḥ prasūyante vapuṣmantaś ca mānavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:040.016a: kāle ca vāsavo varṣaṃ pātayaty amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:040.017a: īdṛśo naś ciraṃ rājā bhavatv iti nareśvara
GE09ram_07_u:040.017c: kathayanti pure paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:040.018c: śrutvā rāmo mudā yuktaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
GE09ram_07_u:041.001a: sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:041.002a: candanāgaru cūtaiś ca tuṅga kāleyakair api
GE09ram_07_u:041.003a: priyaṅgubhiḥ kadambaiś ca tathā kurabakair api
GE09ram_07_u:041.003c: jambūbhiḥ pāṭalībhiś ca kovidāraiś ca saṃvṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:041.005a: kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca nānāvarṇaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:041.006a: śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:041.006c: nīlāñjananibhāś cānye bhānti tatra sma pādapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:041.010a: nandanaṃ hi yathendrasya brāhmaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:041.010c: tathārūpaṃ hi rāmasya kānanaṃ tan niveśitam
GE09ram_07_u:041.013c: pāyayām āsa kākutsthaḥ śacīm indro yathāmṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:041.014a: māṃsāni ca vicitrāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:041.015c: bālāś ca rūpavatyaś ca striyaḥ pānavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:041.016a: evaṃ rāmo mudā yuktā sītāṃ surucirānanām
GE09ram_07_u:041.016c: ramayām āsa vaidehīm ahany ahani devavat
GE09ram_07_u:041.017a: tathā tu ramamāṇasya tasyaivaṃ śiśiraḥ śubhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:041.019a: sītā ca devakāryāṇi kṛtvā paurvāhṇikāni tu
GE09ram_07_u:041.021a: dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ patnīṃ kalyāṇena samanvitām
GE09ram_07_u:041.021c: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:041.022c: kim icchasi hi tad brūhi kaḥ kāmaḥ kriyatāṃ tava
GE09ram_07_u:041.023a: prahasantī tu vaidehī rāmaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:041.025a: eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yan mūlaphalabhojiṣu
GE09ram_07_u:041.026c: visrabdhā bhava vaidehi śvo gamiṣyasy asaṃśayam
GE09ram_07_u:041.027a: evam uktvā tu kākutstho maithilīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_07_u:042.002a: vijayo madhumattaś ca kāśyapaḥ piṅgalaḥ kuśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.004a: tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cid rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:042.004c: kāḥ kathā nagare bhadra vartante viṣayeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:042.005a: mām āśritāni kāny āhuḥ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.005c: kiṃ ca sītāṃ samāśritya bharataṃ kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:042.006a: kiṃ nu śatrughnam āśritya kaikeyīṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_07_u:042.006c: vaktavyatāṃ ca rājāno nave rājye vrajanti hi
GE09ram_07_u:042.007a: evam ukte tu rāmeṇa bhadraḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:042.007c: sthitāḥ kathāḥ śubhā rājan vartante puravāsinām
GE09ram_07_u:042.009a: evam uktas tu bhadreṇa rāghavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:042.010c: śrutvedānīṃ śubhaṃ kuryāṃ na kuryām aśubhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:042.011c: kathayante yathā paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:042.012a: rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bhadraḥ suruciraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.013a: śṛṇu rājan yathā paurāḥ kathayanti śubhāśubham
GE09ram_07_u:042.014c: akṛtaṃ pūrvakaiḥ kaiś cid devair api sadānavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.015c: vānarāś ca vaśaṃ nītā ṛṣkāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.016a: hatvā ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sītām āhṛtya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.016c: amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā svaveśma punar ānayat
GE09ram_07_u:042.017c: aṅkam āropya hi purā rāvaṇena balād dhṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:042.018a: laṅkām api punar nītām aśokavanikāṃ gatām
GE09ram_07_u:042.018c: rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannāṃ kathaṃ rāmo na kutsate
GE09ram_07_u:042.019c: yathā hi kurute rājā prajā tam anuvartate
GE09ram_07_u:042.020c: nagareṣu ca sarveṣu rājañ janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:042.021c: uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etan nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:042.022a: sarve tu śirasā bhūmāv abhivādya praṇamya ca
GE09ram_07_u:042.022c: pratyūcū rāghavaṃ dīnam evam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:042.023a: śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kākutsthaḥ sarveṣāṃ samudīritam
GE09ram_07_u:042.023c: visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.001a: visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.001c: samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:043.003a: rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.004a: uvāca ca tadā vākyaṃ vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.004c: draṣṭum icchasi rājā tvāṃ gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_07_u:043.005a: bāḍham ity eva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghava śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:043.006a: prayāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāḥstho bharatam antikāt
GE09ram_07_u:043.006c: uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:043.007a: bharatas tu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthād rāmasamīritam
GE09ram_07_u:043.008c: śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
GE09ram_07_u:043.009a: ehy āgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:043.009c: gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.010a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughno rāmaśāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:043.010c: śirasā vandya dharaṇīṃ prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.012c: eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyam ete prāṇā bahiścarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.013c: prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśus te samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.014a: te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:043.015a: bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭva rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.015c: hataśobhāṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te
GE09ram_07_u:043.016c: tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaś cāśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_07_u:043.017a: tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahābhujaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:043.017c: āsaneṣv ādhvam ity uktvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
GE09ram_07_u:043.018a: bhavanto mama sarvasvaṃ bhavanto mama jīvitam
GE09ram_07_u:043.018c: bhavadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:044.002a: sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā
GE09ram_07_u:044.002c: paurāṇāṃ mama sītāyāṃ yādṛśī vartate kathā
GE09ram_07_u:044.003c: vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE09ram_07_u:044.004a: ahaṃ kila kule jata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:044.005a: jānāsi hi yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane
GE09ram_07_u:044.005c: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsito mayā
GE09ram_07_u:044.007a: candrādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇāṃ saṃnidhau purā
GE09ram_07_u:044.009a: antarātmā ca me vetti sītāṃ śuddhāṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_07_u:044.009c: tato gṛhītvā vaidehīm ayodhyām aham āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:044.010a: ayaṃ tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaś ca hṛdi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:044.011a: akīrtir yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:044.011c: pataty evādhamāṃl lokān yāvac chabdaḥ sa kīrtyate
GE09ram_07_u:044.012a: akīrtir nindyate daivaiḥ kīrtir deveṣu pūjyate
GE09ram_07_u:044.012c: kīrtyarthaṃ ca samārambhaḥ sarva eva mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:044.013a: apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmān vā puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:044.014c: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃ cid duḥkham ato 'dhikam
GE09ram_07_u:044.015a: śvas tvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham
GE09ram_07_u:044.017c: śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:044.018a: na cāsmi prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:044.018c: aprītiḥ paramā mahyaṃ bhavet tu prativārite
GE09ram_07_u:044.019a: śāpitāś ca mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca
GE09ram_07_u:044.019c: ye māṃ vākyāntare brūyur anunetuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:044.020a: mānayantu bhavanto māṃ yadi macchāsane sthitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:044.020c: ito 'dya nīyatāṃ sītā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:044.021c: paśyeyam iti tasyāś ca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatām ayam
GE09ram_07_u:044.022a: evam uktvā tu kākutstho bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.003c: mayā netā maharṣīṇāṃ śīghram ānīyatāṃ rathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.004a: sumantras tu tathety uktvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.005c: ratho 'yaṃ samanuprāpto yat kāryaṃ kriyatāṃ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:045.006a: evam uktaḥ sumantreṇa rājaveśma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.007a: gaṅgātīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:045.008a: evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:045.009a: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:045.010c: saumitris tu tathety uktvā ratham āropya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:045.011a: abravīc ca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:045.012a: nayanaṃ me sphuraty adya gātrotkampaś ca jāyate
GE09ram_07_u:045.012c: hṛdayaṃ caiva saumitre asvastham iva lakṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:045.013a: autsukyaṃ paramaṃ cāpi adhṛtiś ca parā mama
GE09ram_07_u:045.013c: śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthulocana
GE09ram_07_u:045.014a: api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātus te bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:045.014c: śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.015a: pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇinām api
GE09ram_07_u:045.016a: lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:045.016c: śivam ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā
GE09ram_07_u:045.017c: prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:045.018a: yojayasva rathaṃ śīghram adya bhāgīrathī jalam
GE09ram_07_u:045.020a: sā tu sūtasya vacanād āruroha rathottamam
GE09ram_07_u:045.020c: sītā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sumitreṇa ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:045.022a: sītā tu paramāyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam āturam
GE09ram_07_u:045.022c: uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajña kim idaṃ rudyate tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:045.023c: harṣakāle kim arthaṃ māṃ viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:045.024c: kaccid vinā kṛtas tena dvirātre śokam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.025c: na cāham evaṃ śocāmi maivaṃ tvaṃ bāliśo bhava
GE09ram_07_u:045.026a: tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān
GE09ram_07_u:045.026c: tato dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:045.027c: tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya yāsyāmas tāṃ purīṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:045.028a: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:045.028c: titīrṣur lakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvam upāharat
GE09ram_07_u:046.002a: sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.003a: tatas tīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.004a: hṛdgataṃ me mahac chalyaṃ yad asmy āryeṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:046.005a: śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyor vā yat paraṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:046.005c: na cāsminn īdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite
GE09ram_07_u:046.006a: prasīda na ca me roṣaṃ kartum arhasi suvrate
GE09ram_07_u:046.006c: ity añjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.007a: rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.008a: kim idaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:046.008c: paśyāmi tvāṃ ca na svatham api kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.009a: śāpito 'si narendreṇa yat tvaṃ saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.009c: tad brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:046.010c: avāṅmukho bāṣpagalo vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:046.012a: na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.012c: yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastāny amarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:046.013a: sā tvāṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:046.013c: paurāpavāda bhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā
GE09ram_07_u:046.014a: āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:046.014c: rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tavaivaṃ kila daurhṛdam
GE09ram_07_u:046.015c: puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:046.018a: pativratātvam āsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi
GE09ram_07_u:046.018c: śreyas te paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:047.001c: paraṃ viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:047.003a: māmikeyaṃ tanur nūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:047.003c: dhātrā yasyās tathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_07_u:047.004a: kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārair viyojitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:047.004c: yāhaṃ śuddha samācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī
GE09ram_07_u:047.006a: sā kathaṃ hy āśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:047.007a: kiṃ ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ nṛpe
GE09ram_07_u:047.007c: kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:047.008a: na khalv adyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavī jale
GE09ram_07_u:047.008c: tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśas tu bhartur me parihāsyate
GE09ram_07_u:047.009a: yathājñāṃ kuru saumitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm
GE09ram_07_u:047.009c: nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:047.010c: śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:047.011a: yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethās tathā paureṣu nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:047.011c: paramo hy eṣa dharmaḥ syād eṣā kīrtir anuttamā
GE09ram_07_u:047.012a: yat tvaṃ paurajanaṃ rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:047.013c: śirasā dharaṇīṃ gatvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:047.014a: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvā sa rudann eva mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:047.015c: saṃmūḍha iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhad drutam
GE09ram_07_u:047.016a: muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anāthavat
GE09ram_07_u:047.017a: dūrasthaṃ ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:047.018a: sā duḥkhabhārāvanatā tapasvinī; yaśodharā nātham apaśyatī satī
GE09ram_07_u:047.018c: ruroda sā barhiṇanādite vane; mahāsvanaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā satī
GE09ram_07_u:048.001a: sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatra munidārakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.001c: prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkir agryadhīḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.002c: sarve nivedayām āsus tasyās tu ruditasvanam
GE09ram_07_u:048.003c: patnī śrīr iva saṃmohād virauti vikṛtasvarā
GE09ram_07_u:048.004a: bhagavan sādhu paśyemāṃ devatām iva khāc cyutām
GE09ram_07_u:048.004c: na hy enāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyāsyāḥ prayujyatām
GE09ram_07_u:048.005a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:048.006a: taṃ tu deśam abhipretya kiṃ cit padbhyāṃ mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.006c: arghyam ādāya ruciraṃ jāhvanī tīram āśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.007c: uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayann iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:048.008a: snuṣā daśarāthasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī satī
GE09ram_07_u:048.008c: janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate
GE09ram_07_u:048.010a: apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapo labdhena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:048.011c: tās tvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.012a: idam arghyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ visrabdhā vigatajvarā
GE09ram_07_u:048.012c: yathā svagṛham abhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.013a: śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:048.013c: śirasā vandya caraṇau tathety āha kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.014a: taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_07_u:048.015a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntaṃ vaidehyānugataṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:048.015c: upājagmur mudā yuktā vacanaṃ caidam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:048.016c: abhivādayāmaḥ sarvās tvām ucyatāṃ kiṃ ca kurmahe
GE09ram_07_u:048.017a: tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:048.018c: apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā
GE09ram_07_u:048.019a: imāṃ bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha
GE09ram_07_u:048.019c: gauravān mama vākyasya pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.020a: muhur muhuś ca vaidehīṃ parisāntvya mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:048.020c: svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ punar āyān mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:049.001a: dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītām āśramaṃ saṃraveśitām
GE09ram_07_u:049.003a: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:049.004a: vyaktaṃ daivād ahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam
GE09ram_07_u:049.004c: vaidehyā sārathe sārdhaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam
GE09ram_07_u:049.005a: yo hi devān sagandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:049.005c: nihanyād rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_07_u:049.006a: purā mama pitur vākyair daṇḍake vijane vane
GE09ram_07_u:049.007c: paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_07_u:049.008a: ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇy asmin yaśohare
GE09ram_07_u:049.009c: sumantraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:049.010a: na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:049.010c: dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pitus te lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:049.011c: tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatau tathā
GE09ram_07_u:049.012a: na tv idaṃ tvayi vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:049.012c: rājñā vo 'vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:049.013c: ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:049.014a: ṛṣes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā mām āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:049.014c: sūta na kva cid evaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:049.015c: naiva jātv anṛtaṃ kuryām iti me saumya darśanam
GE09ram_07_u:049.016a: sarvathā nāsty avaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:049.016c: yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:049.017a: yady apy ahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:049.017c: tac cāpy udāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam
GE09ram_07_u:049.018a: tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:049.018c: tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:050.001c: tad vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartum upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:050.002a: purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:050.002c: vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha
GE09ram_07_u:050.003a: tam āśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:050.004a: sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:050.004e: tau munī tāpasa śreṣṭhau vinītas tv abhyavādayat
GE09ram_07_u:050.005a: sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca
GE09ram_07_u:050.005c: pādyena phalamūlaiś ca so 'py āste munibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:050.006a: teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tās tāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:050.007a: tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cit prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:050.007c: uvāca taṃ mahātmānam atreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:050.008a: bhagavan kiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:050.008c: kimāyuś ca hi me rāmaḥ putrāś cānye kimāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:050.009a: rāmasya ca sutā ye syus teṣām āyuḥ kiyad bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:050.009c: kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:050.010a: tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:050.011c: sukhinaś ca samṛddhāś ca bhaviṣyanty asya cānujāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:050.012a: kasmiṃś cit karaṇe tvāṃ ca maithilīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_07_u:050.015a: sa sarvam akhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāsya gatāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:050.016a: tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:050.017a: etad vaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:050.017c: śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:050.018a: evaṃgate na saṃtāpaṃ gantum arhasi rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:050.018c: sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama
GE09ram_07_u:050.019a: tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:050.019c: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:050.020c: astam arko gato vāsaṃ gomatyāṃ tāv athoṣatuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:051.001a: tatra tāṃ rajanīm uṣya gomatyāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:051.001c: prabhāte punar utthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā
GE09ram_07_u:051.003a: saumitris tu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:051.003c: rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim ahaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:051.006a: sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnam āsīnaṃ paramāsane
GE09ram_07_u:051.008e: punar asmy āgato vīra pādamūlam upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:051.009a: mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:051.009c: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti sattvavanto manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:051.011a: śaktas tvam ātmanātmānaṃ vijetuṃ manasaiva hi
GE09ram_07_u:051.011c: lokān sarvāṃś ca kākutstha kiṃ punar duḥkham īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:051.013c: tyajemāṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:051.014a: evam uktas tu kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:051.015a: evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:051.015c: paritoṣaś ca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane
GE09ram_07_u:051.016a: nirvṛtiś ca kṛtā saumya saṃtāpaś ca nirākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.001a: tataḥ sumantras tv āgamya rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:052.001c: ete nivāritā rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.003a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:052.004a: rājñas tv ājñāṃ puraskṛtya dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.004c: praveśayām āsa tatas tāpasān saṃmatān bahūn
GE09ram_07_u:052.007a: pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītipuraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.008a: uvāca ca mahābāhuḥ sarvān eva mahāmunīn
GE09ram_07_u:052.009a: rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.010c: prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā rāghavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:052.011a: kim āgamanakaryaṃ vaḥ kiṃ karomi tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.012a: idaṃ rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca hṛdi sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:052.012c: sarvam etad dvijārthaṃ me satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.013a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhuvādo mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:052.014a: ūcuś ca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:052.016a: tvayā punar brāhmaṇa gauravād iyaṃ; kṛtvā pratijñā hy anavekṣya kāraṇam
GE09ram_07_u:052.016c: kuruṣva kartā hy asi nātra saṃśayo; mahābhayāt trātum ṛṣīṃs tvam arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:053.001a: bruvadbhir evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:053.001c: kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta bhavatāṃ bhayaṃ nāśayitāsmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.002a: tathā vadati kākutsthe bhargavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:053.002c: bhayaṃ naḥ śṛṇu yan mūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara
GE09ram_07_u:053.004a: brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.005a: sa madhur vīryasaṃpanno dharme ca susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.005c: bahumānāc ca rudreṇa dattas tasyādbhuto varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.006c: dadau mahātmā suprīto vākayṃ caitad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:053.007a: tvayāyam atulo dharmo matprasādāt kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.007c: prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy āyudham uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:053.008a: yāvat suraiś ca vipraiś ca na virudhyer mahāsura
GE09ram_07_u:053.008c: tāvac chūlaṃ tavedaṃ syād anyathā nāśam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_07_u:053.009a: yaś ca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.009c: taṃ śūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam
GE09ram_07_u:053.010a: evaṃ rudrād varaṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.010c: praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:053.011a: bhagavan mama vaṃśasya śūlam etad anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:053.011c: bhavet tu satataṃ deva surāṇām īśvaro hy asi
GE09ram_07_u:053.012a: taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.013a: mā bhūt te viphalā bāṇī matprāsādakṛtā śubhā
GE09ram_07_u:053.013c: bhavataḥ putram ekaṃ tu śūlam etad gamiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:053.014a: yāvat karasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te
GE09ram_07_u:053.015a: evaṃ madhuvaraṃ labdhvā devāt sumahad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:053.016a: tasya patnī mahābhagā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā
GE09ram_07_u:053.016c: viśvāsayor apatyaṃ sā hy analāyāṃ mahāprabhā
GE09ram_07_u:053.017a: tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.017c: bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpāny eva samācarat
GE09ram_07_u:053.018a: taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.018c: madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na cainaṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:053.019a: sa vihāya imaṃ lokaṃ praviṣṭo varuṇālayam
GE09ram_07_u:053.019c: śūlaṃ niveśya lavaṇe varaṃ tasmai nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:053.020c: saṃtāpayati lokāṃs trīn viśeṣeṇa tu tāpasān
GE09ram_07_u:053.021c: śrutvā pramāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:053.022a: bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtair ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:053.022c: abhayaṃ yācitā vīra trātāraṃ na ca vidmahe
GE09ram_07_u:053.023a: te vayaṃ rāvaṇaṃ śrutvā hataṃ sabalavāhanam
GE09ram_07_u:053.023c: trātāraṃ vidmahe rāma nānyaṃ bhuvi narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:054.001a: tathokte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:054.001c: kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate
GE09ram_07_u:054.002a: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:054.002c: tato nivedayām āsur lavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā
GE09ram_07_u:054.003c: ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane sadā
GE09ram_07_u:054.004c: mānuṣāṃś caiva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam
GE09ram_07_u:054.006a: tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyam uvāca sa mahāmunīn
GE09ram_07_u:054.006c: ghātayiṣyāmi tad rakṣo vyapagacchatu vo bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:054.007c: sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:054.008a: ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīrāḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:054.009a: rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:054.009c: aham enaṃ badhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:054.011a: śatrughnas tv abravīd vākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:054.012a: āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī
GE09ram_07_u:054.014e: preṣye mayi sthite rājan na bhūyaḥ kleśam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_07_u:054.015a: tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:054.015c: evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:054.016a: rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi maghos tu nagare śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:054.017a: śūras tvaṃ kṛtavidyaś ca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane
GE09ram_07_u:054.017c: nagaraṃ madhunā juṣṭaṃ tathā janapadāñ śubhān
GE09ram_07_u:054.018a: yo hi vaṃśaṃ samutpāṭya pārthivasya punaḥ kṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:054.018c: na vidhatte nṛpaṃ tatra narakaṃ sa nigacchati
GE09ram_07_u:054.019a: sa tvaṃ hatvā madhusutaṃ lavaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:054.019c: rājyaṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyaṃ me yady avekṣase
GE09ram_07_u:054.020a: uttaraṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ śūra vākyāntare mama
GE09ram_07_u:055.001a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍām upāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:055.001c: śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:055.003a: evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:055.003c: uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:055.005a: purodhasaṃ ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:055.005c: mantriṇaś caiva me sarvān ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā
GE09ram_07_u:055.009a: ayaṃ śaras tv amoghas te divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:055.010a: sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave
GE09ram_07_u:055.010c: svayambhūr ajito devo yaṃ nāpaśyan surāsurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:055.012a: sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃs trīṃs tau cānena hatau yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:055.012c: anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃś cakāra saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:055.013a: nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā
GE09ram_07_u:055.013c: mukhaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃs trāso bhaved iti
GE09ram_07_u:055.014a: yac ca tasya mahac chūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:055.015a: tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:055.015c: diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnoty āhāram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:055.016a: yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaś cid enaṃ samāhvayet
GE09ram_07_u:055.016c: tadā śūlaṃ gṛhītvā tad bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam
GE09ram_07_u:055.019a: anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:055.019c: yadi tv evaṃ kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:055.020a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śūlasya ca viparyayam
GE09ram_07_u:056.001a: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:056.002c: rathānāṃ ca sahasre dve gajānāṃ śatam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:056.005a: balaṃ ca subhṛtaṃ vīra hṛṣṭapuṣṭam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:056.006a: na hy arthās tatra tiṣṭhanti na dārā na ca bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:056.006c: suprīto bhṛtyavargas tu yatra tiṣṭhati rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:056.007c: eka eva dhanuṣpānis tad gaccha tvaṃ madhor vanam
GE09ram_07_u:056.008a: yathā tvāṃ na prajānāti gacchantaṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam
GE09ram_07_u:056.008c: lavaṇas tu madhoḥ putras tathā gaccher aśaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:056.009a: na tasya mṛtyur anyo 'sti kaścid dhi puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:056.009c: darśanaṃ yo 'bhigaccheta sa vadhyo lavaṇena hi
GE09ram_07_u:056.010a: sa grīṣme vyapayāte tu varṣarātra upasthite
GE09ram_07_u:056.010c: hanyās tvaṃ lavaṇaṃ saumya sa hi kālo 'sya durmateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:056.011a: maharṣīṃs tu puraskṛtya prayāntu tava sainikāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:056.012a: tataḥ sthāpya balaṃ sarvaṃ nadītīre samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:056.012c: agrato dhanuṣā sārdhaṃ gaccha tvaṃ laghuvikrama
GE09ram_07_u:056.013a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa śatrughnas tān mahābalān
GE09ram_07_u:056.013c: senāmukhyān samānīya tato vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:056.014a: ete vo gaṇitā vāsā yatra yatra nivatsyatha
GE09ram_07_u:056.014c: sthātavyaṃ cāvirodhena yathā bādhā na kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:056.015a: tathā tāṃs tu samājñāpya niryāpya ca mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:056.015c: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaukeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
GE09ram_07_u:057.001a: prasthāpya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ māsamātroṣitaḥ pathi
GE09ram_07_u:057.001c: eka evāśu śatrughno jagāma tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:057.002c: vālmīker āśramaṃ puṇyam agacchad vāsam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:057.003c: kṛtāñjalir atho bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:057.004a: bhagavan vastum icchāmi guroḥ kṛtyād ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.004c: śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīṃ vāruṇīṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:057.006a: svam āśramam idaṃ saumya rāghavāṇāṃ kulasya ha
GE09ram_07_u:057.006c: āsanaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me
GE09ram_07_u:057.007a: pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ phalamūlaṃ ca bhojanam
GE09ram_07_u:057.007c: bhakṣayām āsa kākutsthas tṛptiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.008a: sa tu bhuktvā mahābāhur maharṣiṃ tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:057.009a: tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:057.011a: sa bāla eva saudāso mṛgayām upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:057.012c: bhakṣayāṇāv asaṃtuṣṭau paryāptiṃ ca na jagmatuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.013a: sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:057.014a: vinipātya tam ekaṃ tu saudāsaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.015a: nirīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahāyas tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.015c: saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ saudāsaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:057.016a: yasmād anaparāddhaṃ tvaṃ sahāyaṃ mama jaghnivān
GE09ram_07_u:057.019a: tatra yajño mahān āsīd bahuvarṣa gaṇāyutān
GE09ram_07_u:057.021c: dīyatām iti śīghraṃ vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_07_u:057.022a: tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:057.023a: haviṣyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam
GE09ram_07_u:057.023c: tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyed yathā guruḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.024c: sa ca rakṣaḥ punas tatra sūdaveṣam athākarot
GE09ram_07_u:057.025a: sa mānuṣam atho māṃsaṃ pārthivāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:057.025c: idaṃ svāduhaviṣyaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ cānnam āhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:057.026a: sa bhojanaṃ vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdham upāharat
GE09ram_07_u:057.028a: yasmāt tvaṃ bhojanaṃ rājan mamaitad dātum icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:057.028c: tasmād bhojanam etat te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.029a: sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.029c: punar vasiṣṭhaṃ provāca yad uktaṃ brahmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:057.030a: tac chrutā pārthivendrasya rakṣasā vikṛtaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_07_u:057.031a: mayā roṣaparītena yad idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.031c: naitac chakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ pradāsyāmi ca te varam
GE09ram_07_u:057.032c: matprasādāc ca rājendra atītaṃ na smariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:057.033a: evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpam upabhujyārimardanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:057.035a: tasya tāṃ pārthivendrasya kathāṃ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:058.001a: yām eva rātriṃ śatrughna parṇaśālāṃ samāviśat
GE09ram_07_u:058.001c: tām eva rātriṃ sītāpi prasūtā dārakadvayam
GE09ram_07_u:058.002c: vālmīkeḥ priyam ācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:058.003a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā munir harṣam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:058.004a: kuśamuṣṭim upādāya lavaṃ caiva tu sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.005a: yas tayoḥ pūrvajo jātaḥ sa kuśair mantrasaṃskṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.005c: nirmārjanīyas tu bhavet kuśa ity asya nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.006a: yaś cāparo bhavet tābhyāṃ lavena susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.006c: nirmārjanīyo vṛddhābhir lavaś ceti sa nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.007a: evaṃ kuśalavau nāmnā tāv ubhau yamajātakau
GE09ram_07_u:058.008a: te rakṣāṃ jagṛhus tāṃ ca munihastāt samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.008c: akurvaṃś ca tato rakṣāṃ tayor vigatakalmaṣāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.009a: tathā tāṃ kriyamāṇāṃ tu rakṣāṃ gotraṃ ca nāma ca
GE09ram_07_u:058.009c: saṃkīrtanaṃ ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau
GE09ram_07_u:058.010a: ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva sumahat priyam
GE09ram_07_u:058.010c: parṇaśālāṃ gato rātrau diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:058.012a: prabhāte tu mahāvīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kramam
GE09ram_07_u:058.012c: muniṃ prāñjalir āmantrya prāyāt paścānmukhaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:058.014a: sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhārgavapramukhair nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.002a: śūlasya ca balaṃ brahman ke ca pūrvaṃ nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.004c: ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhave yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva me
GE09ram_07_u:059.005c: māndhatā iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:059.006a: sa kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.006c: suralokam atho jetum udyogam akaron nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.007a: indrasya tu bhayaṃ tīvraṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:059.010a: rājā tvaṃ mānuṣaṃ loke na tāvat puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:059.011a: yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:059.012a: indram evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu māndhātā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:059.013a: tam uvāca sahasrākṣo lavaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.014a: tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ ghoraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:059.014c: vrīḍito 'vāṅmukho rājā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:059.015a: āmantrya tu sahasrākṣaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.015c: punar evāgamac chrīmān imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.016c: ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartum aninditaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.017c: dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa sakāśaṃ lavaṇasya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.018a: sa gatvā vipriyāṇy āha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam
GE09ram_07_u:059.018c: vadantam evaṃ taṃ dūtaṃ bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.020a: tataḥ prahasya lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:059.022a: evaṃ sa rājā sumahān hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.022c: śūlasya ca balaṃ vīra aprameyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:059.023a: śvaḥ prabhāte tu lavaṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:059.023c: agṛhītāyudhaṃ kṣipraṃ dhruvo hi vijayas tava
GE09ram_07_u:060.001a: kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:060.002a: tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:060.003a: etasminn antare śūraḥ śatrughno yamunāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_07_u:060.005a: tato dadarśa śatrughnaṃ sthitaṃ dvāri dhṛtāyudham
GE09ram_07_u:060.005c: tam uvāca tato rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:060.006c: bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim
GE09ram_07_u:060.007c: svayaṃ praviṣṭo nu mukhaṃ katham āsādya durmate
GE09ram_07_u:060.008a: tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:060.010a: uvāca ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnas taṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:060.010c: yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:060.012c: śatrus tvaṃ sarvajīvānāṃ na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:060.013a: tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:060.014a: mama mātṛṣvasur bhrātā rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:060.015a: tac ca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasyā kulakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:060.015c: avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:060.016a: na hatāś ca hi me sarve paribhūtās tṛṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:060.016c: bhūtaś caiva bhaviṣyāś ca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:060.017a: tasya te yuddhakāmasyā yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate
GE09ram_07_u:060.017c: īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvad āyudham
GE09ram_07_u:060.018a: tam uvācātha śatrughna kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:060.018c: durbalo 'py āgataḥ śatrur na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:060.019a: yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau
GE09ram_07_u:060.019c: sa hato mandabuddhitvād yathā kāpuruṣas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:061.001a: tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.001c: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:061.002a: pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca
GE09ram_07_u:061.003a: taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoravikramam
GE09ram_07_u:061.003c: śatrughno deva śatrughna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:061.004a: śatrughno na tadā jāto yadānye nirjitās tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:061.004c: tad adya bāṇābhihato vraja taṃ yamasādanam
GE09ram_07_u:061.005a: ṛṣayo 'py adya pāpātman mayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:061.005c: paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsas tridaśā iva rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:061.006c: puraṃ janapadaṃ cāpi kṣemam etad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:061.007c: pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmam aṃśur ivārkajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.009a: tad dṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu
GE09ram_07_u:061.009c: pādapān subahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjad balī
GE09ram_07_u:061.010a: śatrughnaś cāpi tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatato bahūn
GE09ram_07_u:061.011a: tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjad rākṣasor asi
GE09ram_07_u:061.011c: śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.012a: tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā
GE09ram_07_u:061.012c: śirasy abhyahanac chūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai
GE09ram_07_u:061.013a: tasmin nipatite vīre hāhākāro mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:061.014a: tam avajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_07_u:061.014c: rakṣo labdhāntaram api na viveśa svam ālayam
GE09ram_07_u:061.015a: nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_07_u:061.015c: tato hata iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat
GE09ram_07_u:061.016a: muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu punas tasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.017a: tato divyam amoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaram uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:061.017c: jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa
GE09ram_07_u:061.020a: taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite
GE09ram_07_u:061.021c: jagad dhi sarvam asvasthaṃ pitāmaham upasthitam
GE09ram_07_u:061.022c: kaccil lokakṣayo deva prāpto vā yugasaṃkayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.023a: nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na śrutaṃ vā prapitāmaha
GE09ram_07_u:061.024a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.025c: tejasā yasya sarve sma saṃmūḍhāḥ surasattamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.026a: eṣo hi pūrvaṃ devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.026c: śaras tejomayo vatsā yena vai bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:061.027a: eṣa vai kaiṭabhasyārthe madhunaś ca mahāśaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.027c: sṛṣṭo mahātmanā tena vadhārthaṃ daityayos tayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.028a: evam etaṃ prajānīdhvaṃ viṣṇos tejomayaṃ śaram
GE09ram_07_u:061.028c: eṣā caiva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.030a: tasya te devadevasya niśamya madhurāṃ giram
GE09ram_07_u:061.032a: ākāśam āvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā devair hi raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.032c: siṃhanādaṃ muhuḥ kṛtvā dadarśa lavaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.033a: āhūtaś ca tatas tena śatrughnena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:061.034a: ākarṇāt sa vikṛṣyātha tad dhanur dhanvināṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:061.037a: tac ca divyaṃ mahac chūlaṃ hate lavaṇarākṣase
GE09ram_07_u:062.001a: hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.002a: diṣṭyā te vijayo vatsa diṣṭya lavaṇarākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.003a: varadāḥ sma mahābāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.003c: vijayākāṅkṣiṇas tubhyam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.004a: devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śūro mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.005a: imāṃ madhupurīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ deva nirmitām
GE09ram_07_u:062.005c: niveśaṃ prapnuyāṃ śīghram eṣa me 'stu varo mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.006a: taṃ devāḥ prītamanaso bāḍham ity eva rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:062.006c: bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.007a: te tathoktvā mahātmāno divam āruruhus tadā
GE09ram_07_u:062.008a: sā sena śīghram āgacchac chrutvā śatrughnaśāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:062.009a: sā purī divyasaṃkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhā
GE09ram_07_u:062.010a: kṣetrāṇi sasya yuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:062.012a: yac ca tena mahac chūnyaṃ lavaṇena kṛtaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:062.014a: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurāṃ purīm
GE09ram_07_u:063.002a: mantriṇo balamukhyāṃś ca nivartya ca purodhasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:063.003a: sa gatvā gaṇitān vāsān saptāṣṭau raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:063.004a: sa praviśya purīṃ ramyāṃ śrīmān ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:063.006a: yad ājñaptaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān aham
GE09ram_07_u:063.006c: hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī sā ca niveśitā
GE09ram_07_u:063.007a: dvādaśaṃ ca gataṃ varṣaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:063.007c: notsaheyam ahaṃ vastuṃ tvayā virahito nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:063.008c: mātṛhīno yathā vatsas tvāṃ vinā pravasāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:063.009c: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vīra naitat kṣatriya ceṣṭitam
GE09ram_07_u:063.010c: prajāś ca paripālyā hi kṣatradharmeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:063.011a: kāle kāle ca māṃ vīra ayodhyām avalokitum
GE09ram_07_u:063.011c: āgaccha tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gantāsi ca puraṃ tava
GE09ram_07_u:063.012a: mamāpi tvaṃ sudayitaḥ prāṇair api na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:063.013a: tasmāt tvaṃ vasa kākutstha pañcarātraṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:063.014c: śatrughno dīnayā vācā bāḍham ity eva cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:063.017c: bharatena ca śatrughno jagāmāśu purīṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:064.001a: prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:064.003c: asakṛt putraputreti vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:064.004a: kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma pūrvaṃ dehāntare kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:064.004c: yad ahaṃ putram ekaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi nidhanaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:064.005c: akāle kālam āpannaṃ duḥkhāya mama putraka
GE09ram_07_u:064.006a: alpair ahobhir nidhanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:064.006c: ahaṃ ca jananī caiva tava śokena putraka
GE09ram_07_u:064.007a: na smarāmy anṛtaṃ hy uktaṃ na ca hiṃsāṃ smarāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:064.007c: kena me duṣkṛtenādya bāla eva mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:064.008a: nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ me śrutaṃ vā ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:064.009a: rāmasya duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:064.009c: tvaṃ rājañ jīvayasvainaṃ bālaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:064.010a: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
GE09ram_07_u:064.010c: uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ rājye tavāsmin sumahābala
GE09ram_07_u:064.012c: asadvṛtte tu nṛpatāv akāle mriyate janaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:064.013a: yadā pureṣv ayuktāni janā janapadeśu ca
GE09ram_07_u:064.013c: kurvate na ca rakṣāsti tadākālakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:064.014c: pure janapade vāpi tadā bālavadho hy ayam
GE09ram_07_u:064.015a: evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair nindayāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.001a: tathā tu karuṇaṃ tasya dvijasya paridevitam
GE09ram_07_u:065.002c: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca bhrātṝṃś ca sahanaigamān
GE09ram_07_u:065.003a: tato dvijā vasiṣṭhena sārdham aṣṭau praveśitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.006c: raghavaḥ sarvam ācaṣṭe dvijo yasmāt praroditi
GE09ram_07_u:065.007a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājño dīnasya nāradaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.007c: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau nṛpam
GE09ram_07_u:065.009a: purā kṛtayuge rāma brāhmaṇā vai tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.009c: abrāhmaṇas tadā rājan na tapasvī kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:065.012c: mānavā ye mahātmānas tasmiṃs tretāyuge yuge
GE09ram_07_u:065.013a: brahmakṣatraṃ tu tat sarvaṃ yat pūrvam aparaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_07_u:065.014a: apaśyantas tu te sarve viśeṣam adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.015a: adharmaḥ pādam ekaṃ tu pātayat pṛthivītale
GE09ram_07_u:065.015c: adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktās tena mandābhavan dvijāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.017a: tretāyuge tv avartanta brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyaś ca ye
GE09ram_07_u:065.017c: tapo 'tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣām apare janāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.018a: sa dharmaḥ paramas teṣāṃ vaiśyaśūdram athāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:065.018c: pūjāṃ ca sarvavarṇānāṃ śūdrāś cakrur viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.021c: na śūdro labhate dharmam ugraṃ taptaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:065.022c: bhaviṣyā śūdrayonyāṃ hi tapaścaryā kalau yuge
GE09ram_07_u:065.023c: sa vai viṣayaparyante tava rājan mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.023e: śūdras tapyati durbuddhis tena bālavadho hy ayam
GE09ram_07_u:065.024a: yo hy adharmam akāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi
GE09ram_07_u:065.024c: karoti rājaśārdūla pure vā durmatir naraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.024e: kṣipraṃ hi narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:065.025a: sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam
GE09ram_07_u:065.025c: duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethās tatra yatnaṃ samācara
GE09ram_07_u:065.026a: evaṃ te dharmavṛddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ cāyurvivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:066.001a: nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:066.001c: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:066.002c: bālasya ca śarīraṃ tat tailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya
GE09ram_07_u:066.003a: gandhaiś ca paramodārais tailaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.003c: yathā na kṣīyate bālas tathā saumya vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:066.004c: vipattiḥ paribhedo vā bhaven na ca tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:066.006a: iṅgitaṃ sa tu vijñāya puṣpako hemabhūṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.007a: so 'bravīt praṇato bhūtvā ayam asmi narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:066.009a: dhanur gṛhītvā tūṇīṃ ca khagdaṃ ca ruciraprabham
GE09ram_07_u:066.010a: prāyāt pratīcīṃ sa marūn vicinvaṃś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.011a: apaśyamānas tatrāpi svalpam apy atha duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:066.011c: pūrvām api diśaṃ sarvām athāpaśyan narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.013a: tasmin sarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.013c: dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃl lambamānam adho mukham
GE09ram_07_u:066.014c: uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyas tvam asi suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:066.015c: kautūhalāt tvāṃ pṛcchāmi rāmo dāśarathir hy aham
GE09ram_07_u:066.016a: manīṣitas te ko nv arthaḥ svargalābho varāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.016c: yam aśritya tapas taptaṃ śrotum icchāmi tāpasa
GE09ram_07_u:066.017a: brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vāsi durjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:066.017c: vaiśyo vā yadi vā śūdraḥ satyam etad bravīhi me
GE09ram_07_u:067.001c: avākśirās tathābhūto vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:067.003c: śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha śambūkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:067.004c: niṣkṛṣya kośād vimalaṃ śiraś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:067.006c: sa gatvā vinayenaiva taṃ natvā mumude sukhī
GE09ram_07_u:067.008c: svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:067.009a: tvaṃ me bahumato rāma guṇair bahubhir uttamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:067.009c: atithiḥ pūjanīyaś ca māma rājan hṛdi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:067.010a: surā hi kathayanti tvām āgataṃ śūdraghātinam
GE09ram_07_u:067.010c: brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:067.011a: uṣyatāṃ ceha rajanīṃ sakāśe mama rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:067.011c: prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvaṃ gantā svapuram eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:067.013a: dattasya hi punar dānaṃ sumahat phalam ucyate
GE09ram_07_u:067.013c: tasmāt pradāsye vidhivat tat pratīccha nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:067.014a: tad rāmaḥ pratijagrāha munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:067.014c: divyam ābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:067.015a: pratigṛhya tato rāmas tad ābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:067.016a: atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman vapuṣā yuktam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:067.016c: kathaṃ bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena vāhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:067.017c: āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:067.018a: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munir vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:067.018c: śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge gate
GE09ram_07_u:068.001a: purā tretāyuge hy āsīd araṇyaṃ bahuvistaram
GE09ram_07_u:068.002c: aham ākramituṃ śaumya tad araṇyam upāgamam
GE09ram_07_u:068.003a: tasya rūpam araṇyasya nirdeṣṭuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:068.004a: tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu saro yojanam āyatam
GE09ram_07_u:068.006a: tasmin saraḥsamīpe tu mahad adbhutam āśramam
GE09ram_07_u:068.007c: prabhāte kālyam utthāya saras tad upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:068.008a: athāpaśyaṃḥ śavaṃ tatra supuṣṭam ajaraṃ kva cit
GE09ram_07_u:068.008c: tiṣṭhantaṃ parayā lakṣmyā tasmiṃs toyāśaye nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:068.009a: tam arthaṃ cintayāno 'haṃ muhūrtaṃ tatra rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:068.009c: viṣṭhito 'smi sarastīre kiṃ nv idaṃ syād iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:068.012a: paśyato me tadā rāma vimānād avaruhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:068.012c: taṃ śavaṃ bhakṣayām āsa sa svargī raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:068.013a: tato bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ māṃsaṃ bahu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE09ram_07_u:068.015a: tam ahaṃ devasaṃkāśam ārohantam udīkṣya vai
GE09ram_07_u:068.015c: athāham abruvaṃ vākyaṃ tam eva puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:068.016a: ko bhavān devasaṃkāśa āhāraś ca vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:068.016c: tvayāyaṃ bhujyate saumya kiṃ karthaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:068.017c: āhāro garhitaḥ saumya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:069.001a: bhuktvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:069.002c: duratikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija
GE09ram_07_u:069.003a: purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:069.003c: sudeva iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:069.004a: tasya putradvayaṃ brahman dvābhyāṃ strībhyām ajāyata
GE09ram_07_u:069.004c: ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyān suratho 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:069.005a: tataḥ pitari svaryāte paurā mām abhyaṣecayan
GE09ram_07_u:069.006c: rājyaṃ kārayato brahman prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:069.007a: so 'haṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid vijñātāyur dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:069.007c: kāladharmaṃ hṛdi nyasya tato vanam upāgamam
