GE09ram_07_u:069.008c: tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭo 'smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:069.009c: idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapas taptaṃ mayā ciram
GE09ram_07_u:069.011a: tato māṃ svargasaṃsthaṃ vai kṣutpipāse dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:069.013c: āhāraḥ kaś ca me deva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE09ram_07_u:069.014a: pitāmahas tu mām āha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja
GE09ram_07_u:069.014c: svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:069.015a: svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:069.015c: anuptaṃ rohate śveta na kadā cin mahāmate
GE09ram_07_u:069.016a: dattaṃ na te 'sti sūkṣmo 'pi vane sattvaniṣevite
GE09ram_07_u:069.017a: sa tvaṃ supuṣṭam āhāraiḥ svaśarīram anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:069.018a: yadā tu tad vanaṃ śveta agastyaḥ sumahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:069.019a: sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇān api
GE09ram_07_u:069.019c: kiṃ punas tvāṃ mahābāho kṣutpipāsāvaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:069.021a: bahūn varṣagaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:069.021c: kṣayaṃ nābhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiś cāpi mamottamā
GE09ram_07_u:069.022a: tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrād asmād vimokṣaya
GE09ram_07_u:069.022c: anyeṣām agatir hy atra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam
GE09ram_07_u:069.025a: mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasminn ābharaṇe śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:069.025c: mānuṣaḥ pūrvako deho rājarṣeḥ sa nanāśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:069.026a: pranaṣṭe tu śarīre 'sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:069.026c: tṛptaḥ pramudito rājā jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:070.001c: gauravād vismayāc caiva bhūyaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame
GE09ram_07_u:070.002a: bhagavaṃs tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ tapas tapyati yatra saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:070.002c: śveto vaidarbhako rājā kathaṃ tad amṛgadvijam
GE09ram_07_u:070.003a: niḥsattvaṃ ca vanaṃ jātaṃ śūnyaṃ manujavarjitam
GE09ram_07_u:070.003c: tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:070.005a: purā kṛtayuge rāma manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:070.005c: tasya putro mahān āsīd ikṣvākuḥ kulavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:070.006a: taṃ putraṃ pūrvake rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam
GE09ram_07_u:070.006c: pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava kartety uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:070.007a: tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:070.007c: tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo manuḥ punar uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:070.008c: daṇḍena ca prajā rakṣa mā ca daṇḍam akāraṇe
GE09ram_07_u:070.009a: aparādhiṣu yo daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai
GE09ram_07_u:070.009c: sa daṇḍo vidhivan muktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:070.010a: tasmād daṇḍe mahābāho yatnavān bhava putraka
GE09ram_07_u:070.010c: dharmo hi paramo loke kurvatas te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:070.011a: iti taṃ bahu saṃdiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā
GE09ram_07_u:070.013a: karmabhir bahurūpaiś ca tais tair manusutaḥ sutān
GE09ram_07_u:070.014c: mūḍhaś cākṛtividyaś ca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān
GE09ram_07_u:070.015a: nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpatejasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:070.016a: sa paśyamānas taṃ doṣaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:070.017a: sa daṇḍas tatra rājābhūd ramye parvatarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:070.018a: purasya cākaron nāma madhumantam iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:070.019a: evaṃ sa rājā tad rājyaṃ kārayat sapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:071.003a: atha kāle tu kasmiṃś cid rājā bhārgavam āśramam
GE09ram_07_u:071.006a: kutas tvam asi suśroṇi kasya vāsi sutā śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:071.007a: tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya mohonmattasya kāminaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:071.009a: guruḥ pitā me rājendra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:071.009c: vyasanaṃ sumahat kruddhaḥ sa te dadyān mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:071.010a: yadi vātra mayā kāryaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena satpathā
GE09ram_07_u:071.010c: varayasva nṛpa śreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim
GE09ram_07_u:071.011a: anyathā tu phalaṃ tubhyaṃ bhaved ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_07_u:071.011c: krodhena hi pitā me 'sau trailokyam api nirdahet
GE09ram_07_u:071.013a: prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi na kālaṃ kṣeptum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:071.013c: tvatkṛte hi mama prāṇā vidīryante śubhānane
GE09ram_07_u:071.014a: tvāṃ prāpya hi vadho vāpi pāpaṃ vāpi sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:071.014c: bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru bhajamānaṃ suvihvalam
GE09ram_07_u:071.015a: evam uktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ dorbhyāṃ gṛhya balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:071.016a: tam anarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:072.001c: svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ saṃnyavartata
GE09ram_07_u:072.003c: nirdahann iva lokāṃs trīñ śiṣyāṃś cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:072.005c: yaḥ pradīptāṃ hutāśasya śikhāṃ vai spraṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:072.006a: yasmāt sa kṛtavān pāpam īdṛśaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:072.006c: tasmāt prāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:072.012a: śrutvā tūśasano vākyaṃ sa āśramāvasatho janaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:072.012c: niṣkrānto viṣayāt tasya sthānaṃ cakre 'tha bāhyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:072.013a: sa tathoktvā munijanam arajām idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:072.014c: araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaś cātra pratīkṣyatām
GE09ram_07_u:072.015a: tvatsamīpe tu ye sattvā vāsam eṣyanti tāṃ niśām
GE09ram_07_u:072.016a: ity uktvā bhārgavo vāsam anyatra samupākramat
GE09ram_07_u:072.017c: śapto brahmarṣiṇā tena purā vaidharmake kṛte
GE09ram_07_u:072.019a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:072.019c: saṃdhyām upāsituṃ vīra samayo hy ativartate
GE09ram_07_u:072.021a: sa tair ṛṣibhir abhyastaḥ sahitair brahmasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:072.021c: ravir astaṃ gato rāma gacchodakam upaspṛśa
GE09ram_07_u:073.001a: ṛṣer vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:073.004a: sa bhuktavān naraśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:073.004c: prītaś ca parituṣṭaś ca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāvasat
GE09ram_07_u:073.006c: āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:073.009a: atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:073.010a: muhūrtam api rāma tvāṃ ye nu paśyanti ke cana
GE09ram_07_u:073.010c: pāvitāḥ svargabhūtās te pūjyante divi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:073.011a: ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhir īkṣante prāṇino bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:073.012c: praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatir hi jagato bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:073.013a: evam uktas tu muninā prāñjaliḥ prpagraho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:073.014a: abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ tāṃś ca sarvāṃs tapodhanān
GE09ram_07_u:073.016a: svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hemabhūṣite
GE09ram_07_u:073.019a: lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gatvā tau laghuvikramau
GE09ram_07_u:073.019c: mamāgamanam ākhyāya śabdāpaya ca māṃ ciram
GE09ram_07_u:074.002a: dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_07_u:074.002c: pariṣvajya tato rāmo vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:074.004c: sahito yaṣṭum icchāmi tatra dharmo hi śāśvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:074.006a: somaś ca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:074.006c: prāptaś ca sarvalokānāṃ kīrtiṃ sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:074.007a: asminn ahani yac chreyaś cintyatāṃ tan mayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:074.007c: hitaṃ cāyati yuktaṃ ca prayatau vaktum arhatha
GE09ram_07_u:074.008c: bharataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:074.009a: tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_07_u:074.010a: mahīpālāś ca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatim ivāmarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:074.011a: prajāś ca pitṛvad rājan paśyanti tvāṃ mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:074.012a: sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ yajñam āhartāsi kathaṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:074.013a: pṛthivyāṃ ye ca puruṣā rājan pauruṣam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:074.014c: pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate
GE09ram_07_u:074.015a: bharatasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:074.016a: uvāca ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ kaikeyyā nandivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:074.019a: prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ yajñena saṃmitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:074.019c: tasmāc chṛṇomi te vākyaṃ sādhūktaṃ susamāhitam
GE09ram_07_u:075.001a: tathoktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani
GE09ram_07_u:075.004c: vṛtro nāma mahān āsīd daiteyo lokasaṃmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.005c: anurāgeṇa lokāṃs trīn snehāt paśyati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.006a: dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.007c: rasavanti prasūtāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:075.008c: sa rājyaṃ tādṛśaṃ bhuṅkte sphītam adbhutadarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:075.009a: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaḥ kuryām anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:075.009c: tapo hi paramaṃ śreyas tapo hi paramaṃ sukham
GE09ram_07_u:075.010a: sa nikṣipya sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ paureṣu parameśvaram
GE09ram_07_u:075.011a: tapas tapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ paramārtavat
GE09ram_07_u:075.011c: viṣṇuṃ samupasaṃkramya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:075.012c: balavān sa hi dharmātmā nainaṃ śakṣyāmi bādhitum
GE09ram_07_u:075.013a: yady asau tapa ātiṣṭhed bhūya eva sureśvara
GE09ram_07_u:075.013c: yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tāvad asya vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.014c: kṣaṇaṃ hi na bhaved vṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara
GE09ram_07_u:075.015a: yadā hi prītisaṃyogaṃ tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.016a: sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ lokānāṃ kuruṣva sumahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.016c: tvatkṛtena hi sarvaṃ syāt praśāntam ajaraṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:075.017a: ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvāṃ nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:075.017c: vṛtraghatena mahatā eṣāṃ sāhyaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:075.018a: tvayā hi nityaśaḥ sāhyaṃ kṛtam eṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:075.018c: asahyam idam anyeṣām agatīnāṃ gatir bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:076.001a: lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:076.002c: bhūya eva kathāṃ divyāṃ kathayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:076.004c: tena yuṣmat priyārthaṃ vai nāhaṃ hanmi mahāsuram
GE09ram_07_u:076.005a: avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sukham uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:076.005c: tasmād upāyam ākhyāsye yena vṛtraṃ haniṣyatha
GE09ram_07_u:076.006c: tena vṛtraṃ sahasrākṣo haniṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:076.007a: eko 'ṃśo vāsavaṃ yātu dvitīyo vajram eva tu
GE09ram_07_u:076.007c: tṛtīyo bhūtalaṃ śakras tato vṛtraṃ haniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:076.008a: tathā bruvati deveśe devā vākyam athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:076.008c: evam etan na saṃdeho yathā vadasi daityahan
GE09ram_07_u:076.010c: tad araṇyam upākrāman yatra vṛtro mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:076.011c: pibantam iva lokāṃs trīn nirdahantam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_07_u:076.012c: katham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ na syāt parājayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:076.016c: apatac cāsya gātreṣu tam indraṃ duḥkham āviśat
GE09ram_07_u:076.018a: tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā deva pūrvajo jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:076.019a: hataś cāyaṃ tvayā vṛtro brahmahatyā ca vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:076.020a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇur abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:076.020c: mām eva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam
GE09ram_07_u:076.022a: evaṃ saṃdiśya devānāṃ tāṃ vāṇīm amṛtopamā
GE09ram_07_u:077.001a: tathā vṛtravadhaṃ sarvam akhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:077.002c: brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakraḥ saṃjñāṃ lebhe na vṛtrahā
GE09ram_07_u:077.003c: kālaṃ tatrāvasat kaṃ cid veṣṭamāno yathoragaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:077.004a: atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignam abhavaj jagat
GE09ram_07_u:077.005a: niḥsrotasaś cāmbuvāhā hradāś ca saritas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:077.006c: yad uktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ taṃ yajñaṃ samupānayan
GE09ram_07_u:077.007c: taṃ deśaṃ sahitā jagmur yatrendro bhayamohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:077.008a: te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ mohitaṃ brahmahatyayā
GE09ram_07_u:077.010c: abhigamyābravīd vākyaṃ kva me sthānaṃ vidhāsyatha
GE09ram_07_u:077.011a: te tām ūcus tato devās tuṣṭāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:077.012c: saṃnidhau sthānam anyatra varayām āsa durvasā
GE09ram_07_u:077.013c: dvitīyena tu vṛkṣeṣu satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:077.014a: yo 'yam aṃśas tṛtīyo me strīṣu yauvanaśāliṣu
GE09ram_07_u:077.015a: hantāro brāhmaṇān ye tu prekṣāpūrvam adūṣakān
GE09ram_07_u:077.016a: pratyūcus tāṃ tato devā yathā vadasi durvase
GE09ram_07_u:077.016c: tathā bhavatu tat sarvaṃ sādhayasva yathepsitam
GE09ram_07_u:077.018a: praśāntaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhate
GE09ram_07_u:078.002a: evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:078.003a: śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.003c: putro bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmān ilo nāma sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.004a: sa rājā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.005a: suraiś ca paramodārair daiteyaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.006c: abibhyaṃś ca trayo lokāḥ saroṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.007a: sa rājā tādṛśo hy āsīd dharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.008a: sa pracakre mahābāhur mṛgayāṃ rucire vane
GE09ram_07_u:078.009c: hatvaiva tṛptir nābhūc ca rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.010c: yatra jāto mahāsenas taṃ deśam upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:078.011c: ramayām āsa durdharṣaiḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:078.013a: ye ca tatra vanoddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣavādinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.013c: yac ca kiṃ cana tat sarvaṃ nārīsaṃjñaṃ babhūva ha
GE09ram_07_u:078.014a: etasminn antare rājā sa ilaḥ kardamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.016a: tasya duḥkhaṃ mahat tv āsīd dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā gatam
GE09ram_07_u:078.016c: umāpateś ca tat karma jñātvā trāsam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:078.018a: tataḥ prahasya varadaḥ saha devyā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.019c: puruṣatvam ṛte saumya varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:078.020a: tataḥ sa rājā śokārtāḥ pratyākhyāto mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:078.020c: na sa jagrāha strībhūto varam anyaṃ surottamāt
GE09ram_07_u:078.022a: īśe varāṇāṃ varade lokānām asi bhāmini
GE09ram_07_u:078.022c: amoghadarśane devi bhaje saumye namo 'stu te
GE09ram_07_u:078.023c: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ devī rudrasya saṃmatā
GE09ram_07_u:078.024a: ardhasya devo varado varārdhasya tathā hy aham
GE09ram_07_u:078.024c: tasmād ardhaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ strīpuṃsor yāvad icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:078.025a: tad adbhutatamaṃ śrutvā devyā varam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:078.026a: yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:078.026c: māsaṃ strītvam upāsitvā māsaṃ syāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:078.027c: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam evam etad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:078.028a: rājan puruṣabhūtas tvaṃ strībhāvaṃ na smariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:078.028c: strībhūtaś cāparaṃ māsaṃ na smariṣyasi pauruṣam
GE09ram_07_u:078.029a: evaṃ sa rājā puruṣo māmaṃ bhūtvātha kārdamiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.002a: tau rāmaṃ prāñjalībhūtvā tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.002c: vistaraṃ tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.003a: kathaṃ sa rājā strībhūto vartayām āsa durgatim
GE09ram_07_u:079.003c: puruṣo vā yadā bhūtaḥ kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayaty asau
GE09ram_07_u:079.004c: kathayām āsa kākutṣṭhas tasya rājño yathā gatam
GE09ram_07_u:079.005a: tam eva prathamaṃ māsaṃ strībhūtvā lokasundarī
GE09ram_07_u:079.005c: tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhir ye 'sya pūrvaṃ padānugāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.007a: vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi saṃtyaktvā vai samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.009a: dadarśa sā ilā tasmin budhaṃ somasutaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:079.009c: jvalantaṃ svena vapuṣā pūrṇaṃ somam ivoditam
GE09ram_07_u:079.010a: tapantaṃ ca tapas tīvram ambhomadhye durāsadam
GE09ram_07_u:079.011a: sā taṃ jalāśayaṃ sarvaṃ kṣobhayām āsa vismitā
GE09ram_07_u:079.011c: saha taiḥ pūra puruṣaiḥ strībhūtai raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:079.013c: cintāṃ samabhyatikrāmat kā nv iyaṃ devatādhikā
GE09ram_07_u:079.014a: na devīṣu na nāgīṣu nāsurīṣv apsaraḥsu ca
GE09ram_07_u:079.014c: dṛṣṭapūrvā mayā kā cid rūpeṇaitena śobhitā
GE09ram_07_u:079.015c: iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:079.016a: sa āśramaṃ samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadās tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.016c: śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāś cainaṃ ca vavandire
GE09ram_07_u:079.017a: sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātma kasyaiṣā lokasundarī
GE09ram_07_u:079.017c: kimartham āgatā ceha satyam ākhyāta māciram
GE09ram_07_u:079.018a: śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:079.018c: śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvā ūcur madhurayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:079.019a: asmākam eṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā
GE09ram_07_u:079.020a: tad vākyam avyaktapadaṃ tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ niśamya tu
GE09ram_07_u:079.020c: vidyām āvartanīṃ puṇyām āvartayata sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.021a: so 'rthaṃ viditvā nikhilaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:079.021c: sarvā eva striyas tāś ca babhāṣe munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:079.022a: atra kiṃ puruṣā bhadrā avasañ śailarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:079.024c: upāsāṃ cakrire śailaṃ bahvyas tā bahudhā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:080.001c: āścaryam iti cābrūtām ubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram
GE09ram_07_u:080.002a: atha rāmaḥ kathām etāṃ bhūya eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.003a: sarvās tā vidrutā dṛṣṭvā kiṃnarīr ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.003c: uvāca rūpasaṃpannāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:080.004c: bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:080.006c: praśādhi māṃ somasuta yathecchasi tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:080.007c: sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.008a: budhasya mādhavo māsas tām ilāṃ rucirānanām
GE09ram_07_u:080.011c: na ca paśyāmi tat sainyaṃ kva nu te māmakā gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.012a: tac chrutvā tasya rājarṣer naṣṭasaṃjñasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:080.012c: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sāntvayan parayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:080.015a: sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.016a: tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ bhṛtyair vinā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.017a: suto dharmaparo brahmañ jyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.017c: śaśabindur iti khyātaḥ sa me rājyaṃ prapatsyate
GE09ram_07_u:080.018a: na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ gatvā bhṛtyadārān sukhānvitān
GE09ram_07_u:080.018c: prativaktuṃ mahātejaḥ kiṃ cid apy aśubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:080.019a: tathā bruvati rājendre budhaḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:080.019c: sāntvapūrvam athovāca vāsas ta iha rocatām
GE09ram_07_u:080.020a: na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:080.021c: vāsāya vidadhe buddhiṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
GE09ram_07_u:080.022a: māsaṃ sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayaty aniśaṃ śubhā
GE09ram_07_u:080.023a: tataḥ sa navame māsi ilā somasutātmajam
GE09ram_07_u:080.024a: jātamātraṃ tu suśroṇī pitur haste nyaveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:081.001a: tathoktavati rāme tu tasya janma tad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:081.001c: uvāca lakṣmaṇo bhūyo bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.002c: akarot kiṃ naraśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:081.007a: ayaṃ rājā mahābāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.007c: jānītainaṃ yathā bhūtaṃ śreyo hy asya vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:081.008a: teṣāṃ saṃvadatām eva tam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:081.009a: pulastyaś ca kratuś caiva vaṣaṭkāras tathaiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:081.009c: oṃkāraś ca mahātejās tam āśramam upāgaman
GE09ram_07_u:081.010c: hitaiṣiṇo bāhli pateḥ pṛthag vākyam athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:081.011a: kardamas tv abravīd vākyaṃ sutārthaṃ paramaṃ hitam
GE09ram_07_u:081.011c: dvijāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yac chreyaḥ pārthivasya hi
GE09ram_07_u:081.012c: nāśvamedhāt paro yajñaḥ priyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.013c: kardamenaivam uktās tu sarva eva dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.013e: rocayanti sma taṃ yajñaṃ rudrasyārādhanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:081.014c: marutta iti vikhyatas taṃ yajñaṃ samupāharat
GE09ram_07_u:081.015c: rudraś ca paramaṃ toṣam ājagāma mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.016a: atha yajñasamāptau tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:081.016c: umāpatir dvijān sarvān uvācedam ilāṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:081.017c: asya bāhlipateś caiva kiṃ karomi priyaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:081.018a: tathā vadati deveśe dvijās te susamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.018c: prasādayanti deveśaṃ yathā syāt puruṣas tv ilā
GE09ram_07_u:081.019a: tataḥ prītamanā rudraḥ puruṣatvaṃ dadau punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:081.020a: nivṛtte hayamedhe tu gate cādarśanaṃ hare
GE09ram_07_u:081.021a: rājā tu bāhlim utsṛjya madhyadeśe hy anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:081.023a: sa kāle prāptavāṃl lokam ilo brāhmam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:081.024c: strībhūtaḥ pauruṣaṃ lebhe yac cānyad api durlabham
GE09ram_07_u:082.001c: lakṣmaṇaṃ punār evāha dharmayuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:082.002a: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kaśyapam
GE09ram_07_u:082.003a: etān sarvān samāhūya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:082.004c: dvijān sarvān samāhūya darśayām āsa rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:082.006a: prāñjalis tu tato bhūtvā rāghavo dvijasāttamān
GE09ram_07_u:082.008a: vijñāya tu mataṃ teṣāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:082.009a: śīghraṃ mahadbhir haribhir bahibhiś ca tadāśrayaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:082.009c: sārdham āgaccha bhadraṃ te anubhoktuṃ makhottamam
GE09ram_07_u:082.010a: vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:082.011a: rājānaś ca naravyāghra ye me priyacikīrṣavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:082.013c: deśāntaragatā ye ca sadārāś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:082.014a: yajñavāṭaś ca sumahān gomatyā naimiṣe vane
GE09ram_07_u:082.014c: ājñāpyatāṃ mahābāho tad dhi puṇyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:082.016c: agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:082.017c: naigamān bālavṛddhāṃś ca dvijāṃś ca susamāhitān
GE09ram_07_u:082.018a: karmāntikāṃś ca kuśalāñ śilpinaś ca supaṇḍitān
GE09ram_07_u:082.018c: mātaraś caiva me sarvāḥ kumārāntaḥpurāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:082.019a: kāñcanīṃ mama patnīṃ ca dīkṣārhāṃ yajñakarmaṇi
GE09ram_07_u:082.019c: agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.002a: ṛtvigbhir lakṣmaṇaṃ sārdham aśve ca viniyujya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.003c: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe śrīmān iti ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:083.004a: naimiṣe vasatas tasya sarva eva narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.008a: vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ sragvibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.010c: chandato dehi visrabdho yāvat tuṣyanti yācakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.011a: na kaś cin malinas tatra dīno vāpy atha vā kṛśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.012a: ye ca tatra mahātmāno munayaś cirajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.014a: na śakrasya na somasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_07_u:083.014c: īdṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvo na evam ūcus tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.015a: sarvatra vānarās tasthuḥ sarvatraiva ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:083.015c: vāso dhanāni kāmibhyaḥ pūrṇahastā dadur bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:083.016c: saṃvatsaram atho sāgraṃ vartate na ca hīyate
GE09ram_07_u:084.003a: sa śiṣyāv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yuvāṃ gatvā samāhitau
GE09ram_07_u:084.003c: kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ gāyatāṃ parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:084.005a: rāmasya bhavanadvāri yatra karma ca vartate
GE09ram_07_u:084.005c: ṛtvijām agrataś caiva tatra geyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:084.006a: imāni ca phalāny atra svādūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:084.007a: na yāsyathaḥ śramaṃ vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai
GE09ram_07_u:084.009a: divase viṃśatiḥ sargā geyā vai parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:084.009c: pramāṇair bahubhis tatra yathoddiṣṭaṃ mayā purā
GE09ram_07_u:084.010a: lobhaś cāpi na kartavyaḥ svalpo 'pi dhanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_07_u:084.011a: yadi pṛcchet sa kākutstho yuvāṃ kasyeti dārakau
GE09ram_07_u:084.011c: vālmīker atha śiṣyau hi brūtām evaṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:084.012a: imās tantrīḥ sumadhurāḥ sthānaṃ vā pūrvadarśitam
GE09ram_07_u:084.013a: ādiprabhṛti geyaṃ syān na cāvajñāya pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:084.013c: pitā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā bhavati dharmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:084.014a: tad yuvāṃ hṛṣṭamanasau śvaḥ prabhāte samādhinā
GE09ram_07_u:084.015a: iti saṃdiśya bahuśo muniḥ prācetasas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:084.016a: tām adbhutāṃ tau hṛdaye kumārau; niveśya vāṇīm ṛṣibhāṣitāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_07_u:084.016c: samutsukau tau sukham ūṣatur niśāṃ; yathāśvinau bhārgavanītisaṃskṛtau
GE09ram_07_u:085.002a: tāṃ sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrvacaryāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.002c: apūrvāṃ pāṭhya jātiṃ ca geyena samalaṃkṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:085.004c: pārthivāṃś ca naravyāghraḥ paṇḍitān naigamāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:085.005a: paurāṇikāñ śabdavito ye ca vṛddhā dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.006a: hṛṣṭā ṛṣigaṇās tatra pārthivāś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.006c: pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ rājānaṃ gāyakau ca tau
GE09ram_07_u:085.007a: parasparam athocus te sarva eva samaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.007c: ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtau
GE09ram_07_u:085.008a: jaṭilau yadi na syātāṃ na valkaladharau yadi
GE09ram_07_u:085.009c: geyaṃ pracakratus tatra tāv ubhau munidārakau
GE09ram_07_u:085.010c: na ca tṛptiṃ yayuḥ sarve śrotāro geya saṃpadā
GE09ram_07_u:085.011c: tataḥ prabhṛti sargāṃś ca yāvadviṃśaty agāyatām
GE09ram_07_u:085.013c: dadasva śīghraṃ kākutstha bālayor mā vṛthā śramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.014c: ūcatuś ca mahātmānau kim aneneti vismitau
GE09ram_07_u:085.016c: śrotāraś caiva rāmaś ca sarva eva suvismitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.017a: tasya caivāgamaṃ rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotum utsukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.017c: papraccha tau mahātejās tāv ubhau munidārakau
GE09ram_07_u:085.018a: kiṃpramāṇam idaṃ kāvyaṃ kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.018c: kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ ko vāsau munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.020c: pratiṣṭhā jīvitaṃ yāvat tāvad rājañ śubhāśubham
GE09ram_07_u:085.021a: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājañ śravaṇāya mahāratha
GE09ram_07_u:085.021c: karmāntare kṣaṇī hūtas tac chṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:085.022a: bāḍham ity abravīd rāmas tau cānujñāpya rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:085.023a: rāmo 'pi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.001a: rāmo bahūny ahāny eva tad gītaṃ paramādbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:086.001c: śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rājabhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.002a: tasmin gīte tu vijñāya sītāputrau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_07_u:086.002c: tasyāḥ pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:086.005a: chandaṃ munes tu vijñāya sītāyāś ca manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:086.005c: pratyayaṃ dātukāmāyās tataḥ śaṃsata me laghu
GE09ram_07_u:086.006a: śvaḥ prabhāte tu śapathaṃ maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_07_u:086.007a: śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad vacaḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:086.008c: ūcus te rāma vākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:086.009a: teṣāṃ tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:086.010a: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathā tuṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.010c: tathā kariṣyate sītā daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.012a: tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.012c: ṛṣīṃs tatra sametāṃś ca rājñaś caivābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:086.013a: bhagavantaḥ saśiṣyā vai sānugaś ca narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.015a: rājānaś ca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:086.015c: upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tvayy eva bhuvi nānyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.016a: evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā śvobhūta iti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:086.016c: visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.002a: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.003c: mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur maudgalyaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.004a: bhārgavaś cyavanaś caiva śatānandaś ca dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:087.004c: bharadvājaś ca tejasvī agniputraś ca suprabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.005a: ete cānye ca munayo bahavaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.005c: rājānaś ca naravyāghrāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.006a: rākṣasāś ca mahāvīryā vānarāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.007a: kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:087.009a: tam ṛṣiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītā sānvagacchad avāṅmukhī
GE09ram_07_u:087.010a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīm ivāyāntīṃ brahmāṇam anugāminīm
GE09ram_07_u:087.010c: vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītāṃ sādhukāro mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:087.011a: tato halahalā śabdaḥ sarveṣām evam ābabhau
GE09ram_07_u:087.012a: sādhu sīteti ke cit tu sādhu rāmeti cāpare
GE09ram_07_u:087.012c: ubhāv eva tu tatrānye sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:087.015c: pratyayaṃ dāsyate sītā tām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:087.016a: imau ca jānakī putrāv ubhau ca yamajātakau
GE09ram_07_u:087.016c: sutau tavaiva durdharṣo satyam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:087.017c: na smarāmy anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ tathemau tava putrakau
GE09ram_07_u:087.018c: tasyāḥ phalam upāśnīyām apāpā maithilī yathā
GE09ram_07_u:088.001c: prāñjalir jagato madhye dṛṣṭvā tāṃ devavarṇinīm
GE09ram_07_u:088.002a: evam etan mahābhāga yathā vadasi dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:088.002c: pratyayo hi mama brahmaṃs tava vākyair akalmaṣaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.003a: pratyayo hi purā datto vaidehyā surasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:088.003e: parityaktā mayā sītā tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
GE09ram_07_u:088.004a: jānāmi cemau putrau me yamajātau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_07_u:088.004c: śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye maithilyāṃ prītir astu me
GE09ram_07_u:088.006a: ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve deśā marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.006e: sādhyāś ca devāḥ sarve te sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.007a: tato vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo divyagandho manoramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.007c: taṃ janaughaṃ suraśreṣṭho hlādayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.010a: yathāhaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye
GE09ram_07_u:088.010c: tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātum arhati
GE09ram_07_u:088.011a: tathā śapantyāṃ vaidehyāṃ prādurāsīt tad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:088.013a: tasmiṃs tu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyāṃ gṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:088.015c: sādhu sādhv iti vai sīte yasyās te śīlam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:088.016a: evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco hy antarikṣagatāḥ surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.017a: yajñavāṭagatāś cāpi munayaḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:088.018a: antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.019a: ke cid vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ke cid dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.019c: ke cid rāmaṃ nirīkṣante ke cit sītām acetanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:088.020c: taṃ muhūrtam ivātyarthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmohitaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:089.001c: apaśyamāno vaidehīṃ mene śūnyam idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:089.003a: tato visṛjya tān sarvān rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:089.003c: hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:089.004a: na sītāyāḥ parāṃ bhāryāṃ vavre sa raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:089.004c: yajñe yajñe ca patnyarthaṃ jānakī kāñcanī bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:089.006c: īje kratubhir anyaiś ca sa śrīmān āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:089.007a: evaṃ sa kālaḥ sumahān rājyasthasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:089.009a: kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:089.010a: nākāle mriyate kaś cin na vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:089.010c: nādharmaś cābhavat kaś cid rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_07_u:089.013a: sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca
GE09ram_07_u:089.013c: samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmaṃ ca lebhire
GE09ram_07_u:089.014a: tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati
GE09ram_07_u:089.015c: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan
GE09ram_07_u:090.001a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya yudhājit kekayo nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:090.003c: rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.004a: śrutvā tu rāghavo gārgyaṃ maharṣiṃ samupāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:090.005c: gārgyaṃ saṃpūjayām āsa dhanaṃ tat pratigṛhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.006a: pṛṣṭvā ca prītidaṃ sarvaṃ kuśalaṃ mātulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.007a: kim āha matulo vākyaṃ yadarthaṃ bhagavān iha
GE09ram_07_u:090.007c: prāpto vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭha sākṣād iva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:090.009a: mātulas te mahābāho vākyam āha nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:090.011a: taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:090.011c: śailūṣasya sutā vīrās tisraḥ koṭyo mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:090.013a: anyasya na gatis tatra deśaś cāyaṃ suśobhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:090.013c: rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvām anṛtaṃ vade
GE09ram_07_u:090.014a: tac chrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto mararṣir mātulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.014c: uvāca bāḍham ity evaṃ bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata
GE09ram_07_u:090.015c: imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:090.016a: bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.016c: mātulena suguptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau
GE09ram_07_u:090.018a: niveśya te puravare ātmājau saṃniveśya ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.019a: brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam
GE09ram_07_u:090.020c: bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ ca niryayau
GE09ram_07_u:090.021a: sā senā śakrayukteva naragān niryayāv atha
GE09ram_07_u:090.022a: māṃsāśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca
GE09ram_07_u:090.024c: bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayur agrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:091.003a: bharataś ca yudhājic ca sametau laghuvikramau
GE09ram_07_u:091.004a: śrutvā tu bharataṃ prāptaṃ gandharvās te samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:091.008a: taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:091.009c: niveśayām āsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame
GE09ram_07_u:091.010c: varṣaiḥ pañcabhir ākīrṇo viṣayair nāgarais tathā
GE09ram_07_u:091.015c: rāghavaṃ bharataḥ śrīmān brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:091.016c: niveśanaṃ ca deśasya śrutvā prīto 'sya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:092.001a: tac chrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:092.003c: ramaṇīyo hy asaṃbādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau
GE09ram_07_u:092.004a: na rājñāṃ yatra pīdā syān nāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:092.004c: sa deśo dṛśyatāṃ saumya nāparādhyāmahe yathā
GE09ram_07_u:092.005a: tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:092.007c: taṃ ca kṛtā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:092.010a: tato rāmaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ bharato lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:092.010c: yayur yudhi durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire
GE09ram_07_u:092.012c: candraketos tu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha
GE09ram_07_u:092.013c: putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyāṃ punar āgamat
GE09ram_07_u:092.015c: kālaṃ gatam api snehān na jajñāte 'tidhārmikau
GE09ram_07_u:092.017a: vihṛtya lākaṃ paripūrṇamānasāḥ; śriyā vṛtā dharmapathe pare sthitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:092.017c: trayaḥ samiddhā iva dīptatejasā; hutāgnayaḥ sādhu mahādhvare trayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.001a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya rāme dharmapathe sthite
GE09ram_07_u:093.003c: rāmaṃ didṛkṣur āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:093.005a: jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute
GE09ram_07_u:093.005c: dūtas tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātas tapasvī bhāskaraprabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.006a: tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:093.006c: praveśyatāṃ munis tāta mahaujās tasya vākyadhṛk
GE09ram_07_u:093.007a: saumitris tu tathety uktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim
GE09ram_07_u:093.008c: ṛṣir madhurayā vācā vardhasvety āha rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:093.009a: tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjām arghya purogamām
GE09ram_07_u:093.010a: pṛṣṭhaś ca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.011a: tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune
GE09ram_07_u:093.011c: prāpayasva ca vākyāni yato dūtas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.012c: dvandvam etat pravaktavyaṃ na ca cakṣur hataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.013a: yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣed vā sa vadhyas tava rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:093.013c: bhaved vai munimukhyasya vacanaṃ yady avekṣase
GE09ram_07_u:093.014a: tatheti ca pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:093.015a: sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathāṃ dvandvasamīritām
GE09ram_07_u:093.015c: ṛṣer mama ca saumitre paśyed vā śṛṇuyā ca yaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.016c: tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.017a: yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:093.017c: kathayasva viśaṅkas tvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:094.001a: śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:094.003a: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:094.004a: saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:094.004c: mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:094.005a: bhogavantaṃ tato nāgam anantam udake śayam
GE09ram_07_u:094.005c: māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau
GE09ram_07_u:094.006a: madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayor asthicayair vṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:094.007a: padme divyārkasaṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api
GE09ram_07_u:094.007c: prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma sarvaṃ mayi niveśitam
GE09ram_07_u:094.008a: so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim
GE09ram_07_u:094.008c: rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:094.009a: tatas tvam api durdharṣas tasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt
GE09ram_07_u:094.011a: sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara
GE09ram_07_u:094.012c: kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:094.013a: sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣv iha
GE09ram_07_u:094.014a: yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasy upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:094.014c: vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:094.017a: śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:094.018a: bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:094.018c: hṛd gato hy asi saṃprāpto na me 'sty atra vicāraṇā
GE09ram_07_u:094.019c: sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hy āha pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:095.001a: tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:095.002c: rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate
GE09ram_07_u:095.003a: munes tu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_07_u:095.003c: abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:095.004a: kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomy aham
GE09ram_07_u:095.004c: vyagro hi rāghavo brahman muhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām
GE09ram_07_u:095.005c: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:095.006a: asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya
GE09ram_07_u:095.006c: viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:095.007a: bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:095.007c: na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi
GE09ram_07_u:095.008a: tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:095.008c: cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam
GE09ram_07_u:095.009a: ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:095.010a: lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca
GE09ram_07_u:095.010c: niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:095.011c: kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:095.012a: tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:095.014a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:095.015a: sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:095.015c: sādhu rāmeti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:095.017a: duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:095.017c: avānmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:095.018c: naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:096.001a: avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam
GE09ram_07_u:096.001c: rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuram abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:096.002a: na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:096.003a: jahi māṃ saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñāṃ paripālaya
GE09ram_07_u:096.004a: yadi prītir mahārāja yady anugrāhyatā mayi
GE09ram_07_u:096.004c: jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:096.006a: abravīc ca yathāvṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:096.007a: tac chrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata
GE09ram_07_u:096.007c: vasiṣṭhas tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:096.008a: dṛṣṭam etan mahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:096.008c: lakṣmaṇena viyogaś ca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:096.009a: tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:096.009c: vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo hi vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_07_u:096.010a: tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram
GE09ram_07_u:096.011c: lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:096.012c: śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:096.013a: visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:096.013c: tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam
GE09ram_07_u:096.014c: lakṣmaṇas tvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:096.015c: nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:096.016c: devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃs tadā
GE09ram_07_u:096.017c: pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:097.001c: purodhasaṃ mantriṇaś ca naigamāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:097.002c: ayodhyāyāṃ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_07_u:097.003a: praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kālātyayo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:097.004a: tac chrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:097.005a: bharataś ca visaṃjño 'bhūc chrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:097.005c: rājyaṃ vigarhayām āsa rāghavaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:097.006a: satyena hi śape rājan svargaloke na caiva hi
GE09ram_07_u:097.006c: na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:097.007c: kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_07_u:097.009a: tac chrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hy adho mukhān
GE09ram_07_u:097.009c: paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:097.010a: vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:097.010c: jñātvaiṣām īpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:097.011c: kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:097.012a: tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:097.013a: eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:097.013c: hṛdgatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭis tavānugamane dṛḍhā
GE09ram_07_u:097.014a: paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hy anuttamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:097.015a: tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:097.015c: vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān no naya īśvara
GE09ram_07_u:097.016a: sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣyaca
GE09ram_07_u:097.016c: paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:097.017a: evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:097.017c: kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_07_u:097.018c: rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:097.020a: abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya svapure tathā
GE09ram_07_u:098.001c: prajagmur madhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrur vāsaṃ na cādhvani
GE09ram_07_u:098.002a: tatas tribhir aho rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha
GE09ram_07_u:098.002c: śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat
GE09ram_07_u:098.004c: kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:098.005a: śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatīti lavasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:098.006c: viremus te tato dūtās tvara rājann iti bruvan
GE09ram_07_u:098.007c: prakṛtīs tu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam
GE09ram_07_u:098.008c: ātmanaś ca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:098.009c: subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam
GE09ram_07_u:098.010a: dvidhākṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayor dvayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:098.012a: sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_07_u:098.015a: na cānyad atra vaktavyaṃ dustaraṃ tava śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:098.015c: tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ vīra bhaktimantaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:098.016a: tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:098.016c: bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:098.018c: rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:098.019a: te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:098.020a: yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:098.022a: yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:098.023a: prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:098.024a: tam evam uktvā kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:098.024c: jīvite kṛtabuddhis tvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya
GE09ram_07_u:098.025c: tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya
GE09ram_07_u:098.026a: tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān
GE09ram_07_u:098.026c: mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:099.004c: kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha
GE09ram_07_u:099.005a: avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi
GE09ram_07_u:099.006a: rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā
GE09ram_07_u:099.009a: ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:099.010a: taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:099.016a: na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:099.017c: saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.002a: atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.002c: sarvaiḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.006c: āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:100.007a: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svakāṃ tanum
GE09ram_07_u:100.007c: vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejas tad ākāśaṃ sanātanam
GE09ram_07_u:100.008a: tvaṃ hi lokagatir deva na tvāṃ ke cit prajānate
GE09ram_07_u:100.009a: tvam acintyaṃ mahad bhūtam akṣayaṃ sarvasaṃgraham
GE09ram_07_u:100.009c: yām icchasi mahātejas tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam
GE09ram_07_u:100.011a: tato viṣṇugataṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.012a: ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.013c: sādhu sādhv iti tat sarvaṃ tridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_07_u:100.014a: atha viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:100.014c: eṣāṃ lokāñ janaughānāṃ dātum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:100.015a: ime hi sarve snehān mām anuyātā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.015c: bhaktā bhājayitavyāś ca tyaktātmānaś ca matkṛte
GE09ram_07_u:100.016a: tac chrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.017a: yac ca tiryaggataṃ kiṃ cid rāmam evānucintayat
GE09ram_07_u:100.017c: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati
GE09ram_07_u:100.017e: sarvair eva guṇair yukte brahmalokād anantare
GE09ram_07_u:100.018a: vānarāś ca svakāṃ yonim ṛkṣāś caiva tathā yayuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.018c: yebhyo viniḥsṛtā ye ye surādibhyaḥ susaṃbhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.019a: ṛṣibhyo nāgayakṣebhyas tāṃs tān eva prapedire
GE09ram_07_u:100.020c: avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hy āsīt prahṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:100.022a: divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan
GE09ram_07_u:100.022c: gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:100.023c: devānāṃ yasya yā yonir vānarā ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:100.024a: tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya cāmbhasi
GE09ram_07_u:100.024c: tathā svargagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā lokagurur divam
GE09ram_07_u:100.025a: jagāma tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ hṛṣṭair hṛṣṭo mahāmatiḥ
